T03D3802:204a-0: @204a ` // stong phrag brgya pa'i rnam par bshad pa bzhugs /
T03D3802:204a-2: # // stong phrag brgya pa'i rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba /
T03D3802:204a-4: nyan thos zhi ba chol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang //
T03D3802:204a-5: 'gro la phan par bzhed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa dang //
T03D3802:204a-6: gang dag yang dag ldan rnams thub rnams sna tshogs 'di dag rnam pa kun gsungs pa //
T03D3802:204a-7: sangs rgyas nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang ldan yum de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3802:204a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ston lugs ni gnyis te /
T03D3802:204a-9: sngon byung yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa pos ji ltar mdzad pa dang /
T03D3802:204a-10: rjes su 'jug pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa'o//
T03D3802:204a-12: mdo yon tan rin po che 'byung ba'i rgyu gleng zhig phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T03D3802:204a-13: mdo yon tan rin po che 'byung ba'i rkyen gleng bslang ba'o //
T03D3802:204a-15: thun mong gi gleng gzhi ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
T03D3802:204a-16: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i
T03D3802:204a-17: ri la dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong
T03D3802:204a-19: de la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa lngas bstan to //
T03D3802:204a-20: thun mong ma yin pa'i gleng gzhi ni 'khor thun mong ma yin pa dang /
T03D3802:204a-21: ston pa thun mong ma yin pas bstan to //
T03D3802:204b-0: nyan thos @204b zhi ba tshol ba ni dge slong gi dge 'dun no //
T03D3802:204b-1: nye bar zhi bar khrid pa ni dgra bcom pa la sogs pa'i yon tan bcu bzhi'o //
T03D3802:204b-2: kun shes pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lam mo //
T03D3802:204b-3: 'gro la phan par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:204b-4: 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa ni thams cad kyang
T03D3802:204b-5: gzungs rab tu thob pa la sogs pa'i yon tan
T03D3802:204b-6: no // lam shes pa nyid ni lam mo //
T03D3802:204b-7: ston pa thun mong ma yin pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams /
T03D3802:204b-10: dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa ni thub rnams zhes pa'o //
T03D3802:204b-11: rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsungs zhes pas ni chos 'phrul rnam pa gsum bstan pa las /
T03D3802:204b-12: ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul gyis snod kyi 'jig rten byi dor dang /
T03D3802:204b-13: bcud kyi sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa gnyis las /
T03D3802:204b-14: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po dang /
T03D3802:204b-15: seng ge rnam par rol pa'o //
T03D3802:204b-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la bzhi /
T03D3802:204b-17: sku thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu bkye ba dang /
T03D3802:204b-20: ljags kyi dbang po las 'od zer bkye ba'o //
T03D3802:204b-21: seng ge rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can yongs su sbyong ba la lnga /
T03D3802:204b-22: ngan 'gro'i rgyud yongs su sbyang ba dang /
T03D3802:204b-26: de la ched du brjod pa'o //
T03D3802:204b-28: rdzu 'phrul gyis zil gyis mnan pa dang /
T03D3802:204b-29: gdul bya mos par bya ba dang /
T03D3802:204b-30: mchod pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T03D3802:204b-31: gdul bya skal pa dang ldan par bstan pa'o //
T03D3802:204b-40: 'di nyid du byon nas bsnyen bkur byas pa bcu
T03D3802:204b-41: ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen
T03D3802:204b-42: yod pa zhes bya ba na /
T03D3802:204b-43: de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes te /
T03D3802:204b-44: de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
T03D3802:204b-45: kun nas 'od zer zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas
T03D3802:204b-46: / 'od chen po 'jig rten du byung ba dang /
T03D3802:205a-1: gshegs pa'i sku byad lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas /
T03D3802:205a-2: 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen dris pas /
T03D3802:205a-3: 'di ni nub phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3802:205a-4: gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun
T03D3802:205a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
T03D3802:205a-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
T03D3802:205a-8: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes
T03D3802:205a-9: bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
T03D3802:205a-10: de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
T03D3802:205a-11: la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston
T03D3802:205a-13: byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer gyis bdag
T03D3802:205a-14: cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba'i phyir mchi'o
T03D3802:205a-15: zhes zhus pas / gnang ba ni khyod de'i dus
T03D3802:205a-16: la bab par shes na song shig la 'jig rten
T03D3802:205a-17: gyi khams der bag yod par spyod cig ces pa
T03D3802:205a-18: zhes zhus pas / la sogs pa'o // de nas
T03D3802:205a-19: shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod
T03D3802:205a-20: pa byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang
T03D3802:205a-21: zhes zhus pas / la sogs pa'o // mthu chen
T03D3802:205a-22: pos / bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa ga la
T03D3802:205a-24: bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mnga' 'am zhes gsol nas me tog gtor ro //
T03D3802:205a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog bzhes nas shar phyogs kyi logs su gtor ro //
T03D3802:205a-26: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams me tog padmas khebs par gyur nas /
T03D3802:205a-27: me tog de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
T03D3802:205a-28: mang po bzhugs shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T03D3802:205a-30: chos de sems can gang dag gis thos pa de
T03D3802:205a-31: dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub
T03D3802:205a-33: byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'am /
T03D3802:205a-34: khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs kyis rang rang gi dge
T03D3802:205a-35: ba'i rtsa bas mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu
T03D3802:205a-37: de bzhin du phyogs gzhan la bsgre'o //
T03D3802:205a-38: de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhi rin po che'i rang bzhin du gyur /
T03D3802:205a-39: me tog sel ma sna tshogs dang /
T03D3802:205a-41: spos kyi shing dang dpag bsam gyi shing rtse mo
T03D3802:205a-42: g-yur za ba sna tshogs dper na byang chub sems
T03D3802:205a-43: dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog kun nas rgyas
T03D3802:205a-45: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bzhugs pa'am /
T03D3802:205b-0: lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa bzhugs pa'i @205b 'jig rten gyi khams padma can bzhin du gyur to //
T03D3802:205b-1: gang dag yang dag ldan pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de /
T03D3802:205b-2: yum de gsum la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
T03D3802:205b-3: de yang gling gzhi rgyas par bka' stsal sdud par
T03D3802:205b-4: byed pa mchod brjod tshig le'ur bcas pa mdzad ces
T03D3802:205b-5: pa'o // gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o /
T03D3802:205b-7: // / mdo yon tan rin po che 'byung ba'i rkyen gleng bslang ba ni gnyis /
T03D3802:205b-8: ston pas gleng bslang ba dang /
T03D3802:205b-10: ston pas gleng bslang ba ni de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa /
T03D3802:205b-12: dge sbyor dang bram ze dang byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3802:205b-13: gzhon nur gyur pa mang po stong gsum gyi stong
T03D3802:205b-15: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
T03D3802:205b-16: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T03D3802:205b-17: po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon
T03D3802:205b-18: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dod pas shes rab
T03D3802:205b-19: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o
T03D3802:205b-20: zhes pa'o // 'khor gyis gleng bslang ba ni mdo don gzhung gnas skabs su ston to //
T03D3802:205b-22: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam //
T03D3802:205b-23: ston pas 'dis las bshad pa gang //
T03D3802:205b-24: gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin te //
T03D3802:205b-25: blo dang ldan pas mthong 'gyur phyir //
T03D3802:205b-26: chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi //
T03D3802:205b-27: mdo don dran pa la bzhag nas //
T03D3802:205b-28: bde blag tu ni rtogs 'gyur ba //
T03D3802:205b-29: bya ba rtsom pa'i dgos pa yin //
T03D3802:205b-31: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
T03D3802:205b-32: brjod bya ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o //
T03D3802:205b-33: dgos pa ni brjod bya rtogs pa'o //
T03D3802:205b-34: 'brel pa ni thabs dang thabs las byung ba'o //
T03D3802:205b-35: mngon rtogs mdzad pa'i dgos pa ni don de nyid
T03D3802:205b-36: 'phags pa thogs med la sogs pas bde blag tu
T03D3802:205b-37: rtogs pa'i thabs su mdzad pa'o //
T03D3802:205b-39: lus rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T03D3802:205b-40: yan lag rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T03D3802:205b-41: lus rnam par gzhag pa ni yum chen mo 'di
T03D3802:205b-42: la tshigs su bcad pa stong phrag brgya tham pa
T03D3802:205b-45: rnam grangs bcu gcig /'gres rkang brgya rtsa brgyad /
T03D3802:206a-3: bshad pa dkyus thog / gang zag nyams thog / chos nyid don thog dang gsum /
T03D3802:206a-5: skabs bu chung bdun cus rgyas par bshad /
T03D3802:206a-6: gzhung bye brag tu phye bas shin tu rgyas par bshad do //
T03D3802:206a-7: nye bar bsdu ba la gnyis /
T03D3802:206a-8: drug gis gnas skabs kyi bsdu ba /
T03D3802:206a-9: gsum gyis rtsa ba'i bsdu ba'o //
T03D3802:206a-11: shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la //
T03D3802:206a-12: dngos po brgyad kyis yang dag bshad //
T03D3802:206a-13: rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid //
T03D3802:206a-14: de nas thams cad shes pa nyid //
T03D3802:206a-15: rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa dang //
T03D3802:206a-16: rtse mor phyin dang mthar gyis pa //
T03D3802:206a-17: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
T03D3802:206a-18: chos kyi sku dang de rnam brgyad //
T03D3802:206a-20: de la lta sgom rnam pa bzhi /
T03D3802:206a-21: ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa'i chos rang bzhin
T03D3802:206a-22: med par rtogs pa ni rnam pa skye med do
T03D3802:206a-23: // 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi lam rnams
T03D3802:206a-24: rang bzhin med par rtogs pa ni lam skye med
T03D3802:206a-25: // do // gzhi phung po khams la sogs pa
T03D3802:206a-26: gdod ma nas rnag bzhin med par shes pa ni
T03D3802:206a-28: de gsum gyi gzhi dngos por sgro 'dogs pa dang /
T03D3802:206a-29: lam sems nyid du zhen pa dang /
T03D3802:206a-30: 'bras bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
T03D3802:206a-31: re ba'i sgro 'dogs gsum chod pas gtan la phebs
T03D3802:206a-33: thun sgom du de gsum rdzogs par sgom pa ni rnam kun mngon rdzogs so //
T03D3802:206a-34: de nyid rtogs pa la skyed byung nas 'bad rtsol
T03D3802:206a-35: mi dgos par sgom pa ni rtse mo mngon rtogs
T03D3802:206a-37: pha rol tu phyin pa drug rim gyis 'char ba ni mthar gyis pa /
T03D3802:206a-38: 'bral med du bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3802:206a-39: drug cig car du rdzogs pa ni skad cig ma
T03D3802:206a-40: gcig la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o //
T03D3802:206a-41: chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa ni bdag don gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T03D3802:206a-43: skabs bu chung bdun cu ni /
T03D3802:206a-44: sems bskyed ba dang gdams ngag dang //
T03D3802:206a-45: nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang //
T03D3802:206a-46: sgrub pa yi ni rten gyur pa //
T03D3802:206a-47: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang //
T03D3802:206a-48: dmigs pa dag dang ched dang ni //
T03D3802:206a-49: go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang //
T03D3802:206b-0: @206b tshogs ni nges par 'byung bcas rnams //
T03D3802:206b-1: thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid //
T03D3802:206b-2: mog mog por byed la sogs dang //
T03D3802:206b-3: slob ma bse ru'i lam gang dang /
T03D3802:206b-4: 'di dang gzhan pa'i phan yon gyis //
T03D3802:206b-5: phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam //
T03D3802:206b-6: byed pa dang ni mos pa dang //
T03D3802:206b-7: bstod dang bkur dang bsngags pa dang /
T03D3802:206b-8: bsngo dang rjes su yi rang dang //
T03D3802:206b-9: yid la byed pa bla med dag / sgrub dang shin tu dag pa zhes //
T03D3802:206b-10: bya ba 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam //
T03D3802:206b-11: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyi //
T03D3802:206b-12: lam shes nyid ni de 'drar bshad //
T03D3802:206b-13: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
T03D3802:206b-14: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang //
T03D3802:206b-15: thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang //
T03D3802:206b-16: thabs kyis ring ba ma yin nyid //
T03D3802:206b-17: mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag dang //
T03D3802:206b-18: sbyor dang de yi mnyam nyid dang //
T03D3802:206b-19: nyan thos la sogs mthong ba'i lam //
T03D3802:206b-21: rnam pa sbyor bar bcas rnams dang //
T03D3802:206b-22: yon tan skyon ni mtshan nyid bcas //
T03D3802:206b-23: mthar dang nges 'byed cha mthun dang //
T03D3802:206b-24: slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs //
T03D3802:206b-25: srid dang zhi ba mnyam nyid dang //
T03D3802:206b-26: zhing dag bla na med pa dang //
T03D3802:206b-27: 'di ni thabs mkhas bcas pa yin //
T03D3802:206b-28: de yis rtags dang rnam 'phel dang //
T03D3802:206b-29: brtan dang sems kun gnas pa dang //
T03D3802:206b-30: mthong zhes bya dang bsgom pa zhes //
T03D3802:206b-31: bya ba'i lam ni so so la //
T03D3802:206b-32: rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi //
T03D3802:206b-33: gnyen po rnam pa bzhi dang ni //
T03D3802:206b-34: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T03D3802:206b-35: log par sgrub dang bcas pa ni //
T03D3802:206b-36: rtse mo'i mngon rtogs mthar gyis pa //
T03D3802:206b-37: rnam gsum rnam bcu skad cig ma //
T03D3802:206b-38: gcig gis mngon rdzogs byang chub ba //
T03D3802:206b-39: mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi //
T03D3802:206b-40: ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas pa //
T03D3802:206b-41: de bzhin gzhan ni sprul sku dang //
T03D3802:206b-42: chos sku mdzad par bcas pa ste //
T03D3802:206b-43: rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod //
T03D3802:206b-44: ces pa ni bsdus pa'i don no //
T03D3802:206b-45: dgos pa'i don ni bshad pa bos bshad sla ba /
T03D3802:206b-46: nyan pa pos rtogs sla ba'o //
T03D3802:206b-47: tshig gi don ni gzhung dang sbyar ro //
T03D3802:206b-48: le'u 'di nas sh'a ri'i bu'i zhus lan gsum /
T03D3802:207a-0: zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po brkyang nas rab 'byor la chos ston par bskul @207a * //
T03D3802:207a-1: pa ni bsdus pa'i don to //
T03D3802:207a-2: zhus lan dang po ni sh'a ri'i bus sangs rgya bar 'dod pas zhus lan la sems bskyed //
T03D3802:207a-3: zhus lan gnyis pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:207a-4: phyin pa la ji ltar brtson gyi zhus lan la
T03D3802:207a-5: gdams ngag rang gi ngo bo //
T03D3802:207a-7: rten sangs rgyas dang chos la gdams pa'o //
T03D3802:207a-8: zhus lan gsum pa sh'a ri'i bus byang chub sems
T03D3802:207a-9: dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3802:207a-10: spyod pa de dag gang nas tshe 'phos nas 'dir
T03D3802:207a-11: 'ongs / 'di nas gar skye zhes zhus pa'i lan du dge 'dun nyi shu /
T03D3802:207a-16: mngon par shes pa drug la gdams pa'o //
T03D3802:207a-18: 'khor spyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3802:207a-19: la spyod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs
T03D3802:207a-20: nas / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhus pas /
T03D3802:207a-21: de'i lan 'thad pa dang bcas pa gsungs so //
T03D3802:207a-22: sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir //
T03D3802:207a-23: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod //
T03D3802:207a-24: ces pa ni sems can gyi don du rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa ste /
T03D3802:207a-26: de dang de ni mdo bzhin du //
T03D3802:207a-27: bsdus dang rgyas pa'i sgo nas brjod //
T03D3802:207a-29: de dang gzhan don de ni byang chub mdo bzhin ni bsdus pa nas smon 'jug gnyis su gsungs /
T03D3802:207a-30: mdo rgyas pa nas dgos pa'i sgo nas nyi shu rtsa gnyis gsungs pa ni /
T03D3802:207a-31: de yang sa gser zla ba me //
T03D3802:207a-32: gter dang rin chen 'byung gnas mtsho //
T03D3802:207a-33: rdo rje ri sman bshes gnyen dang //
T03D3802:207a-34: yid bzhin nor bu nyi ma glu //
T03D3802:207a-35: rgyal po mdzod dang lam po che //
T03D3802:207a-36: bzhon pa bkod ma'i chu dang ni //
T03D3802:207a-37: sgra snyan chu bo sprin rnams kyis //
T03D3802:207a-38: rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
T03D3802:207a-41: byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
T03D3802:207a-42: dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad
T03D3802:207a-43: du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas
T03D3802:207a-44: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson
T03D3802:207a-45: par bya'o // dge ba'i lo tog thams cad smin pas sa dang 'dra'o //
T03D3802:207a-46: bsam pa bzang po gser lta bu'i byang chub kyi
T03D3802:207a-47: sems ni sbyin pa dang gtong ba dang len pa
T03D3802:207a-48: mi dmigs pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:207b-0: pa @207b yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa la sogs
T03D3802:207b-1: pas yum la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3802:207b-2: nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bsam pa mi 'gyur bas gser dang 'dra'o //
T03D3802:207b-3: lhag pa'i bsam pa zla ba tshes pa lta bu'i
T03D3802:207b-4: byang chub kyi sems ni dran pa nye bar gzhag
T03D3802:207b-5: pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
T03D3802:207b-6: brgyad kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs
T03D3802:207b-7: su rdzogs par 'dod pas yum la bslab par bya'o
T03D3802:207b-8: // dge ba'i rtsa ba rdzogs par gong nas gong du 'phel bas zla ba tshes pa lta bu'o //
T03D3802:207b-9: sbyor ba me lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni
T03D3802:207b-10: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod
T03D3802:207b-11: pa dang / lam rdzogs par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3802:207b-12: gzhi thams cad shes par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3802:207b-13: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongs su spang bar 'dod pas yum la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3802:207b-14: mkhyen pa gsum gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi bud shing bsregs pas me lta bu'o //
T03D3802:207b-15: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gter lta bu'i
T03D3802:207b-16: byang chub kyi sems ni ser sna can rnams sbyin
T03D3802:207b-18: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:207b-19: phyin pa drug zil gyis mnan par 'dod pas yum
T03D3802:207b-21: sbyin pa mi zad pa gter chen po lta bu'o //
T03D3802:207b-22: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po
T03D3802:207b-23: che'i 'byung khungs bzang po lta bu'i byang chub kyi
T03D3802:207b-24: sems ni tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams tshul khrims la
T03D3802:207b-25: 'god par 'dod pas yum la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3802:207b-26: mngon mtho dang nges legs tshul khrims las 'byung bas rin po che'i 'byung khungs bzang po lta bu'o //
T03D3802:207b-27: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho lta
T03D3802:207b-28: bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni sems 'khrugs pa rnams
T03D3802:207b-29: bzod pa la 'god par 'dod pas yum la bslab
T03D3802:207b-30: par bya'o // bzod pa de zab pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o //
T03D3802:207b-31: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje
T03D3802:207b-32: lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni le lo can
T03D3802:207b-33: rnams brtson 'grus la dgod par 'dod pas yum la
T03D3802:207b-34: bslab par bya'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:207b-35: phyin pa de la mi dge bas dbye bar mi
T03D3802:207b-36: nus pas rdo rje pha lam lta bu'o //
T03D3802:207b-37: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ri'i rgyal
T03D3802:207b-38: po lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni sems g-yeng
T03D3802:207b-39: ba rnams bsam gtan la 'god par 'dod pas yum
T03D3802:208a-0: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa @208a * //
T03D3802:208a-1: mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pas mi sgul bas ri rab lta bu'o //
T03D3802:208a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sman bzang
T03D3802:208a-3: po lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni shes rab
T03D3802:208a-4: 'chal ba rnams shes rab la 'god par 'dod pa
T03D3802:208a-5: dang / nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi shes rab
T03D3802:208a-6: zil gyis mnan par 'dod pas yum la bslab par
T03D3802:208a-7: dang / bya'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:208a-8: phyin pa nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar
T03D3802:208a-10: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dge ba'i bshes
T03D3802:208a-11: gnyen lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni pha rol
T03D3802:208a-12: tu phyin pa drug thabs mkhas pas chung du yang
T03D3802:208a-13: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
T03D3802:208a-14: mi zad par 'dod pas yum la bslab par bya'o
T03D3802:208a-15: // thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yang
T03D3802:208a-16: dge ba'i grogs su 'char bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen
T03D3802:208a-17: // lta bu'o // smon lam gyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:208a-18: phyin pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che
T03D3802:208a-19: lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni tshe rabs thams
T03D3802:208a-20: cad du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong ba
T03D3802:208a-21: // lta bu'o // dang / sangs rgyas kyis dgongs
T03D3802:208a-22: shing myur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa rtogs par
T03D3802:208a-23: 'dod pas yum la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3802:208a-24: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung bas rin po che lta bu'o //
T03D3802:208a-25: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i snying
T03D3802:208a-26: po lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni bdag gis
T03D3802:208a-27: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad rdzogs par
T03D3802:208a-28: 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad dge ba
T03D3802:208a-29: la gzud par 'dod pas yum la bslab par bya'o
T03D3802:208a-30: 'dod pa dang / // stobs kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:208a-31: phyin pa gdul bya yongs su smin par byed pas
T03D3802:208a-33: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glu dbyangs
T03D3802:208a-34: snyan pa lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni phyogs
T03D3802:208a-35: bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems skyed pa gcig
T03D3802:208a-36: gis 'dod zhing yon tan brjod pa dang /
T03D3802:208a-37: sgra dbyangs gcig gis go bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3802:208a-38: stong pa bco brgyad shes par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3802:208a-39: de bzhin nyid la sogs pa'i chos thams cad kyi
T03D3802:208a-40: mtshan nyid khong du chud par 'dod pas yum la
T03D3802:208a-41: bslab par bya'o // ye shes kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:208a-42: phyin pa gdul bya rnams kyi dang ba 'dren par
T03D3802:208a-43: byed pa'i dri za'i glu dbyangs snyan pa lta bu'o
T03D3802:208a-44: bslab par bya'o // // mngon par shes pa rgyal
T03D3802:208b-0: po lta bu'i byang @208b chub kyi sems ni stong
T03D3802:208b-1: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shes
T03D3802:208b-2: bslab par bya'o // // par 'dod / chu thams cad sgra'i nyag ma gcig gis blang bar 'dod /
T03D3802:208b-3: me'i phung po thams cad zhi bar 'dod //
T03D3802:208b-4: rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad zhi bar 'dod /
T03D3802:208b-5: skyil mo krung gcig gis khengs par 'dod /
T03D3802:208b-6: skra nyag ma gcig gis sbams nas gzhan du 'phang bar 'dod pas yum la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3802:208b-7: mngon par shes pa dbang 'byor pa thob par 'dod
T03D3802:208b-8: pas 'di la mi mos par mi bya ste rgyal
T03D3802:208b-9: po dang 'dra'o // bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
T03D3802:208b-10: tshogs bod mdzod lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni
T03D3802:208b-11: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi
T03D3802:208b-12: bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i
T03D3802:208b-13: klung gi bye ma snyed na /
T03D3802:208b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
T03D3802:208b-15: dang bcas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
T03D3802:208b-16: ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad bsod snyoms
T03D3802:208b-17: gcig dang / me tog dang spos la sogs pa gcig gis khyed par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3802:208b-18: mi mnyam pa'i phung po lnga la dgod par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3802:208b-19: rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa la dgod par 'dod pas yum la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3802:208b-20: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs zad mi shes pas bang mdzod lta bu'o //
T03D3802:208b-21: lam po che lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni
T03D3802:208b-22: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan
T03D3802:208b-24: thob par 'dod pa dang dge ba la sogs pa
T03D3802:208b-25: dmigs pa bcu gcig gi pha rol tu phyin par
T03D3802:208b-26: 'dod pas yum la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3802:208b-27: byang chub kyi sems dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
T03D3802:208b-28: pa thams cad rjes su gshegs pas lam po che
T03D3802:208b-29: lta bu'o // zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang ldan
T03D3802:208b-30: pa bzhon pa lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni
T03D3802:208b-31: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon
T03D3802:208b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nang gi 'khor du 'gyur bar 'dod pas yum la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3802:208b-34: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang ldan pa ni gang
T03D3802:208b-35: du'ang mi ltung bar 'gro bas bzhon pa glang po
T03D3802:208b-36: che lta bu'o // gzungs dang so so yang dag
T03D3802:208b-37: par rig pa dang ldan pa bkod ma'i chu lta
T03D3802:208b-38: bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
T03D3802:208b-39: gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
T03D3802:209a-0: sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis @209a
T03D3802:209a-1: che lta bu'o // * // gsungs pa dang /
T03D3802:209a-2: gsung ba dang gsung bar 'gyur pa thams cad shes
T03D3802:209a-3: pa dang mi brjed par 'dod pas yum la bslab
T03D3802:209a-4: par bya'o // gzungs dang so so yang dag par
T03D3802:209a-5: rig pa dang ldan pa ni rung zhing mi zad
T03D3802:209a-6: pas na bkod ma'i chu lta bu'o //
T03D3802:209a-7: sgra snyan ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni
T03D3802:209a-8: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi
T03D3802:209a-10: mun pa mun nag smag gis khyab pa thams cad bsal bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3802:209a-11: dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra bsgrag par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3802:209a-12: yang dag pa'i lta ba la 'god par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3802:209a-13: brtson ra dang khri mon na 'khod pa thams cad
T03D3802:209a-14: bdag gi mthus rang dgar spyad par 'dod pas yum
T03D3802:209a-16: thar pa 'dod pa rnams la snyan pa sgrogs pa dga' ston lta bu'o //
T03D3802:209a-17: chu bo lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni phyogs
T03D3802:209a-18: bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dmus long
T03D3802:209a-19: gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis mig
T03D3802:209a-21: 'o na pa la sogs pas sgra thos pa la sogs par 'dod pas yum la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3802:209a-22: sems can gyi don rgyun mi 'chad par byed pas chu bo lta bu'o //
T03D3802:209a-23: sprin lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni nam zhig
T03D3802:209a-24: glang po che'i lta stangs kyis blta bar 'dod pa
T03D3802:209a-25: la sogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:209a-27: sems can gyi don char lta bur 'bab pas sprin lta bu'o //
T03D3802:209a-28: byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan ni /
T03D3802:209a-29: rgyal po chen po bzhi yang lhung bzed 'bul /
T03D3802:209a-30: lha rnams kyang dga' ba'i yid kyis 'bul /
T03D3802:209a-31: byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang 'dod pa la spyod
T03D3802:209a-32: pas ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i bar
T03D3802:209a-33: du gcod na / bla na med pa'i byang chub
T03D3802:209a-34: la lta ci smos snyam nas tshangs par spyad de
T03D3802:209a-35: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T03D3802:209a-36: chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
T03D3802:209a-37: zhus lan ni sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
T03D3802:209a-38: byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la brten pa mchis sam zhes zhus pa'i lan du /
T03D3802:209a-39: byang chub sems dpa' la la ni sems dang po
T03D3802:209a-40: bskyed pa nyid des gzhon nur gyur pa dag kyang
T03D3802:209a-41: yod do // la la shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3802:209a-42: tu phyin pa zab mo la rnam par spyod pas
T03D3802:209a-43: 'dod pa'i nyon mongs pa dang bral kyang sems can
T03D3802:209a-44: yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon
T03D3802:209a-45: tan la yongs su spyod pa yang ston to //
T03D3802:209b-0: nyams kyi @209b spyod pa ni med do //
T03D3802:209b-1: dpe sgyu ma mkhan lta bu'o //
T03D3802:209b-2: 'dod pa rang rgyud du spyod na 'dod pa rnams
T03D3802:209b-3: ni kun nas 'bar ba la sogs pa'i skyon yod
T03D3802:209b-4: do // gdams ngag ni don du gnyer bar bya
T03D3802:209b-5: ba'i don la tshegs chung dus don 'grub pa'i thabs
T03D3802:209b-6: do // kyi ngag go // da res ni sangs
T03D3802:209b-7: rgyas 'grub par byed pa'i thabs sla ba cig ston
T03D3802:209b-8: do // kyi ngag go // pa ste / sangs
T03D3802:209b-9: rgyas 'grub par byed pa la 'khor bar mi 'khyam
T03D3802:209b-10: do // kyi ngag go // pa ste / pa
T03D3802:209b-11: cig dgos / 'khor bar mi 'khyam pa la chags
T03D3802:209b-13: de la gzung 'dzin med pa cig dgos /
T03D3802:209b-14: de la dngos po 'khrul snang du shes pa cig
T03D3802:209b-15: dgos pas mkhas pa pandi ta'i lugs kyis sgro 'dogs
T03D3802:209b-16: phyi ru gcod / lta rtog phyi ru byed de /
T03D3802:209b-17: rtog bcas 'phrul pa yin par 'dod pas yul /
T03D3802:209b-18: bcad pas der 'dzin gyi shes pa ldog pa'o //
T03D3802:209b-19: ku su lu'i gdams ngag gi lugs kyis sgro 'dogs nang du gcod /
T03D3802:209b-20: lta rtog nang du byed de rtog med 'khrul pa yin pas rang ngo rang gis shes dgos /
T03D3802:209b-21: rtog pa cig rang la skye dgos /
T03D3802:209b-22: phyi rol gyi yul bkag pas mi khegs /
T03D3802:209b-23: bsgrubs pas mi 'grub dper na mig nad can gyi skra bshad dang 'dra /
T03D3802:209b-24: rang sems dag na mtshan ma rang sar grol lo //
T03D3802:209b-26: sgrub dang bden pa rnams dang ni //
T03D3802:209b-27: sangs rgyas la sogs dkon mchog gsum //
T03D3802:209b-28: ma zhen yongs su mi ngal dang //
T03D3802:209b-29: lam ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang //
T03D3802:209b-30: spyan lnga dang ni mngon shes dang /
T03D3802:209b-31: yon tan drug dang mthong lam dang //
T03D3802:209b-32: bsgom zhes bya ba gdams ngag ni //
T03D3802:209b-33: bcu yi bdag nyid shes par bya //
T03D3802:209b-34: zhes pa las rang gi ngo bo sgrub pa la gdams pa la gsum ste /
T03D3802:209b-35: snang srid 'khrul snang du bstan pa dang /
T03D3802:209b-36: de ltar shes pa'i shes rab de nyan thos la sogs pa las khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
T03D3802:209b-37: des na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3802:209b-38: snang srid 'khrul snang du bstan pa la lnga las /
T03D3802:209b-39: dang po ni sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
T03D3802:209b-40: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson bar bgyi /
T03D3802:209b-42: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3802:209b-45: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03D3802:209b-47: gzugs la sogs pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
T03D3802:210a-1: sogs pa stong pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:210a-3: stong pa yang gzhan ma yin zhes pas stong pa bzhi sbyor du bstan /
T03D3802:210a-4: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad ming tsam /
T03D3802:210a-5: gzugs la sogs pa thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'o //
T03D3802:210a-6: sgyu ma ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs /
T03D3802:210a-8: sgyu ma la skye ba med /
T03D3802:210a-10: kun nas nyon mongs pa med /
T03D3802:210a-12: chos so so'i ming de thams cad ni sgyu ma'i ming gis sgro btags pa ste /
T03D3802:210a-13: de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen no //
T03D3802:210a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis skye med 'gag med du rtogs te /
T03D3802:210a-15: byed pa'i skyes bu bcu gnyis zhes tha snyad du
T03D3802:210a-16: brjod kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T03D3802:210a-18: de bzhin du chos thams cad tha snyad du brjod
T03D3802:210a-19: kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs
T03D3802:210a-20: su med do // de ltar du shes pa'i shes
T03D3802:210a-21: rab des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
T03D3802:210a-22: gyi khams thams cad 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu dang
T03D3802:210a-23: su med do // / mood gal gyi bu lta
T03D3802:210a-24: bu sha stag gis 'dam bu'i tshal la sogs pa
T03D3802:210a-25: bzhin gang bar gyur pa yin /
T03D3802:210a-26: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:210a-27: phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab de'i brgyal sogs
T03D3802:210a-28: pa'i char yang nye bar mi phod do //
T03D3802:210a-32: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la nyan thos dang
T03D3802:210a-33: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang byang chub sems
T03D3802:210a-34: dpa'i shes rab la khyad par ci mchis lags /
T03D3802:210a-36: sh'a ri'i bu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
T03D3802:210a-37: sems can thams cad kyi don bya snyam mam /
T03D3802:210a-38: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad snyam mam /
T03D3802:210a-39: gsol pa de lta ma lags so //
T03D3802:210a-41: dper na srin bu mkhyen gyi 'od dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpes bstan to //
T03D3802:210a-42: byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i gnas su bstan pa
T03D3802:210a-43: ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa
T03D3802:210a-46: sems dang po bskyed pa nyid nas nyan thos chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i gnas yin no //
T03D3802:210a-48: byang chub sems dpa' yod na dge ba'i rtsa ba
T03D3802:210a-49: la sogs pa thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar
T03D3802:210b-0: 'gyur ro // dmigs ba bden pa @210b bzhi la gdams pa las /
T03D3802:210b-1: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la gdams pa ni /
T03D3802:210b-2: gsol pa ji ltar brtson na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bgyi /
T03D3802:210b-4: phung po khams skye mched bden pa /
T03D3802:210b-8: rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdun po 'di dag la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o //
T03D3802:210b-9: kun 'byung gi bden pa la gdams pa ni /
T03D3802:210b-10: de dag la brtson pa'i tshe brtson zhes bya ba'am /
T03D3802:210b-11: mi brtson zhes bya bar mi spyod de /
T03D3802:210b-16: gzugs ni tshor ba dang lhan cig rjes su rgyu
T03D3802:210b-17: zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
T03D3802:210b-20: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de la gzugs la sogs pa med /
T03D3802:210b-22: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03D3802:210b-25: 'gog pa la gdams pa ni de 'dra ba de
T03D3802:210b-26: la gzugs nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub kyi bar
T03D3802:210b-27: du med do // lam la gdams pa ni /
T03D3802:210b-28: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
T03D3802:210b-29: rnam thar sgo gsum dang sbyor bar yang mi byed 'byed par mi byed do //
T03D3802:210b-30: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar
T03D3802:210b-31: byung ba dang gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du
T03D3802:210b-32: sbyor bar mi byed par mi byed de /
T03D3802:210b-34: gang la dbye bar bya ba'am sbyar bar bya ba'i
T03D3802:210b-35: ngo bo nyid med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro
T03D3802:210b-36: // sangs rgyas dkon mchog la gdams pa ni dus
T03D3802:210b-37: gsum dang sangs rgyas su sbyor bar mi byed 'byed
T03D3802:210b-38: // par mi byed / gzu snas rnam mkhyen gyi
T03D3802:210b-39: bar dang sangs rgyas su sbyor bar mi byed 'byed
T03D3802:210b-41: chos dkon mchog la gdams pa ni /
T03D3802:210b-42: 'dres rkang bcu gnyis kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin
T03D3802:210b-43: med par bstan pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi
T03D3802:210b-44: bar du dngos po yod ces bya ba'am /
T03D3802:210b-45: dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
T03D3802:210b-46: rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya ba dang /
T03D3802:211a-0: skye 'gag dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par @211a * //
T03D3802:211a-4: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
T03D3802:211a-5: spyod ces bya ba dang mi spyod ces bya ba dang /
T03D3802:211a-6: gnyi ga dang gnyi ga ma yin pa zhes bya
T03D3802:211a-7: bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:211a-9: blo re ba med pa ni phar phyin nas yang
T03D3802:211a-10: dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi don du shes rab kyi
T03D3802:211a-11: pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
T03D3802:211a-12: mngon par shes pa drug gi don du shes rab
T03D3802:211a-13: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do
T03D3802:211a-14: // phan yon gyi chos bcu sangs rgyas rnams dgongs pa mdzad do //
T03D3802:211a-15: lha rnams bsrung ba mdzad do //
T03D3802:211a-16: gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang tshegs chung ngus mngon du 'gyur ro //
T03D3802:211a-17: gang la yang the tshom mi za zhing snang stong du mi 'byed do //
T03D3802:211a-18: dge 'dun dkon mchog la gdams pa ni /
T03D3802:211a-19: dbang po rtul dang rnon po dang //
T03D3802:211a-20: dad dang mthong thob rigs nas rigs //
T03D3802:211a-21: bar chad gcig par skyes nas dang //
T03D3802:211a-24: gzugs kyis 'dod chags bcom pa dang //
T03D3802:211a-25: mthong chos zhi lus mngon sum byed //
T03D3802:211a-26: bse ru dang ni nyi shu'o //
T03D3802:211a-29: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:211a-30: phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa de gang nas
T03D3802:211a-32: 'di nas tshe 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur /
T03D3802:211a-34: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas tshe 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa dbang po rnon po /
T03D3802:211a-35: dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'dir skyes pa dbang po 'bring /
T03D3802:211a-36: mi'i nang nas 'dir skyes pa dbang po tha ma'o //
T03D3802:211a-37: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas tshe 'phos nas
T03D3802:211a-38: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
T03D3802:211a-39: 'gro ste zhes pa ni mdo sbyor bstan no //
T03D3802:211a-40: dad pas mos pa'i dge 'dun ni bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog cing /
T03D3802:211a-41: pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad de /
T03D3802:211a-42: bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring por skye zhing /
T03D3802:211a-43: bsam gtan spangs nas mi'i nang du skyes te dbang po mi rno ba dag kyang yod do //
T03D3802:211a-45: byang chub kyi phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun la
T03D3802:211a-46: snyoms par 'jug cing snying rje chen po la 'jug
T03D3802:211a-47: ste / de dag gis mi skye zhing /
T03D3802:211b-0: sangs rgyas @211b bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa dag kyang yod do //
T03D3802:211b-1: mi'i rigs nas mi'i rigs su skye ba ni ting
T03D3802:211b-2: nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum la snyoms par 'jug kyang
T03D3802:211b-3: de dag gi dbang gis mi skye zhing rgyal rigs
T03D3802:211b-4: sam / bram ze'am khyim bdag gi rigs su skyes te /
T03D3802:211b-5: yang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ni ma yin gyi /
T03D3802:211b-6: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:211b-7: 'dod pa khams kyi lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye
T03D3802:211b-8: ba ni snyoms 'jug gsum la snyoms par 'jug cing
T03D3802:211b-9: / de dag gi dbang gis mi skye bar 'dod
T03D3802:211b-10: khams kyi lha'i rigs su gnas shing sems can yongs
T03D3802:211b-12: gzugs khams kyi rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni
T03D3802:211b-13: snyoms 'jug gsum la zhugs pa de shi 'phos nas
T03D3802:211b-14: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du tshangs pa brgya phrag bcu
T03D3802:211b-15: la dbang bsgyur / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
T03D3802:211b-16: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs par
T03D3802:211b-17: la dbang bsgyur / byed pa'o // skye ba gcig
T03D3802:211b-18: gis thogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig
T03D3802:211b-19: gis thogs pa dag snyoms 'jug gsum byang chub kyi
T03D3802:211b-20: phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun /
T03D3802:211b-21: rnam thar sgo gsum la snyoms par 'jug cing /
T03D3802:211b-22: de dag gi dbang gis mi skye bar sangs rgyas
T03D3802:211b-23: kyi zhing sna tshogs su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
T03D3802:211b-25: bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni
T03D3802:211b-26: byang chub sems dpa' mngon shes drug thob pa dag
T03D3802:211b-27: / khams gsum du mi skye bar sangs rgyas la
T03D3802:211b-28: rim gro byed / nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi
T03D3802:211b-29: sgra mi grag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong
T03D3802:211b-30: zhing tshe dpag tu med par dkon mchog gsum gyi
T03D3802:211b-31: sgra mi grag pa'i sar dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra
T03D3802:211b-32: sgrogs par byed pa dag kyang yod do //
T03D3802:211b-33: skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni
T03D3802:211b-34: sems dang po bskyed phyin chad bsam gtan bzhi nas
T03D3802:211b-35: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag thob
T03D3802:211b-36: nas khams gsum du mi skye bar de dag tu
T03D3802:211b-38: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas chos kyis 'khor lo bskor te /
T03D3802:211b-39: sems can smin par byed sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod do //
T03D3802:211b-40: mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i mya ngan
T03D3802:211b-41: las 'da' ba ni snyoms 'jug gsum gyis rnam par
T03D3802:212a-1: gtan dang po las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par
T03D3802:212a-2: 'jug pa la mnyam par 'jog go la sogs pa'o
T03D3802:212a-3: // mngon par 'du byed pa med par mya ngan
T03D3802:212a-4: las 'da' ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
T03D3802:212a-5: nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dang
T03D3802:212a-6: // / rnam thar sgo gsum thob kyang /
T03D3802:212a-7: rang rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa thob par
T03D3802:212a-8: mi byed par gzhan rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs
T03D3802:212a-9: pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do
T03D3802:212a-10: // 'phar ba dang po ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T03D3802:212a-11: 'phar ba gnyis pa ni dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang yod de /
T03D3802:212a-12: bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin par shes par bya'o //
T03D3802:212a-13: 'phar ba gsum pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag
T03D3802:212a-14: pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
T03D3802:212a-15: brgyad thob pa dag gzhan bden pa bzhi khong du
T03D3802:212a-16: chud par bya ba'i phyir spyod kyang rtogs par mi
T03D3802:212a-17: byed pa ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa'o //
T03D3802:212a-18: srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug par 'gro ba'i dge
T03D3802:212a-19: 'dun ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur
T03D3802:212a-20: byas nas / zas 'dod pa rnams la zas la sogs pas bstan /
T03D3802:212a-21: gzugs kyi 'dod chags bcom pa ni pha rol tu
T03D3802:212a-22: phyin pa drug la gnas shing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
T03D3802:212a-23: gyi khams su dong zhing sems can la chos ston
T03D3802:212a-24: // sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byed /
T03D3802:212a-25: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3802:212a-26: zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag mthong
T03D3802:212a-27: zhing de dag gi mtshan ma bzung ste /
T03D3802:212a-28: de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags
T03D3802:212a-29: pa bsgrubs shing byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig
T03D3802:212a-30: gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag
T03D3802:212a-31: kyang yod do ; / mthong ba'i chos la zhi
T03D3802:212a-32: ba lus kyi mngon sum du byed pa ni mi
T03D3802:212a-33: chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par
T03D3802:212a-35: bse ru lta bu'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems
T03D3802:212a-36: dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3802:212a-37: spyod pa'i tshe / kha na ma tho ba dang
T03D3802:212a-38: bcas pa'i lus ngag yid gsum gyi go mi 'byed
T03D3802:212a-39: spyod pa'i tshe / do // ma zhen pa la gdams pa ni gsol pa /
T03D3802:212a-40: lus ngag yid gsum kha na ma tho ba de gang lags /
T03D3802:212a-42: 'di ni lus ngag yid gsum yin te las ci rtsom snyam na /
T03D3802:212a-43: pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs skye
T03D3802:212a-44: bas kha nas ma tho ba dang zhes pa la
T03D3802:212b-0: sogs pa'o // @212b mi ngal ba la gdams pa ni gsol pa /
T03D3802:212b-1: byang chub kyi lam gang lags /
T03D3802:212b-3: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du rlom sems med pa ste /
T03D3802:212b-4: ye shes de dang ldan pa ni nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:212b-5: lam yongs su 'dzin pa'i ni gsol pa //
T03D3802:212b-6: de lta bur mi ltung ba'i ye shes de gang lags /
T03D3802:212b-8: ye shes de dang ldan pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig
T03D3802:212b-9: rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed
T03D3802:212b-11: chos nyan thos to nas bdag gzhan gyi 'du shes
T03D3802:212b-12: mi skyed pa dang rnam mkhyen par du 'du shes
T03D3802:212b-13: mi skyed pa'o // spyan lnga dang /
T03D3802:212b-14: mngon par shes pa drug la gdams pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3802:212b-15: mig lnga yongs su sbyong ba yod do //
T03D3802:212b-16: sha'i mig gi yul ni dngos po so sor nges pa'o //
T03D3802:212b-17: lha'i mig gi yul ni skye ba dang /
T03D3802:212b-19: shes rab kyi mig gi yul ni chos thams cad kyi spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid shes pa'o //
T03D3802:212b-20: chos kyi mig gis 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams shes pa'o //
T03D3802:212b-21: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
T03D3802:212b-22: mngon shes drug ni rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa'i mngon par shes pa /
T03D3802:212b-25: sngon gyi gnas shes pa dang /
T03D3802:212b-26: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
T03D3802:212b-27: zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa'o //
T03D3802:212b-28: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par
T03D3802:212b-29: bdag gis shes so zhes bya ba'i rlom sems med
T03D3802:212b-30: de / rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /
T03D3802:212b-31: ma skyes pa dang med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:212b-32: de dag gi yon tan drug las dang po ni
T03D3802:212b-33: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing mtha'
T03D3802:212b-34: las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa
T03D3802:212b-35: med pa'i sems kyis rnam pa thams cad la sbyong
T03D3802:212b-37: pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs drug byis pa la yod pa'i phyir /
T03D3802:212b-38: byang chub sems dpa' la sbyin pa dang ser sna la sogs pa'i rlom sems med de /
T03D3802:212b-39: ma skyes pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems thams cad gcod pa'o //
T03D3802:212b-40: yon tan gnyis pa ni nyan rang bas khyad par du 'phags te /
T03D3802:212b-41: mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud nas thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3802:213a-0: yon tan gsum pa ni mig gis gzugs yid du @213a * //
T03D3802:213a-1: mi 'ong ba la sogs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3802:213a-2: bzhi pa ni lung ston pa gsum ste /
T03D3802:213a-5: 'khor stong phrag drug cu lung bstan pa'o //
T03D3802:213a-6: lnga pa ni tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu
T03D3802:213a-7: la sogs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes
T03D3802:213a-8: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen
T03D3802:213a-13: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad do spyod /
T03D3802:213a-15: de'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs so //
T03D3802:213a-18: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob bo //
T03D3802:213a-21: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste /
T03D3802:213a-25: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang 'di la brten nas sangs rgyas so //
T03D3802:213a-28: de'i slad du sangs rgya bar 'tshal bas shes rab
T03D3802:213a-29: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi'o
T03D3802:213a-33: byang chub sems dpa' yod na /
T03D3802:213a-34: mngon mtho dang nges legs kyi bde legs thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:213a-35: yon tan drug ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste /
T03D3802:213a-36: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /
T03D3802:213a-37: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad do //
T03D3802:213a-38: phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3802:213a-39: kyis phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T03D3802:213a-40: rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos
T03D3802:213a-41: bltams pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes zhus pa dang
T03D3802:213a-42: / sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal pa /
T03D3802:213a-43: mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa bzhugs te /
T03D3802:213a-44: de'i zhal nas ljags bkram nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston pa'i mthu'o //
T03D3802:213a-45: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de lta
T03D3802:213a-46: lags na bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub
T03D3802:213a-47: pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams blta ba'i
T03D3802:213a-48: slad du mchi'o zhes bya ba nas phyogs bcu nas
T03D3802:213b-0: mchod rdzas mang po @213b khyer nas 'jig rten gyi
T03D3802:213b-2: sh'a ri'i bu'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o /
T03D3802:213b-4: // / le'u 'di nas mthong lam dang bsgom lam la gdams pa gnyis ston /
T03D3802:213b-5: mthong lam la gdams pa la zhus lan gnyis te /
T03D3802:213b-6: nges shes bskyed pa dang sgro 'dogs gcod pa'o //
T03D3802:213b-8: dngos kyi sgro 'dogs gcad pa dang /
T03D3802:213b-10: mthong ba'i sgro 'dogs gcad pa ste bsdus pa'i don to //
T03D3802:213b-11: de las dang po 'phros pa'i zhus lan dang /
T03D3802:213b-12: dgos pa'i mngon rtogs gnyis las zhus lan ni /
T03D3802:213b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab 'byor la bka' stsal ba /
T03D3802:213b-14: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams la shes rab
T03D3802:213b-15: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te nges
T03D3802:213b-16: par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi gtam bya bar
T03D3802:213b-17: spobs pa skyed cig / de la 'khor gyi rtog
T03D3802:213b-18: pa skyes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T03D3802:213b-20: lha'i bu rnams rab 'byor gyi spobs pa'i mthus ston nam /
T03D3802:213b-21: sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang /
T03D3802:213b-22: rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus de rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa shes nas /
T03D3802:213b-23: sh'a ri'i bu la smras pa /
T03D3802:213b-24: nyan thos rnams ci smra ba dang /
T03D3802:213b-25: ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus yin gyi nyan thos kyi yul ma yin /
T03D3802:213b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams la ston pa'o //
T03D3802:213b-27: dgos pa'i mngon rtogs ni rab 'byor gyis gsol ba /
T03D3802:213b-28: bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T03D3802:213b-29: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma dmigs ma 'tshal na /
T03D3802:213b-30: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dags lags /
T03D3802:213b-31: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
T03D3802:213b-32: gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi /
T03D3802:213b-34: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ni ming tsam ste /
T03D3802:213b-35: ming de ni nang na'ang med /
T03D3802:213b-36: phyi rol dang gnyis ka na med cing mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:213b-37: dper na byed pa'i skyes bu bcu gnyis dang /
T03D3802:213b-38: phung po khams skye mched nang gi mgo la sogs pa dang /
T03D3802:213b-39: phyi rol gyi rtsva dang shing la sogs pa dang /
T03D3802:213b-41: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:213b-42: phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas ni phung po
T03D3802:214a-0: khams skye mched / rtag pa dang bde ba dang @214a * //
T03D3802:214a-7: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03D3802:214a-11: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03D3802:214a-14: 'khor ba zhes bya ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
T03D3802:214a-15: de rnams kyi zlog zlar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
T03D3802:214a-17: byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3802:214a-18: chos de dag thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste /
T03D3802:214a-19: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3802:214a-20: chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du bsgom pa'i phyir shes
T03D3802:214a-21: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de
T03D3802:214a-22: / chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03D3802:214a-23: rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur bar thugs su chud de ming dang brda tsam du shes pas na /
T03D3802:214a-24: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la mngon par chags
T03D3802:214a-25: par mi 'gyur zhing sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi
T03D3802:214a-26: bar gyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
T03D3802:214a-27: byang chub sems dpa' skyon med cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su non par 'gyur ro //
T03D3802:214a-28: byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pas ming dang brdar khong du chud par bya'o //
T03D3802:214a-29: dngos po'i sgro 'dogs gcad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' ma 'tshal zhes zer ba ni /
T03D3802:214a-30: gzugs nas rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid la
T03D3802:214a-31: lnga lngar bsgre ba ni gzugs byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3802:214a-32: yin snyam ma / gzugs ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam /
T03D3802:214a-33: gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam /
T03D3802:214a-34: byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs yod snyam mam /
T03D3802:214a-35: gzugs med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam /
T03D3802:214a-37: bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so //
T03D3802:214a-39: byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs na /
T03D3802:214a-40: gzugs dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis /
T03D3802:214a-41: btags pa'i sgro 'dogs gcad pa ni byang chub sems
T03D3802:214a-42: dpa' zhes bya ba gang gi tshig bla dags lags
T03D3802:214a-43: zhes zer ba ni gzugs dang /
T03D3802:214a-44: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T03D3802:214b-0: @214b ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dags yin snyam mam /
T03D3802:214b-2: bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so //
T03D3802:214b-3: phung po lnga rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la
T03D3802:214b-4: sogs pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na
T03D3802:214b-5: byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis
T03D3802:214b-6: / mthong ba'i sgro 'dogs gcad pa ni byang chub
T03D3802:214b-7: sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na
T03D3802:214b-8: zhes zer ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi
T03D3802:214b-9: dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na /
T03D3802:214b-10: gzugs kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
T03D3802:214b-11: de bzhin du phung po dang /
T03D3802:214b-14: bsgom lam la gdams pa ni 'dus byas kyi dbyings
T03D3802:214b-15: kyis 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes
T03D3802:214b-17: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
T03D3802:214b-18: de skad ces bshad pa la mi 'jigs mi dang
T03D3802:214b-19: na de nyid gdams ngag yin te rjes su bstan
T03D3802:214b-20: pa'o // rab 'byor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o /
T03D3802:214b-23: // / nges 'byed ni mgon pos bde blag tu rtogs par
T03D3802:214b-24: bya ba'i phyir khyad par 'phags pa'i sgo nas mdor
T03D3802:214b-25: bstan pa / dmigs pa dang ni rnam pa dang //
T03D3802:214b-26: rgyu dang yongs su 'dzin pa yis //
T03D3802:214b-27: byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba yi //
T03D3802:214b-28: nyan thos bse ru lta bu dang //
T03D3802:214b-29: bcas pa dag las khyad par 'phags //
T03D3802:214b-30: rnam rtog bzhi po ldan rten pa //
T03D3802:214b-31: zhes pa ni gang las khyad par du 'phags pa na /
T03D3802:214b-32: nyan thos bse ru lta bu dang bcas pa las 'phags /
T03D3802:214b-33: gang gi khyad par du 'phags na byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa'i 'phags /
T03D3802:214b-34: gang khyad par du 'phags na rgyu dang ting nge 'dzin dang /
T03D3802:214b-35: rnam rtog dang yongs su 'dzin pa khyad par du 'phags ;
T03D3802:214b-36: tshul ji ltar 'phags na nyan thos kyi gang zag
T03D3802:214b-37: gi bdag med rtogs pa'i shes rab ni rang 'ba'
T03D3802:214b-38: zhig gi theg pa rtogs pa'i rgyu byed /
T03D3802:214b-39: byang chub sems dpa'i bdag med rtogs pa'i shes rab
T03D3802:214b-40: kyis theg pa gsum gyi rgyu byed pas 'phags so
T03D3802:214b-41: // nyan thos kyi dmigs rnams ni gzugs la sogs
T03D3802:214b-42: pa'i dngos po la dmigs nas rtog pa la sogs
T03D3802:214b-44: byang chub sems dpa'i dmigs rnams ni mi rtag pa
T03D3802:214b-45: dang sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa la dmigs nas
T03D3802:214b-46: / mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa la ma zhen pa'o //
T03D3802:215a-0: nyan thos la sogs pa'i rnam rtog ni nges 'byed @215a * //
T03D3802:215a-1: kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis spong ba'o //
T03D3802:215a-3: yod pa spang bar mi nus /
T03D3802:215a-4: med pa spang mi dgos pas so //
T03D3802:215a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam rtog ni rang bzhin yongs
T03D3802:215a-6: su shes pas rang la rnam rtog ye shes su
T03D3802:215a-8: gzhan don du rnam rtog brten pa'o ;
T03D3802:215a-9: / yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni
T03D3802:215a-10: nyan thos rangs rgyal gyi thabs shes rab ya gal
T03D3802:215a-11: la / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
T03D3802:215a-12: ni dam ba rnam pa gsum gyis zin pas khyad
T03D3802:215a-14: le'u 'di nas nges 'byed kyi rgyu dang /
T03D3802:215a-21: rab 'byor gyi gtam bcu gsum bsdus pa'i don no //
T03D3802:215a-22: shes pa'i rgyu ni de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
T03D3802:215a-23: phung po khams skye mched rten 'brel shes par 'tshal bas yum la bslab par bgyi'o//
T03D3802:215a-24: spong ba'i rgyu ni dug gsum /
T03D3802:215a-28: mi dge ba bcu spang bar 'chal bas yum la bslab par bgyi'o //
T03D3802:215a-29: rtogs pa'i rgyu ni dge ba bcu nas sangs rgyas
T03D3802:215a-30: kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang
T03D3802:215a-33: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon chen por mi ltung bar 'dod pas yum la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3802:215a-35: dmigs pa mi rtag la sogs pa //
T03D3802:215a-36: bden pa'i rten can de yi ni //
T03D3802:215a-37: rnam pa mngon zhen la sogs 'gog / theg pa gsum char thob pa'i rgyu //
T03D3802:215a-39: drod chung du'i dmigs rnams ni sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
T03D3802:215a-40: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ni gang lags /
T03D3802:215a-42: chos la sred pa gang yin /
T03D3802:215a-45: mi rtag sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mngon par chags
T03D3802:215a-46: shing gnas te 'du shes pa ni skyon no zhes
T03D3802:215a-47: pa ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'o //
T03D3802:215a-48: kun 'byung gi bden pa ni gal te gzugs 'di spang bar bya'o //
T03D3802:215a-50: yongs su shes par bya'o zhes mngon du bya'o //
T03D3802:215a-51: 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
T03D3802:215a-52: 'di ni ma phyin pa'o la sogs pa gnyis 'dzin
T03D3802:215a-53: la mngon par zhen cing gnas pa ni skyon no
T03D3802:215a-54: // 'gog pa ni skyon med pa gang zhe na /
T03D3802:215b-0: stong pa bco brgyad la bco brgyad du yang @215b dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'o //
T03D3802:215b-1: lam gyi bden pa ni de ltar bslab pa'i tshe /
T03D3802:215b-2: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du yongs su shes
T03D3802:215b-3: par bya ste des kyang rlom sems su mi bya
T03D3802:215b-5: sems de ni sems ma yin te /
T03D3802:215b-6: sems kyi rang bzhin ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T03D3802:215b-8: 'od gsal ba ni nyon mongs pa dang /
T03D3802:215b-9: nyan rang gi sems dang mi ldan ma bral ba'o //
T03D3802:215b-10: sems ma yin pa ni yod pa'am med pa ni
T03D3802:215b-11: mi dmigs shing 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog
T03D3802:215b-12: pa med pa'o // sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
T03D3802:215b-13: sems 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin pa de bzhin du //
T03D3802:215b-14: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar yang
T03D3802:215b-15: 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa
T03D3802:215b-16: yin nam / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
T03D3802:215b-18: theg pa gsum char thob pa'i rgyu ni sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
T03D3802:215b-20: khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las skyes pa'i sras chos kyi bgos skal la spyod pa /
T03D3802:215b-21: zang zing gi bgos skal la spyod pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:215b-22: khyod kyis ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du nyan
T03D3802:215b-23: rang dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa la slob par
T03D3802:215b-24: 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:215b-25: pa gzung bar bya'o la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:215b-26: skyon med pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
T03D3802:215b-28: // / le'u 'di nas drod 'bring dang chen po'o //
T03D3802:215b-30: bzod pa chung ngu dang 'bring ste bdun ston no //
T03D3802:215b-31: gzugs sogs skye 'jig gnas bral dang //
T03D3802:215b-32: gnas dang btags dang brjod du med //
T03D3802:215b-33: ces pa la sogs drod 'bring gi dmigs rnams ni
T03D3802:215b-34: gzugs la sogs pa skye 'jig med pas gang la'ang
T03D3802:215b-35: mi gnas pa ni bdag gis de ltar chos thams
T03D3802:215b-36: cad 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs ma 'tshal
T03D3802:215b-37: te / ming tsam du byang chub sems dpa' zhe'am /
T03D3802:215b-38: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes 'phel
T03D3802:215b-39: ba dang 'grib par bgyid na de nyid bdag gis
T03D3802:215b-41: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs nas yang dag pa'i mtha'i
T03D3802:215b-42: bar gyis 'phel ba dang 'grib pa yang dag par
T03D3802:215b-44: de rnams ma mthong na byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi /
T03D3802:215b-45: chos de rnams kyi ming de gnas pa ma mchis /
T03D3802:216a-3: ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na gnas pa la sogs pa ma mchis so //
T03D3802:216a-4: de'i phyir na gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
T03D3802:216a-5: drod chen po'i dmigs rnams ni brdar btags pa'i chos thams cad brjod du med pa ste /
T03D3802:216a-6: byang chub sems dpa' zhes chos gang la ming dang brdar bgyi ba dang btags pa de yang /
T03D3802:216a-7: btags pa tsam du bas shing brjod du med pa ste /
T03D3802:216a-8: dper na rmi lam zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
T03D3802:216a-9: de bzhin du sgyu ma la sogs pa dang de bzhin nyid la sogs pa dang /
T03D3802:216a-10: sbyin pa nas yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
T03D3802:216a-12: gzugs sogs mi gnas de dag ni //
T03D3802:216a-13: de yi ngo bo rang bzhin med //
T03D3802:216a-14: de dag gcig gi rang bzhin gcig / de la rtag sogs par mi gnas //
T03D3802:216a-15: de rnams de yi ngo bos stong //
T03D3802:216a-16: chos rnams mi 'dzin gang yin pa //
T03D3802:216a-17: de dag mtshan mar mi mthong phyir //
T03D3802:216a-18: thams cad dmigs su med par ni /
T03D3802:216a-19: shes rab kyis ni yongs rtogs pa'o //
T03D3802:216a-21: rtse mo chung ngu'i dmigs rnams ni phung po lnga rtag mi rtag dang /
T03D3802:216a-28: dben mi dben la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
T03D3802:216a-29: rtse mo chung dun gyi rnam pa /
T03D3802:216a-31: rtag mi rtag la sogs pa rang rang gi ngo bos stong ngo //
T03D3802:216a-32: stong pa gang yin pa de yang gzhan ma yin /
T03D3802:216a-33: gzugs la sogs pa'ang gzhan ma yin no //
T03D3802:216a-34: de bzhin du chos nyid de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la sbyor ro //
T03D3802:216a-35: rtse mo mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstan pa ni /
T03D3802:216a-36: byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3802:216a-37: thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang /
T03D3802:216a-38: bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs
T03D3802:216a-39: la gnas na gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la
T03D3802:216a-40: spyod kyi / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
T03D3802:216a-42: mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
T03D3802:216a-43: sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:216a-44: pas yongs su zin par mi 'gyur /
T03D3802:216a-45: rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
T03D3802:216b-0: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur @216b ro ;
T03D3802:216b-1: / de bzhin du kun la bsgre'o //
T03D3802:216b-3: chos rnams mi 'dzin pa ni de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T03D3802:216b-4: gzugs ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa ste /
T03D3802:216b-5: yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa
T03D3802:216b-6: de rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du gzugs ma
T03D3802:216b-7: lags // de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ro //
T03D3802:216b-8: ci nas kyang chos gang la yang yid rnam par mi 'gyur ba de ltar brtag par bya'o //
T03D3802:216b-9: chos thams cad ma bzung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
T03D3802:216b-10: dkyil 'khor de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3802:216b-12: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang stong pa bco brgyad yin pa'i phyir gzung du ma mchis so ;
T03D3802:216b-13: / rtse mo 'bring gi rnam pa thams cad mtshan
T03D3802:216b-14: mar mi mthong ba ni gzugs nas sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3802:216b-15: chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni mtshan
T03D3802:216b-16: ma'o // mtshan mar bzung ba cig lags na kun
T03D3802:216b-17: tu rgyu phreng ba can dad pa thob par mi
T03D3802:216b-18: ma'o // 'gyur ba las / kun tu rgyu des
T03D3802:216b-19: kyang nyi tshe ba'i shes rab kyis zhugs te phung
T03D3802:216b-21: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T03D3802:216b-22: ye shes de rtogs pa dang thob par bgyi ba'i
T03D3802:216b-23: tshul gyis phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su
T03D3802:216b-24: mi mthong // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T03D3802:216b-25: gzugs nas yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du phyi nang rnam pa bzhi'i tshul du mi mthong ngo //
T03D3802:216b-26: de la kun du rgyu mos par gyur nas /
T03D3802:216b-27: chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du /
T03D3802:216b-28: gzugs nas yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su
T03D3802:216b-29: mi 'dzin pa 'di na pha rol ma mchis pa'i
T03D3802:216b-31: rtse mo chen po'i dmigs pa shes rab kyis yongs
T03D3802:216b-32: su rtogs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:216b-34: gang gi / ci zhig / ci'i phyir na shes
T03D3802:216b-35: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brtag ste
T03D3802:216b-36: / mi dmigs na de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no //
T03D3802:216b-37: rtse mo chen po'i rnam pa thams cad dmigs su
T03D3802:216b-38: med pa ni stong pa bco brgyad yin pa'i phyir
T03D3802:216b-39: phung po rnams mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:216b-40: sangs rgyas dang byang chub kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:216b-41: de skad bshad pa la mi 'jigs na byang chub sems dpa' yum dang ma bral ba'o //
T03D3802:216b-43: gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid med nyid //
T03D3802:216b-44: de med pa yi ngo bo nyid //
T03D3802:216b-45: de dag skye med nges 'byung med //
T03D3802:216b-46: dag dang de yi mtshan ma med //
T03D3802:216b-47: de yi mtshan mar mi rten pas //
T03D3802:216b-48: mos min 'du shes med pa yin //
T03D3802:217a-1: dmigs pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi rang zhin ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
T03D3802:217a-2: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:217a-3: phyin pa la spyod pas yang dag pa ji lta
T03D3802:217a-4: ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
T03D3802:217a-5: bzod pa chung ngu'i rnam pa de med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
T03D3802:217a-6: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
T03D3802:217a-8: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
T03D3802:217a-9: bzod pa 'bring gi dmigs pa de dag skye med
T03D3802:217a-10: nges 'byung med ni gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste
T03D3802:217a-11: skye ba dang nges par 'byung ba med do //
T03D3802:217a-13: bzod pa 'bring gis rnam par dag pa ni lus
T03D3802:217a-14: ngag yongs su dag / nyon mongs yongs su dag
T03D3802:217a-15: / skye gnas yongs su dag cing nam yang sangs
T03D3802:217a-16: rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro
T03D3802:217a-17: // kun du rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o /
T03D3802:217a-19: // / le'u 'di nas bzod pa chen po dang chos mchog che 'bring gsum dang /
T03D3802:217a-20: gzung rtog gnyis ston pa las /
T03D3802:217a-21: bzod pa chen po'i dmigs rnams mtshan ma med cing mos pa med pa ston pa las /
T03D3802:217a-22: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3802:217a-28: dben mi dben la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de thabs mi mkhas pa'o //
T03D3802:217a-29: de bzhin du kun la bsgre'o //
T03D3802:217a-30: bdag ni yum la spyod pa dang mi spyod pa dang /
T03D3802:217a-31: gnyi ga dang gnyi ga ma yin pa la spyod
T03D3802:217a-32: na mtshan ma la spyod de thabs mi mkhas pa'o
T03D3802:217a-34: ci'i phyir na thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya /
T03D3802:217a-36: byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3802:217a-37: gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob
T03D3802:217a-38: pas gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de
T03D3802:217a-47: 'khrug pa las yongs su mi grol /
T03D3802:217a-48: sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi grol bar brjod do //
T03D3802:217a-50: de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am /
T03D3802:217a-51: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang mngon du bya ba'i
T03D3802:217a-52: skal ba med na bla na med pa yang dag
T03D3802:217a-53: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos /
T03D3802:217a-54: thabs mi mkhas par shes par bya'o //
T03D3802:217a-55: bzod pa chen po dngos ni sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
T03D3802:217b-0: ji ltar @217b thabs mkhas par shes par bya /
T03D3802:217b-2: byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3802:217b-3: gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang /
T03D3802:217b-10: dben pa dang mi dben pa dang /
T03D3802:217b-11: de bzhin du chos thams cad la mi spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3802:217b-12: thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o //
T03D3802:217b-14: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs
T03D3802:217b-15: ma yin zhes pa las snang stong bzhi sbyor dang
T03D3802:217b-16: / spyod mi spyod la sogs pa mu bzhi ru
T03D3802:217b-17: mi dmigs te chos thams cad dngos po med par
T03D3802:217b-18: khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:217b-19: chos mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ni /
T03D3802:217b-20: ting nge 'dzin de'i byed pa nyid //
T03D3802:217b-21: lung ston pa dang rlom pa zad //
T03D3802:217b-22: gsum po phan tshun ngo bo gcig / ting dzin rnam par mi rtog pa //
T03D3802:217b-23: de ltar nges 'byed cha mthun ni //
T03D3802:217b-24: chung dang 'bring dang chen po yin //
T03D3802:217b-25: zhes pas chos mchog chung ngu'i dmigs rnams ting nge
T03D3802:217b-26: 'dzin de'i byed pa ni chos thams cad skye ba
T03D3802:217b-27: med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de
T03D3802:217b-28: / ting nge 'dzin de rnam par spyod pa ni myur du bla na med par sangs rgya'o //
T03D3802:217b-29: skye ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin de nyid la
T03D3802:217b-30: dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T03D3802:217b-31: brgya nyi shu kun la sbyar ro //
T03D3802:217b-32: chos mchog 'bring gi dmigs rnams lung ston pa dang
T03D3802:217b-33: rlom pa zad pa ni de nas sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3802:217b-35: byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de dag gi
T03D3802:217b-36: spyod pa ni 'das pa dang da ltar gyi sangs
T03D3802:217b-37: rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan te /
T03D3802:217b-38: ting nge 'dzin dang bdag dang snyoms par 'jug pa la rlom sems med do //
T03D3802:217b-40: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:217b-41: phyin ma dang byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo gcig
T03D3802:217b-42: pa ni chos mchog chen po'i dmigs pa'o //
T03D3802:217b-43: de rnams la rnam par mi rtog pa ni rnam pa'o //
T03D3802:217b-44: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs zhes gnang ba ni /
T03D3802:217b-46: ngas nyon mongs med par bshad pa ni 'di yin no //
T03D3802:217b-47: byang chub sems dpas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3802:217b-48: nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar la
T03D3802:217b-50: de nas sh'a ri'i bus gsol ba /
T03D3802:217b-51: pha rol tu phyin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos
T03D3802:217b-52: ma 'dres pa'i bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
T03D3802:218a-0: de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs @218a * //
T03D3802:218a-1: pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no //
T03D3802:218a-2: ci'i phyir na mi dmigs pa lags zhes pa'i lan
T03D3802:218a-3: byed pa'i skyes bu bcu gnyis nas shin tu rnam
T03D3802:218a-4: par dag pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa mi dmigs
T03D3802:218a-5: so // rnam par dag pa gang lags zhes pa'i lan chos thams cad skye 'gag med /
T03D3802:218a-6: kun nas nyon mongs dang rnam byang med pa ni rnam par dag pa ste /
T03D3802:218a-7: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang la yang mi slob bo //
T03D3802:218a-8: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa las //
T03D3802:218a-9: gzhi dang de yi gnyen po yis //
T03D3802:218a-10: gzung bar rtog pa rnam pa gnyis //
T03D3802:218a-11: rmongs dang phung sogs bye brag gis //
T03D3802:218a-12: de ni so sor rnam pa dgu //
T03D3802:218a-14: rnam rtog gi go ba ni byis pa so so'i
T03D3802:218a-15: skye bo rnams 'khor 'das la zhen pa'i cha nas
T03D3802:218a-17: de gsal snang gi cha nas ni ye shes so //
T03D3802:218a-19: dang po ma rig pa'i rtog pa ni sh'a ri'i
T03D3802:218a-20: bus chos 'di dag byis pa so so'i skye bos
T03D3802:218a-21: ji ltar mngon par chags pa de ltar yod pa
T03D3802:218a-22: ma yin no // gnyis pa gzugs la sogs pa'i
T03D3802:218a-23: rtog pa ni gzugs nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
T03D3802:218a-24: 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la /
T03D3802:218a-25: stong pa bco brgyad kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no //
T03D3802:218a-26: gsum pa ming dang gzugs kyi rtog pa ni med
T03D3802:218a-27: pa la btags nas ming dang gzugs la mngon par
T03D3802:218a-28: zhen no // bzhi pa mtha' gnyis la chags pa'i
T03D3802:218a-29: rtog pa ni med pa la zhen cing rtag chad
T03D3802:218a-31: lnga pa mi shes pa'i rtog pa ni gzugs nas
T03D3802:218a-32: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
T03D3802:218a-34: drug pa nges par mi 'byung ba'i rtog pa ni
T03D3802:218a-35: de khams gsum dang nyan rang las nges par mi
T03D3802:218a-36: 'byung ba'o // bdun pa yid mi ches pa'i rtog
T03D3802:218a-37: pa ni gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar
T03D3802:218a-38: yid mi ches pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:218a-39: brgyad pa mi gnas pa'i rtog pa ni sbyin pa
T03D3802:218a-40: nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la gnas pa ma yin
T03D3802:218a-41: no // dgu pa mngon par zhen pa'i rtog pa
T03D3802:218a-42: ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la mngon par
T03D3802:218a-43: zhen pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3802:218a-45: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba'o //
T03D3802:218a-46: gnyen po'i rtog pa dgu las dang po ni sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
T03D3802:218a-47: ji ltar bslabs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:218a-48: phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
T03D3802:218a-49: pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags /
T03D3802:218b-0: lam ni pha rol tu phyin @218b pa rnams ni mi dmigs dang po'o //
T03D3802:218b-1: gnyis pa stong pa bco brgyad mi dmigs /
T03D3802:218b-2: gsum pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs /
T03D3802:218b-3: bzhi pa 'phags pa'i bden pa la sogs pa mi dmigs /
T03D3802:218b-4: lnga pa ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs kyi sgo dang mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs /
T03D3802:218b-5: drug pa stobs la sogs pa rnams mi dmigs /
T03D3802:218b-6: bdun pa thams cad shes pa mi dmigs /
T03D3802:218b-7: brgyad pa lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs //
T03D3802:218b-8: dgu pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs shing
T03D3802:218b-9: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab
T03D3802:218b-10: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing rnam
T03D3802:218b-11: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung
T03D3802:218b-12: bar 'gyur ro // mtshan ma med pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o /
T03D3802:218b-14: // / le'u 'di nas 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis /
T03D3802:218b-15: thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen /
T03D3802:218b-16: thabs mi mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sdig pa'i grogs po'o //
T03D3802:218b-18: bdag sogs rang dbang ngo bo dang //
T03D3802:218b-19: de bzhin phung sogs rten sgo nas //
T03D3802:218b-20: rdzas dang btags pa'i rten can gyi //
T03D3802:218b-23: gang zag gi rdzas kyi rtog pa ni /
T03D3802:218b-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab rgyu med pa'o //
T03D3802:218b-25: skyes bu btags pa'i rtog pa ni nges par 'byung rgyu med par ston no //
T03D3802:218b-26: rtog pa dang po ni rab 'byar gyis gsol pa la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /
T03D3802:218b-27: sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3802:218b-28: drug nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
T03D3802:218b-29: brgyad kyi bar la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad
T03D3802:218b-30: mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
T03D3802:218b-31: de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi /
T03D3802:218b-33: khyod la dri yis khyed kyis ji skad du bstan
T03D3802:218b-34: pa de ltar lan thob cig / rtog pa dang
T03D3802:218b-35: phung po'ang gzhan las sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam
T03D3802:218b-39: lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams /
T03D3802:218b-41: bdun pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyis chos rnams /
T03D3802:218b-42: brgyad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa la sogs pa /
T03D3802:218b-43: dgu pa stobs rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do //
T03D3802:218b-47: gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so //
T03D3802:219a-2: skyes bu btags pa'i rtog pa ni nges par 'byung
T03D3802:219a-3: rgyu med par ston pa las dang po'i sgyu ma
T03D3802:219a-5: gnyis pa sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs dang rnam byang yod dam /
T03D3802:219a-6: gsum pa skye 'gag med kun nas nyon mongs dang
T03D3802:219a-7: rnam byang med pa de nges par 'byung par 'gyur
T03D3802:219a-8: ram / bzhi pa nye bar len pa'i phung po
T03D3802:219a-9: lnga la byang chub sems dpa' zhes brda dang tha
T03D3802:219a-10: snyad du brtags pa yin nam /
T03D3802:219a-11: lnga pa brda dang tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar
T03D3802:219a-12: len pa'i phung po 'di skye ba dang 'gag par
T03D3802:219a-13: 'gyur ram / drug pa brda dang tha snyad med
T03D3802:219a-14: lus ngag yid gsum med skye 'gag med pa de
T03D3802:219a-15: gsum la bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3802:219a-16: nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
T03D3802:219a-17: bdun pa phung po lnga po 'di dag yum la bslabs shing nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
T03D3802:219a-18: brgyad pa 'khrul pa'i dpe brgyad lta bu'i phung po
T03D3802:219a-19: lnga po 'di dag yum la bslabs nas nges par
T03D3802:219a-21: dgu pa phung po lnga po ni 'khrul pa'i dpe
T03D3802:219a-22: brgyad lta bu ste yum la slob pa dang nges
T03D3802:219a-25: de skad bstan cing bshad na 'jigs shing dngang bar mi 'gyur lags sam /
T03D3802:219a-27: thabs mkhas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad na mi 'jigs /
T03D3802:219a-28: thabs mi mkhas pa'i sdig pa'i grogs po dang phrad zin na 'jigs so //
T03D3802:219a-29: sems mi 'gong ba nyid sogs kyis //
T03D3802:219a-30: ngo bo nyid med sogs ston byed //
T03D3802:219a-31: de yi mi mthun phyogs bor ba /
T03D3802:219a-32: rnam pa kun tu yongs 'dzin yin //
T03D3802:219a-34: thabs mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3802:219a-35: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis phung po lnga mi rtag pa dang /
T03D3802:219a-42: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
T03D3802:219a-43: dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste de mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:219a-44: de bzhin du phung po lnga chos dgu'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:219a-45: de nyid ldog pa'i sgo nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi thabs su ston pa las //
T03D3802:219a-46: phung po lnga chos dgu po mi dmigs pa'i tshul
T03D3802:219a-47: gyis chos ston pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
T03D3802:219a-48: phyin pa'o // phung po lnga chos dgu po mi
T03D3802:219a-49: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed cing nyan rang
T03D3802:219b-0: gi yid la byed @219b ba dang mi ldan pa
T03D3802:219b-1: ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3802:219b-2: phung po lnga chos dgu po de nyid mi dmigs
T03D3802:219b-3: pa'i tshul gyis yid la mos shing bzod pa ni
T03D3802:219b-4: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3802:219b-5: phung po lnga chos dgu po de nyid kyi mi
T03D3802:219b-6: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed cing rnam pa
T03D3802:219b-7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi gtong bar
T03D3802:219b-8: spro ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:219b-9: pa'o // phung po lnga chos dgu po de nyid
T03D3802:219b-10: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed cing nyan
T03D3802:219b-11: thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa
T03D3802:219b-13: de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su gyur
T03D3802:219b-14: pa mi dge ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa
T03D3802:219b-15: ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3802:219b-16: stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
T03D3802:219b-17: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
T03D3802:219b-18: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ro //
T03D3802:219b-19: thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
T03D3802:219b-20: dpa' ni bstan pa 'di thos na skrag par mi
T03D3802:219b-21: 'gyur ro // dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gzugs nas
T03D3802:219b-22: rnam mkhyen gyi bar du chos dgu mi dmigs pa'i
T03D3802:219b-23: tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston cing /
T03D3802:219b-24: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
T03D3802:219b-25: cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang
T03D3802:219b-26: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
T03D3802:219b-27: pa'o // dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin
T03D3802:219b-28: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni skrag par mi 'gyur
T03D3802:219b-29: pa'o // ro // thabs mi mkhas pa ni byang
T03D3802:219b-30: chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe pha rol
T03D3802:219b-31: tu phyin pa drug bsgom zhing dmigs te dmigs pa'i
T03D3802:219b-32: tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang /
T03D3802:219b-33: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed
T03D3802:219b-34: pa dang mi ldan pas gzugs stong pa bco brgyad
T03D3802:219b-35: do zhes bya bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
T03D3802:219b-36: rlom sems su byed pa dang /
T03D3802:219b-37: de bzhin du rnam mkhyen gyi bar la'o //
T03D3802:219b-38: des bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs shing dngang skrag go //
T03D3802:219b-39: sdig pa'i grogs po ni sangs rgyas kyi cha byad
T03D3802:219b-40: du byas pa drug / nyan thos pha ma mkhan
T03D3802:219b-41: slob dge slong gi cha byad dang bcus ston pa
T03D3802:219b-42: las / dang po dbyes 'dzud pa'i bdun ni pha
T03D3802:219b-43: rol tu phyin pa la mos pa med par byed
T03D3802:219b-44: las / de / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin /
T03D3802:219b-46: rang bzor byas pa ste 'di dag la nyan pa la sogs par mi bya'o //
T03D3802:220a-1: ni dgos pa med par bdud sdig can byang chub
T03D3802:220a-2: sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:220a-3: pas khyod la ci zhig bya zer ba'o //
T03D3802:220a-4: gsum pa kha 'dren pa'i bdud kyi las ni nyan rang gi gsung rab la snyan par brjod pa'o //
T03D3802:220a-5: bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa' sun 'byin pa'i bdud
T03D3802:220a-6: kyi las ni khyod la byang chub kyi sems cung
T03D3802:220a-7: zad kyang med na phyir mi ldog pa yang min
T03D3802:220a-8: pas sangs kyang mi rgya'o zhes zer ba'o //
T03D3802:220a-9: lnga pa stong pa ha nga po'i bdud kyi las ni mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong /
T03D3802:220a-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar ni bdag
T03D3802:220a-11: gam bdag gis stong na sangs rgyas pas khyod la
T03D3802:220a-12: ci zhig bya zhes zer ba'o //
T03D3802:220a-13: drug pa chad lha'i bdud kyi las ni phyogs bcu
T03D3802:220a-14: dang sangs rgyas nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3802:220a-15: kyis stong ste / sangs rgyas la sogs pa med ces zer ba'o //
T03D3802:220a-16: bdun pa ni bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha
T03D3802:220a-17: byad du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3802:220a-18: nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba zlog cing
