T03D3802:220a-19: / nyan rang gi yid la bya ba 'debs shing ston pa'o //
T03D3802:220a-20: brgyad pa mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi cha byad
T03D3802:220a-21: du byas shing byang chub sems kyi spyod pa bzlog
T03D3802:220a-22: nas nyan thos kyi byang chub mngon du gyis shig
T03D3802:220a-23: / thams cad mkhyen pas ci zhig bya zhes zer
T03D3802:220a-24: pa'o // dgu pa pha ma'i cha byad du byas
T03D3802:220a-25: nas 'khor ba na rkang lag dang mgo bo bcad
T03D3802:220a-26: pa med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi zhes pa'o
T03D3802:220a-27: pa'o // // bcu pa dge slong gi cha byad
T03D3802:220a-28: du byas nas gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du
T03D3802:220a-29: chos dgu dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa ni
T03D3802:220a-30: sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste /
T03D3802:220a-31: shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T03D3802:220a-32: sgyu ma lta bu'i le'u ste bdun pa'o /
T03D3802:220a-34: // / le'u 'di nas rigs can byang chub sems dpa' bcu gsum /
T03D3802:220a-35: dmigs pa bcu gcig / ched du bya ba gsum /
T03D3802:220a-36: go cha'i sgrub pa sum cu so drug /'jug pa'i sgrub pa dgu /
T03D3802:220a-37: tshogs kyi sgrub pa bcu tham pa ston no //
T03D3802:220a-38: de la rigs can byang chub sems dpa' ma grub par ston pa ni /
T03D3802:220a-39: rtog pa yi ni chos drug dang //
T03D3802:220a-40: gnyen po dang ni spong ba dang //
T03D3802:220a-41: de dag yongs su gtugs pa dang //
T03D3802:220a-42: shes rab snying brtser bcas pa dang //
T03D3802:220a-43: slob ma thun mong min nyid dang //
T03D3802:220a-44: gzhan gyi don gyi go rims dang //
T03D3802:220a-45: ye shes rtsol ba mi mnga' bar //
T03D3802:220a-46: 'jug pa'i rten la rigs shes bya //
T03D3802:220a-47: mdo spyir bstan pa ni rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
T03D3802:220a-48: byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang lags /
T03D3802:220b-2: byang chub dang sems can skye ba med pa'i phyir
T03D3802:220b-3: nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med pa de bzhin byang
T03D3802:220b-4: chub sems dpa' la yang tshig gi don med do
T03D3802:220b-5: // drod kyi byang chub sems dpa' ma grub pa'i
T03D3802:220b-6: dpe ni rmi lam la sogs pa 'khrul pa'i dpe
T03D3802:220b-7: brgyad la tshig gi gzhi'i don med dos bstan /
T03D3802:220b-8: rtse mo'i byang chub sems dpa' ma grub pa'i dpe
T03D3802:220b-9: ni chos nyid brgyad la tshig gi don med dos
T03D3802:220b-10: bstan / bzod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma grub
T03D3802:220b-11: pa'i dpe ni sgyu ma'i gzugs nas sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3802:220b-12: chos ma 'dres pa'i bar la tshig gi gzhi'i don
T03D3802:220b-13: bstan / med dos bstan / chos mchog gi byang
T03D3802:220b-14: chub sems dpa' ma grub pa'i dpe ni gzugs nas
T03D3802:220b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
T03D3802:220b-16: bar la tshig gi gzhi'i don med de /
T03D3802:220b-17: de rnams med pa'i phyir ros bstan /
T03D3802:220b-18: mthong lam gyi byang chub sems dpa' ma grub pa'i
T03D3802:220b-19: dpe ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la gzhi
T03D3802:220b-20: med dos bstan // bsgom lam gyi byang chub sems
T03D3802:220b-21: dpa' ma grub pa'i dpe ni gzugs la skye ba
T03D3802:220b-22: med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang kun nas
T03D3802:220b-23: nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang mngon
T03D3802:220b-24: par 'du bya ba dang 'byung ba med pa la
T03D3802:220b-25: med dos bstan // gnas med do // de bzhin
T03D3802:220b-26: du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du
T03D3802:220b-27: gnas med gzhi med dos bstan /
T03D3802:220b-28: gnyen po'i byang chub sems dpa' ma grub pa'i dpe
T03D3802:220b-29: ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba la mun pa'i
T03D3802:220b-30: gnas med do // spong ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3802:220b-31: ma grub pa'i dpe ni bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i
T03D3802:220b-32: tshe 'du byed kyi gnas med do //
T03D3802:220b-33: de dag yongs su gtugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3802:220b-34: ma grub pa'i dpe ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
T03D3802:220b-35: rgyas la tshul khrims la sogs pa 'chal pa lnga'i
T03D3802:220b-36: gnas med do ; / shes rab snying brtser bcas
T03D3802:220b-37: pa ma grub pa'i dpe ni dper na nyi ma
T03D3802:220b-38: dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med do //
T03D3802:220b-39: slob ma thun mong ma yin pa'i dpe ni gza' dang skar ma'i 'od la gzhi med do //
T03D3802:220b-40: gzhan gyi don gyi go rims kyi byang chub sems
T03D3802:220b-41: dpa' ma grub pa'i / dpe ni lha rnams kyi
T03D3802:220b-43: ye shes rtsol ba mi mnga' bar 'jug pa'i rten
T03D3802:220b-44: ni dper na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas 'od
T03D3802:220b-46: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la tshig gi gzhi'i don med do //
T03D3802:220b-48: byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de thams cad
T03D3802:220b-49: ldan pa yang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o
T03D3802:221a-1: sems dpa' chos thams cad la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3802:221a-3: chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir //
T03D3802:221a-4: rigs ni tha dad rung ma yin //
T03D3802:221a-5: brten pa'i chos kyi bye brag gis //
T03D3802:221a-6: de yi dbye ba yongs su brjod //
T03D3802:221a-7: ces pa ni chos nyid la dbye ba med /
T03D3802:221a-8: chos nyid rtogs pa'i gang zag la phye ba yin /
T03D3802:221a-9: dper na bum pa la dbye ba med kyang bum
T03D3802:221a-10: par blugs pa'i chu dang 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi
T03D3802:221a-11: la sogs pas / chu'i bum pa dang sbrang rtsi'i bum pa zhes pa lta bu'o //
T03D3802:221a-12: dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad de //
T03D3802:221a-13: de yang dge la sogs pa yin //
T03D3802:221a-14: 'jig rten pa yi rtog pa dang //
T03D3802:221a-16: zag bcas zag pa med chos dang //
T03D3802:221a-18: slob ma thun mong chos rnams dang //
T03D3802:221a-19: gang dag thub pa'i thun mong min //
T03D3802:221a-20: zhes pa ni kun rdzob tu bstan gyi /
T03D3802:221a-21: byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pas mi dmigs pa la bslab bo //
T03D3802:221a-23: sems can kun mchog nyid sems dang //
T03D3802:221a-24: spong dang rtogs dang gsum po la //
T03D3802:221a-25: chen po gsum gyi rang byung gi / ched du bya ba nyid ces brjod //
T03D3802:221a-26: chen po lnga ldan gyi bshad pa la sems dpa' che ba ni rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
T03D3802:221a-27: ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi /
T03D3802:221a-29: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed pas sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //
T03D3802:221a-30: phung po nges pa ni 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams so //
T03D3802:221a-31: rdo rje lta bu'i sems dang /
T03D3802:221a-34: phan bde bskyed pa'i sems dang /
T03D3802:221a-35: chos la dga' ba'i sems kyis sems can gyi don
T03D3802:221a-36: byed pa'i phyir na sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o
T03D3802:221a-37: // spong ba che ba ni sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
T03D3802:221a-38: bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la spobs pa skye'o //
T03D3802:221a-40: spobs pa skyed cig / sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T03D3802:221a-41: po zhes bgyi ba ni byed pa'i skyes bu bcu
T03D3802:221a-43: rtag chad dang gzugs nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T03D3802:221a-44: kyi bar du lta ba spong ba'i phyir na sems
T03D3802:221a-47: ci'i phyir na gzugs nas sangs rgyas byang chub kyi bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
T03D3802:221a-49: gzugs nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du dmigs
T03D3802:221b-0: shing @221b dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do
T03D3802:221b-1: // de'i phyir na gzugs nas mya ngan las 'das
T03D3802:221b-2: pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin pas de
T03D3802:221b-3: spong ba'i phyir chos ston no //
T03D3802:221b-4: rtogs pa che ba ni rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
T03D3802:221b-5: sems dpa' chen po'i don de la bdag kyang spro ba skye'o //
T03D3802:221b-9: byang chub kyi sems nyan thos dang rang rgyal dang
T03D3802:221b-10: thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de la'ang chags pa
T03D3802:221b-11: med pa'i phyir na sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o
T03D3802:221b-13: sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang skye ba'am /
T03D3802:221b-15: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam byang du yang
T03D3802:221b-16: dag par rjes su mi mthong bas gzugs nas rnam
T03D3802:221b-17: mkhyen gyi bar la chags par mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3802:221b-18: sgrub pa rnam pa bzhi las go cha'i sgrub pa ni /
T03D3802:221b-19: sbyin pa la sogs rnam drug gis //
T03D3802:221b-20: de dag so sor bsdus pa dang /
T03D3802:221b-21: go cha'i sgrub pa gang yin pa //
T03D3802:221b-22: drug tshan drug gis yang dag bshad //
T03D3802:221b-24: byams ma'i bu gang pos gsol pa /
T03D3802:221b-25: bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang sems dpa' chen po'i don
T03D3802:221b-26: de la spobs par bgyid lags so gyis shig /
T03D3802:221b-27: gsol ba / go cha chen po bgos pa theg
T03D3802:221b-28: pa chen po la gnas shing 'jug pa'i phyir na
T03D3802:221b-29: sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o //
T03D3802:221b-31: gang po ji tsam gyis na go cha chen po bgos zhes bya /
T03D3802:221b-33: sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha gyon pa ma yin //
T03D3802:221b-34: sems can 'di snyed cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par bya'o /
T03D3802:221b-35: 'di snyed ni dgod par mi bya'o snyam du go cha gyon pa ma yin /
T03D3802:221b-36: sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don du go cha gyon pa'o ;
T03D3802:221b-37: /'di lta ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3802:221b-38: dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong zhe na
T03D3802:221b-39: // ma chags par gtong ba'i cha nas sbyin pa /
T03D3802:221b-40: de nyid mi dge ba dang ma 'dres par gtong bas na tshul khrims /
T03D3802:221b-41: de nyid mi mthun pa med par gtong ba'i cha
T03D3802:221b-42: nas bzod pa dge ba la spro ba'i cha nas
T03D3802:221b-44: ma yengs pa'i cha nas bsam gtan /
T03D3802:221b-45: sbyin pa gtong ba dang len pa la sogs pa sgyu ma lta bur shes pas shes rab po //
T03D3802:221b-46: de ltar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug ka la drug drug tu bsgre'o //
T03D3802:221b-47: de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de
T03D3802:222a-0: bzhin gshegs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' la @222a
T03D3802:222a-1: * // ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
T03D3802:222a-3: bsam gtan gzugs med sbyin sogs dang //
T03D3802:222a-4: lam dang byams la sogs pa dang //
T03D3802:222a-5: dmigs pa med par ldan pa dang //
T03D3802:222a-6: 'khor gsum rnam par dag nyid dang //
T03D3802:222a-7: ched du bya dang mngon shes drug / rnam kun mkhyen pa'i tshul la ni //
T03D3802:222a-8: 'jug pa'i sgrub pa theg chen la //
T03D3802:222a-9: 'dzeg pa yin par shes par bya //
T03D3802:222a-12: gang po theg pa chen po la ji ltar 'jug dris pa'i lan ni /
T03D3802:222a-13: theg pa chen po la bsam gtan gzugs med kyi 'jug pa ni /
T03D3802:222a-14: bsam gtan bzhi tshad med pa bzhi gzugs med pa'i
T03D3802:222a-15: snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ro myong bar mi byed
T03D3802:222a-17: sbyin sogs kyi 'jug pa ni snyoms 'jug gsum gtang ba'i cha nas sbyin pa /
T03D3802:222a-18: srung ba'i cha nas tshul khrims /
T03D3802:222a-19: mi bzod pa med pa'i cha nas bzod pa /
T03D3802:222a-20: mi gtong ba'i cha nas brtson 'grus //
T03D3802:222a-21: yid la byed pa gzhan gyi go skabs mi 'byed pa'i cha nas bsam gtan /
T03D3802:222a-22: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i cha nas shes rab
T03D3802:222a-23: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ched
T03D3802:222a-25: lam gyi 'jug pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:222a-26: byams pa la sogs pa'i 'jug pa ni tshad med
T03D3802:222a-27: pa bzhi 'dzin chags med pa'i cha nas sbyin pa
T03D3802:222a-28: / mi dge ba srung bas tshul khrims /
T03D3802:222a-32: tshad med kyi shes rab po //
T03D3802:222a-33: mi dmigs pa'i 'jug pa ni stong pa bco brgyad shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
T03D3802:222a-34: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa dang /
T03D3802:222a-35: khams gsum dang dmigs pa bcu gcig shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no //
T03D3802:222a-36: 'khor gsum rnam par dag pa'i 'jug pa ni pha
T03D3802:222a-37: rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas kyang gsum po
T03D3802:222a-39: ched du bya ba'i 'jug pa ni rnam pa thams
T03D3802:222a-40: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres
T03D3802:222a-41: pas pha rol tu phyin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3802:222a-42: chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du rnam par mi sgom
T03D3802:222a-43: pa'i tshul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo
T03D3802:222a-44: // gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba ni ming tsam du zad do //
T03D3802:222a-45: de bzhin du sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir
T03D3802:222b-0: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba @222b ni ming tsam du
T03D3802:222b-1: zad do zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
T03D3802:222b-2: mngon par shes pa'i 'jug pa ni bdag gis mngon
T03D3802:222b-3: par shes pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin
T03D3802:222b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:222b-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'jug pa ni bdag
T03D3802:222b-7: gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi
T03D3802:222b-9: sems can tshad med pa'i don byed kyang mngon par ma zhen pa'o //
T03D3802:222b-11: brtse dang sbyin la sogs pa drug / zhi gnas lhag mthong bcas pa dang //
T03D3802:222b-12: zung du 'brel pa'i lam gang dang //
T03D3802:222b-13: thabs la mkhas pa gang yin dang //
T03D3802:222b-14: ye shes dang ni bsod nams dang //
T03D3802:222b-15: lam dang gzungs dang sa bcu dang //
T03D3802:222b-16: gnyen po tshogs kyi sgrub pa yi //
T03D3802:222b-17: rim pa yin par shes par bya //
T03D3802:222b-18: de la snying rje'i tshogs la sogs pa bcu ni rab 'byor gyis gsol ba /
T03D3802:222b-19: byams ma'i bu gang pos go cha chen po bgos pa dang /
T03D3802:222b-20: theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod na /
T03D3802:222b-21: bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po ni ji ltar gyon lags /
T03D3802:222b-23: byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T03D3802:222b-24: nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dang
T03D3802:222b-25: / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas stong
T03D3802:222b-26: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
T03D3802:222b-28: stong gsum na sems can dmyal ba ji snyed yod
T03D3802:222b-29: pa de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas la phyag
T03D3802:222b-31: des de thos nas dga' bde thob ste de nas rnam par ldang ngo //
T03D3802:222b-32: langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa der skye'o //
T03D3802:222b-33: de bzhin du byol song dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten sbyar ro //
T03D3802:222b-34: sbyin pa'i tshogs ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:222b-35: pa la gnas shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
T03D3802:222b-36: sprul nas / zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed do la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:222b-37: tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni ched du bsam ste 'khor
T03D3802:222b-38: los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug la gnas nas sems can
T03D3802:222b-39: rnams dge ba bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
T03D3802:222b-41: bzod pa'i tshogs ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas
T03D3802:222b-42: nye bar bzung ste brgya la sems can thams cad
T03D3802:222b-43: bdag la rdo dang dbyug pas rdeg cing la sogs
T03D3802:223a-0: pa'o // brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @223a * //
T03D3802:223a-1: nyid kyi sems bskyed pas lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul zhing 'jog go //
T03D3802:223a-2: bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni chos nyid la gnas shing chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed do //
T03D3802:223a-3: shes rab kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'god cing /
T03D3802:223a-4: chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag pa'am kun nas nyon mongs dang rnam byang ngam /
T03D3802:223a-5: tshu rol lam pha rol mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:223a-6: zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan
T03D3802:223a-7: po'am mchan bu cig gis lam gyi bzhi mdor skye
T03D3802:223a-8: bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang
T03D3802:223a-9: po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul nas des ngan song
T03D3802:223a-10: gsum nas bton nas phar phyin drug la bskul zhing
T03D3802:223a-11: btsud na de ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan
T03D3802:223a-12: po'am mchan bu des sems can gang yang ngan song
T03D3802:223a-13: nas bton nas phar phyin la bkod pa yod dam
T03D3802:223a-14: / bkod pa med pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun la sbyar ro //
T03D3802:223a-15: lhag mthong gi tshogs ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong
T03D3802:223a-16: pa nyid kyi slad du go cha ma mchis pa
T03D3802:223a-18: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T03D3802:223a-19: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo //
T03D3802:223a-20: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dang /
T03D3802:223a-21: byang chub sems dpa' dang go chas stong pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:223a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T03D3802:223a-23: go cha de ni ma byas rnam par ma byas mngon par ma byas so //
T03D3802:223a-25: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ni mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed de /
T03D3802:223a-26: byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:223a-27: zung du 'brel pa'i tshogs ni rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
T03D3802:223a-28: phung po lnga ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
T03D3802:223a-30: ma bcings ma grol ba'i phung po lnga po de gang yin /
T03D3802:223a-32: 'khrul pa'i dpe brgyad kyi phung po lnga dang /
T03D3802:223a-33: dus gsum gyi phung po lnga ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste /
T03D3802:223a-34: med pa dang dben pa dang ma skyes pa dang /
T03D3802:223a-35: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
T03D3802:223a-36: de bzhin du kun la sbyar ro //
T03D3802:223a-37: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o /
T03D3802:223a-39: // / le'u 'di nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug / stong pa bco brgyad /
T03D3802:223a-40: ting nge 'dzin brgya nyi shu ston te /
T03D3802:223a-42: bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po ni gang lags /
T03D3802:223b-0: theg pa chen po la ji ltar yang dag par @223b zhugs par rig par bgyi /
T03D3802:223b-1: theg pa chen po de gang nas nges par 'byung ba lags /
T03D3802:223b-2: theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags /
T03D3802:223b-3: theg pa des su zhig nges par 'byung zhes zhu ba lnga phul ba'i lan /
T03D3802:223b-4: theg pa chen po ni lngas bstan pa las /
T03D3802:223b-5: thabs kyi tshogs ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan pa'o //
T03D3802:223b-6: ye shes kyi tshogs ni stong pa bco brgyad las /
T03D3802:223b-7: nang stong pa nyid ni nang gi chos mig la
T03D3802:223b-8: sogs pa drug ther zug kyang ma yin 'jig pa'i
T03D3802:223b-9: chos can kyang ma yin pa'i phyir mig mig gis
T03D3802:223b-10: stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T03D3802:223b-11: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:223b-12: de bzhin du kun la bsgre'o //
T03D3802:223b-13: bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ting nge 'dzin brgya nyi shu'i rkang grangs dang bshad pa'o //
T03D3802:223b-14: ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o /
T03D3802:223b-16: // / le'u 'di nas lam gyi tshogs dang /
T03D3802:223b-18: lam gyi tshogs ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun /
T03D3802:223b-20: shes pa bcu gcig / dbang po gsum /
T03D3802:223b-29: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi /
T03D3802:223b-30: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad /
T03D3802:223b-31: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen po'o //
T03D3802:223b-32: gzugs kyi tshogs ni yi ge la 'jug pa sum cu so drug dang /
T03D3802:223b-34: de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen po'o //
T03D3802:223b-35: lam dang gzugs kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o /
T03D3802:223b-37: // / le'u 'di nas sa'i tshogs dang gnyen po'i tshogs ston /
T03D3802:223b-39: yongs su sbyong ba rnam bcu yis //
T03D3802:223b-40: sa ni dang po thob 'gyur te //
T03D3802:223b-41: bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang //
T03D3802:223b-42: sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid //
T03D3802:223b-43: gtong dang bshes gnyen bsten pa dang //

T03D3802:230a-12: chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa de ci la
T03D3802:230a-14: rab 'byor gyis mgo bsgres pa dang /
T03D3802:230a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa cil gnas /
T03D3802:230a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs nas 'dus byas dang
T03D3802:230a-18: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar la mi gnas
T03D3802:230a-19: te / de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma gzigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:230a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar
T03D3802:230a-22: la gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang
T03D3802:230a-23: ma yin / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3802:230a-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
T03D3802:230a-25: pa yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa
T03D3802:230a-27: nyan thos pas rang rgyal gyi lam khyad par du 'phags pa ni mgon pos /
T03D3802:230a-28: rang 'byung bdag nyid rtogs pa'i phyir //
T03D3802:230a-29: gzhan gyis bstan yang mi dgos la //
T03D3802:230a-30: bse ru lta bu'i ye shes ni //
T03D3802:230a-31: zab pa nyid du brjod pa yin //
T03D3802:230a-32: gang dang gang don gang gang la //
T03D3802:230a-33: ji lta ji ltar nyan de ltar //
T03D3802:230a-34: de la sgra med kyang don te //
T03D3802:230a-35: de ni de lta de ltar snang //
T03D3802:230a-36: rang rgyal gyi lam dngos ni /
T03D3802:230a-37: gzung bar rtog pa nyams phyir dang //
T03D3802:230a-38: 'dzin pa ma spangs phyir dang ni ;
T03D3802:230a-39: / rten gyi bse ru lta bu'i lam //
T03D3802:230a-40: yang dag bsdus par shes par bya //
T03D3802:230a-41: zhes pa la sgro 'dogs rnam pa drug bcad nas //
T03D3802:230a-42: me tog gi dpes mtshon nas ma skyes pa la
T03D3802:230a-43: rang bzhin med par bstan pa ni des na 'dod
T03D3802:230a-44: pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'di
T03D3802:230a-46: gnod sbyin rnams kyi rang rang gi skad dang rang
T03D3802:230a-47: rang gi tshig gis bstan na shes par rung gi
T03D3802:230a-48: // rab 'byor gyi de lta ma yin no snyam mo //
T03D3802:230a-50: sus kyang smras pa med thos pa med pa ni sus kyang shes par mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3802:230a-51: de cis na dus gsum gyi byang chub thams cad
T03D3802:230a-52: ni tshig dang yi ge thams cad las 'das pa'o
T03D3802:230b-0: // sgro 'dogs @230b gcod pa ni rmi lam na
T03D3802:230b-1: rmi lam gyis ston pas rmi lam gyi 'khor bzhi
T03D3802:230b-2: la sogs pa la chos bstan na /
T03D3802:230b-3: sus kyang smras pa dang thos pa dang shes pa yod snyam mam /
T03D3802:230b-4: lha'i bus smras pa med do //
T03D3802:230b-8: sus kyang smras pa dang thos pa med do //
T03D3802:230b-9: zab pa'i sgro 'dogs bcad pa ni lha'i bus smras pa /
T03D3802:230b-10: rab 'byor ni zab pa bas kyang zab pa ston /
T03D3802:230b-11: phra ba bas kyang phra ba la 'jug go zhes pa la rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
T03D3802:230b-12: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
T03D3802:230b-13: de rnams kyi rang bzhin yang zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:230b-14: btags pa'i sgro 'dogs bcad pa ni lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
T03D3802:230b-15: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du btags pa tsam yang med do snyam pa dang /
T03D3802:230b-18: dus gsum gyi byang chub ni tshig dang yi ge thams cad las gdags su med pa ste /
T03D3802:230b-19: dus gsum gyi 'phags pa thams cad kyis bzod pa 'di la mi brtan du mi rung ngo //
T03D3802:230b-20: brgya byin le'u ste bco lnga pa'o /
T03D3802:230b-22: // / le'u 'di nas gro 'dogs rnam pa gsum gcod pa la /
T03D3802:230b-23: nyan pa'i sgro 'dogs bcad pa ni lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
T03D3802:230b-24: gnas brtan rab 'byor la chos nyan pa ji lta bu cig gis mnyan snyam pa dang /
T03D3802:230b-26: gzugs nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
T03D3802:230b-27: de bas ches lhag pa'i chos cig yod na myang
T03D3802:230b-28: de yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o
T03D3802:230b-29: // rtog pa'i sgro 'dogs gcod pa ni sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa 'khor spyis smras pa dang /
T03D3802:230b-30: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar
T03D3802:230b-31: zab pa 'di ltar phra ba 'di ltar rtogs par
T03D3802:230b-32: dka' ba rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa 'di
T03D3802:230b-33: sus rtogs / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
T03D3802:230b-34: byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa dang /
T03D3802:230b-36: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa dang /
T03D3802:230b-37: dge ba'i shes gnyen gyis zin pa bzhis 'di ltar du rtogs te /
T03D3802:230b-38: gzugs stong pa nyid do zhes nas ;
T03D3802:230b-39: rnam byang gi bar stong pa dang mi stong pa /
T03D3802:230b-40: mtshan ma yod med smon pa yod med skye 'gag / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam byang //
T03D3802:230b-41: zhe ba dang ma zhe ba /
T03D3802:230b-42: gzugs dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
T03D3802:230b-43: dben pa gzugs so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
T03D3802:230b-44: bstan pa'i sgro 'dogs bcad pa ni /
T03D3802:231a-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su gzung bar bya
T03D3802:231a-3: ba'i phyir phar phyin nas 'jig rten thams cad las
T03D3802:231a-4: khyad par du 'phags pa'i bar ma bstan nam /
T03D3802:231a-6: de rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan gyi ;
T03D3802:231a-7: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma bstan /
T03D3802:231a-8: stong pa bco brgyad yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3802:231a-9: byed pa'i skyes bu bcu gnyis nas rnam byang gi bar du mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:231a-10: rtogs par dka' ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o /
T03D3802:231a-12: // / le'u 'di nas me tog gi dpe'i sgo nas ma skyes pa dang /
T03D3802:231a-13: rang rgyal gyi nges 'byed bzhi dang /
T03D3802:231a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i mthong lam gyi phan yon dgu'o //
T03D3802:231a-15: de nas brgya byin gyi sems la rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char phab na /
T03D3802:231a-16: yum dang sangs rgyas dang rab 'byor la me tog
T03D3802:231a-17: gi char chen po phab nas mchod pa phul ba
T03D3802:231a-18: dang / des na rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te /
T03D3802:231a-19: me tog 'di dag ni sngon chad lha dang mi'i yul du ma mthong //
T03D3802:231a-20: chu dang thang las skyes pa yang ma yin snyam pa dang /
T03D3802:231a-22: me tog 'di dag 'ba' zhig nges par ma byung bar zad dam /
T03D3802:231a-23: gzugs la sogs pa'ang de lta bu yin /
T03D3802:231a-25: me tog 'di dag ma byung ba de bzhin du chos thams cad ma byung ma skyes pa'o //
T03D3802:231a-27: btags pa chos nyid mi 'gal bar //
T03D3802:231a-28: ston pa'i rnam pa drod gyur pa //
T03D3802:231a-29: zhes pa la bka' stsal ba /
T03D3802:231a-30: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ni btags pa tsam mo //
T03D3802:231a-31: de ni chos nyid de rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to //
T03D3802:231a-32: chos thams cad btags pa tsam du slob pa de
T03D3802:231a-33: ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la mi slob
T03D3802:231a-34: ste / stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
T03D3802:231a-36: rtse mor gyur pa gzugs la sogs //
T03D3802:231a-37: 'grib pa med la sogs pas phye //
T03D3802:231a-38: zhes pa ni rnam mkhyen gyi bar du 'phel bar
T03D3802:231a-39: bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob
T03D3802:231a-40: bo // bzod pa ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
T03D3802:231a-41: gzugs sogs mi 'dzin phyir bzod pa //
T03D3802:231a-42: zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa yongs su mi 'dzin no //
T03D3802:231a-44: gzugs sogs skye ba med sogs kyi //
T03D3802:231a-45: rnam pa can ni chos kyi mchog / ces pa
T03D3802:231a-46: ni byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe
T03D3802:231b-0: / gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du skye ba dang 'gag @231b pa dang /
T03D3802:231b-1: blang ba dang dor ba dang /
T03D3802:231b-2: kun nas nyon mongs dang rnam byang snon pa dang 'bring ba /
T03D3802:231b-3: 'phel ba dang 'grib pa mi mthong ste /
T03D3802:231b-4: gzugs gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis med cing mi dmigs /
T03D3802:231b-5: de ltar na nges par mi 'byung ba'i tshul gyis yum la bslabs shing /
T03D3802:231b-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro ;
T03D3802:231b-7: / byang chub sems dpa'i mthong lam ni /
T03D3802:231b-8: chos shes rjes su shes bzod dang //
T03D3802:231b-9: shes pa'i skad cig rnam bzhi ni //
T03D3802:231b-10: lam shes nyid la mthong ba'i lam //
T03D3802:231b-11: phan yon bcas pa 'di bshad do //
T03D3802:231b-12: de bzhin nyid dang sangs rgyas dag / phan tshun rten pa rten med phyir //
T03D3802:231b-13: rnam grangs khas mi len pa dang ;
T03D3802:231b-14: / zhes pa ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sh'a ri'i bu la /
T03D3802:231b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas btsal bar bya /
T03D3802:231b-16: dris pa'i lan rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar
T03D3802:231b-17: bya'o zhes zer ba de khyod kyi mthu dang byin
T03D3802:231b-21: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs so //
T03D3802:231b-23: chos thams cad stong pa byin gyi rlabs med pa la /
T03D3802:231b-24: de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid las gung na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:231b-26: byin gyi rlabs med pa'i chos nyid dang de bzhin
T03D3802:231b-27: nyid las gung na de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs
T03D3802:231b-28: so // gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs /
T03D3802:231b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
T03D3802:231b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs
T03D3802:231b-31: la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma
T03D3802:231b-32: yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
T03D3802:231b-33: mthong lam gyi chos shes ni kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bur shes pa'o //
T03D3802:231b-34: rjes shes ni don dam pa spros pa dang bral bar shes pa'o //
T03D3802:231b-35: bzod pa gnyis ni ji snyed pa shes pa dang /
T03D3802:231b-36: ji lta ba shes pa ste /
T03D3802:231b-38: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas
T03D3802:231b-39: btsal zer pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar
T03D3802:231b-41: de las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya ste /
T03D3802:231b-42: de cis na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gang yin pa dang /
T03D3802:231b-43: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
T03D3802:231b-44: btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag ni ldan
T03D3802:231b-45: pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin
T03D3802:232a-1: de cis na gzugs dang gzugs kyi chos nyid dang /
T03D3802:232a-2: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med /
T03D3802:232a-3: de las gzhan na yang med /
T03D3802:232a-4: de bzhin du rnam mkhyen gyi bar ro //
T03D3802:232a-5: mthong lam gyi phan yon ni //
T03D3802:232a-6: chen po tshad med nyid bcas dang //
T03D3802:232a-7: dpag med mtha' ni med pa dang //
T03D3802:232a-8: zhes pa ni brgya byin gyis gsol pa /
T03D3802:232a-9: yum 'di ni chen po lags so //
T03D3802:232a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas /
T03D3802:232a-15: sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du thob po 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro ;
T03D3802:232a-16: / gzugs sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs pas /
T03D3802:232a-17: gzugs che ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa che ba'o //
T03D3802:232a-19: nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs tshad med pa
T03D3802:232a-20: ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad
T03D3802:232a-22: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar dang /
T03D3802:232a-24: sems can gyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes
T03D3802:232a-25: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas so
T03D3802:232a-26: // der gnas gzugs la sogs pa la //
T03D3802:232a-27: sangs rgyas nyid du nges 'dzin dang //
T03D3802:232a-28: blang med dor ba med sogs dang //
T03D3802:232a-29: byams la sogs dang stong nyid dang //
T03D3802:232a-30: sangs rgyas nyid ni thob pa dang //
T03D3802:232a-31: rnam par byang kun yongs bsdus dang /
T03D3802:232a-32: nyam nga ba dang nad kun sel //
T03D3802:232a-33: mya ngan las 'das 'dzin zhi nyid dang //
T03D3802:232a-34: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsrung la sogs //
T03D3802:232a-35: srog mi gcod pa la sogs pa //
T03D3802:232a-36: rnam pa kun mkhyen tshul la ni //
T03D3802:232a-37: bdag nyid gnas te sems can dag /
T03D3802:232a-38: 'god dang sbyin pa la sogs pa //
T03D3802:232a-39: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba /
T03D3802:232a-40: lam shes nyid kyi skad cig ma //
T03D3802:232a-42: bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba lnga ni /
T03D3802:232a-43: lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol ba /
T03D3802:232a-44: 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis yum gyi don de ltar bstan pa ni ngo mtshar che'o //
T03D3802:232a-45: bdag cag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pha rol tu
T03D3802:232a-46: phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag sangs rgyas
T03D3802:232a-49: zung cig phar phyin la sogs pa las gung na de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:232a-50: rigs kyi bu phar phyin la sogs pa la slob
T03D3802:232a-51: pa de sangs rgyas yin te ngas sngon rgyal po'i
T03D3802:232a-52: 'khor padma can gyi tshong dus na phar phyin dang
T03D3802:232a-53: ma bral ba de'i tshe nga lung bstan no //
T03D3802:232b-0: blang dor @232b med ni lha'i bu rnams yum la spyod pa'i tshe //
T03D3802:232b-1: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du mi len mi 'dor ba ngo mtshar lags so //
T03D3802:232b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'khor thams cad tshogs pa mkhyen nas dbang por btsugs te /
T03D3802:232b-3: rigs kyi bu yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa byed
T03D3802:232b-4: pa ni bdud dang bdud la sogs pas glags mi
T03D3802:232b-5: rnyed / des na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar stong pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs pas /
T03D3802:232b-6: stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed do //
T03D3802:232b-7: byams pa la sogs pa ni rigs kyi bu yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa byed pa la /
T03D3802:232b-8: bdud la sogs pas glags mi rnyed /
T03D3802:232b-9: des tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir /
T03D3802:232b-10: stong nyid ni rigs kyi bu yum 'dzin pa la
T03D3802:232b-11: sogs pa byed pa gang na gnas kyang glags mi
T03D3802:232b-12: thod de / des stong pa bco brgyad rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:232b-13: sangs rgyas nyid thob pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi lha'i bus /
T03D3802:232b-14: rigs kyi bu yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa byed
T03D3802:232b-15: pa la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa la sogs pa
T03D3802:232b-17: byang chub sems dpa' yod na /
T03D3802:232b-18: dge la bcu ba sogs pa mngon mtho dang nges legs thob pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:232b-19: mtha' yas lung ston gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o /
T03D3802:232b-21: // / le'u 'di nas mthong lam gyi phan yon bdun /
T03D3802:232b-22: bsgom lam gyi byed pa gnyis te dgu'o //
T03D3802:232b-23: rnam par byang kun yongs bsdus ni //
T03D3802:232b-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir /
T03D3802:232b-25: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar 'dus so //
T03D3802:232b-26: nyam nga sel ba ni rigs kyi bu yum la
T03D3802:232b-27: spyod pa la bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa'i
T03D3802:232b-28: tshe ba thams cad zhi ba'o //
T03D3802:232b-29: nad kun sel ba na yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa la rtsi ma gi'i dpes nad zhi ba'o //
T03D3802:232b-30: mya ngan las 'das par 'dzin pa zhi pa ni
T03D3802:232b-31: yum 'dzin pa la sogs pas mi dge ba thams
T03D3802:232b-32: cad gzugs su 'dzin pa nas mya ngan las 'das
T03D3802:232b-33: pa'i bar du 'dzin pa nye bar zhi bar byed
T03D3802:232b-34: de 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no //
T03D3802:232b-35: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsrung la sogs pa ni yum
T03D3802:232b-36: 'dzin pa la sogs pa la sangs rgyas rnams bsrung
T03D3802:232b-37: ba dang bskyab pa la sogs pa mdzad do//
T03D3802:232b-38: srog mi gcod pa la sogs pa ni rigs kyi
T03D3802:232b-39: bu yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni bdag kyang
T03D3802:232b-41: gzhan yang mi dge ba bcu spong du 'jug / de bzhin dge ba la sogs so //
T03D3802:232b-42: sbyin pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
T03D3802:232b-43: bsngo ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug bla
T03D3802:232b-44: na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba'o //
T03D3802:233a-1: lam gyi byed pa drug ni /
T03D3802:233a-2: kun nas zhi dang thams cad nas //
T03D3802:233a-3: bdud dang nyon mongs las rgyal dang //
T03D3802:233a-4: gnod pas brdzib [?] med nyid dang /
T03D3802:233a-5: byang chub dang ni rten mchod nyid //
T03D3802:233a-7: kun nas zhi dang thams cad nas 'dud pa'i byed
T03D3802:233a-8: pa gnyis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phar phyin
T03D3802:233a-10: bdag nyid kyi khengs pa zhi nas bdag la gzhan 'dud pa'o //
T03D3802:233a-11: yon tan yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o /
T03D3802:233a-13: // / le'u 'di nas bsgom lam gyi byed pa bzhi /
T03D3802:233a-14: rang don du mos pa dgu'o //
T03D3802:233a-15: nyon mongs pa las rgyal ba ni bdag dang gzhan
T03D3802:233a-16: gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyi mda' la sogs pa
T03D3802:233a-17: yang bcom / de cis na yun ring por pha
T03D3802:233a-18: rol tu phyin pa la spyad nas nyon mongs pa'i
T03D3802:233a-19: yang bcom / rgyud med pa'o // gnod pas mi
T03D3802:233a-20: brdzi ba ni yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni
T03D3802:233a-21: bdag la sogs pa la gnod par bya bar yang
T03D3802:233a-22: yang bcom / rgyud med pa'o // mi sems /
T03D3802:233a-23: mtshon la sogs pas kyang 'phog par mi 'gyur ro
T03D3802:233a-24: yang bcom / rgyud med pa'o // mi sems /
T03D3802:233a-25: // byang chub pa'i byed pa ni yum 'dzin pa
T03D3802:233a-26: la sogs pa bla na med pa'i byang chub thob
T03D3802:233a-27: yang bcom / rgyud med pa'o // mi sems /
T03D3802:233a-28: // pa'o // mchod rten ni yum bcangs nas mchod
T03D3802:233a-29: pa byed pa'i sa de mchod rten du 'gyur ba'o
T03D3802:233a-30: yang bcom / rgyud med pa'o // mi sems / // pa'o // // mos pa ni /
T03D3802:233a-31: mos pas rang gi don dang ni //
T03D3802:233a-32: gnyi ga'i don dang gzhan don dang //
T03D3802:233a-33: de yang rnam gsum de ltar na //
T03D3802:233a-34: chung dang 'bring dang chen po ste //
T03D3802:233a-35: chung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba yis //
T03D3802:233a-36: re re la yang de bzhin te //
T03D3802:233a-37: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du 'dod //
T03D3802:233a-39: rang gi don du mos pa chung ngu'i chung ngu ni /
T03D3802:233a-41: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las yum la spyad pa dang /
T03D3802:233a-42: mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byas pa bsod nams gang che lags zhus pa'i lan bka' stsal pa /
T03D3802:233a-43: khyod nyid la dri yis lan thob cig / dus
T03D3802:233a-44: gsum du sangs rgyas pa de mchod rten la bsnyen
T03D3802:233a-48: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na /
T03D3802:233a-49: yum la spyad pas sangs rgyas lags so ;
T03D3802:233a-51: de bzhin de yum yod na dge ba bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dang /
T03D3802:233a-52: mngon mtho dang nges legs thob pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:233a-53: chung ngu'i 'bring ni brgya byin gyis gsol ba /
T03D3802:233a-54: yum la phan yon de tsam bdog pa mi rnams kyis ma 'tshal lags sam //
T03D3802:233b-0: 'dzam @233b bu'i gling nas sangs rgyas la shin tu
T03D3802:233b-1: brten pa nyung zhes pa nas shes rab kyi pha
T03D3802:233b-2: rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni shin tu
T03D3802:233b-3: nyung ste / 'khor ba nas 'khor bas sangs rgyas la sogs pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:233b-4: chung ngu'i chen po ni mchod rten gcig /'bring gi
T03D3802:233b-5: chung ngu 'dzam bu'i gling 'bring gi 'bring gling bzhi
T03D3802:233b-6: / 'bring gi chen po stong spyi phud chen po'i chung ngu stong gnyis bar ma /
T03D3802:233b-7: chen po'i 'bring stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i chen
T03D3802:233b-8: po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs
T03D3802:233b-9: pa'i sku gdung rin po che sna bdun las byas
T03D3802:233b-10: pa / 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa /
T03D3802:233b-11: byed pa po mang ba de na gnas pa'i sems
T03D3802:233b-12: can re res kyang dus bskal pa'am de las lhag
T03D3802:233b-13: par lan gsum gsum du mchod pa dang bkur sti
T03D3802:233b-14: la sogs pa byas ba bas yum 'dzin pa la
T03D3802:233b-16: mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o /
T03D3802:233b-18: // / le'u 'di nas gnyis ka'i don du mos pa
T03D3802:233b-19: chung ngu'i chung ngu la bcu yod pa las drug
T03D3802:233b-20: go // yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa yod na dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi nub ba dang /
T03D3802:233b-21: brgya byin gyis kha ton byas pas lha ma yin rnams zlog pa'i dgra bzlog dang /
T03D3802:233b-22: lha'i bu shi nas ngan song du skye ba la
T03D3802:233b-23: rnam lam du bsgrags pas ngan song las thar nas
T03D3802:233b-25: rim gyis byang chub thob pas ngan song sbyong ba dang /
T03D3802:233b-26: yum 'di rig sngags chen mo dang 'dra bar mya ngan dang sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba dang /
T03D3802:233b-27: rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa yod na yum
T03D3802:233b-28: kha ton du byas pas 'tshe ba nye bar zhi
T03D3802:233b-29: ba dang / tsher bas gzhan gyi phan yon nam
T03D3802:233b-30: yang yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni phar phyin
T03D3802:233b-31: la sogs pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3802:233b-32: byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu ba'o //
T03D3802:233b-33: le'u 'di nas bzhi las kun du rgyu bzlog pa ni /
T03D3802:233b-34: kun du rgyu mang po bcom ldan 'das la glags lta ba'i bsam pas 'ongs pa /
T03D3802:233b-35: brgya byin gyis kha ton byas pas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas lam de nyid nas dong ngo //
T03D3802:233b-36: bdud bzlog ni bdud sdig can gyis dpung gi tshogs
T03D3802:233b-37: chen po sprul pa la brgya byin gyis dpung gi
T03D3802:233b-38: tshogs 'di ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po la
T03D3802:233b-39: sogs pa rnams kyi ma yin te /
T03D3802:233b-40: nges par bdud sdig can gyi dpung gi tshogs so
T03D3802:233b-41: snyam nas yum kha ton byas pas bdud pham par
T03D3802:234a-1: 'byung ba ni yum bzhugs na dkon mchog gsum 'byung zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T03D3802:234a-2: ston pa dang mtshungs pa ni rigs kyi bu yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni ston pa'am /
T03D3802:234a-3: ston pa'i gnas dang mtshungs pa yin no //
T03D3802:234a-4: kun du rgyu bzlog pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o /
T03D3802:234a-7: // / le'u 'di nas gnyi ga'i don du mos pa brgyad /
T03D3802:234a-8: chung ngu'i 'bring ni kun dga' bos gsol ba /
T03D3802:234a-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan
T03D3802:234a-10: brjod pa lta bu gzhan la ma brjod lags so
T03D3802:234a-12: yum ni sa chen po dang 'dra bar sbyin pa
T03D3802:234a-13: nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi yon tan thams cad
T03D3802:234a-14: bskyed pa'o // chung ngu'i chen po nyan rang gi mi mnyam pa dang /
T03D3802:234a-15: mnyam pa'i phung po lnga las khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
T03D3802:234a-16: 'bring gi chung ngu ni yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa la spobs pa nye bar sgrub bo //
T03D3802:234a-17: 'bring gi 'bring ni yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa'o //
T03D3802:234a-18: 'bring gi chen po ni spobs pa mi 'phrogs pa gyur pa'o ;
T03D3802:234a-19: / chen po'i chung ngu ni yum 'dzin pa la
T03D3802:234a-20: sogs pa la lha'i bu rnams nyan du 'ongs pa'o
T03D3802:234a-21: // chen po'i 'bring ni lha'i bu rnams 'ongs pa'i
T03D3802:234a-22: rtags sngon chad med pa'i dri bzang po la sogs
T03D3802:234a-23: // pa 'byung ba'o // chen po'i chen po ni
T03D3802:234a-24: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs
T03D3802:234a-25: pa 'khor dang bcas par zhugs pa la nam 'tsho'i
T03D3802:234a-26: bar du me tog la sogs pas mchad pa byas
T03D3802:234a-27: // pa 'byung ba'o // te / yongs su mya
T03D3802:234a-28: ngan las 'das nas kyang sku gdung mchod rten gyi
T03D3802:234a-29: nang du stsal te me tog la sogs pa'i mchod
T03D3802:234a-31: yum 'dzin pa la sogs byas nas bkur sti byas na bsod nams che'o //
T03D3802:234a-32: mchod rten gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o; ;
T03D3802:234a-33: // le'u 'di nas gzhan gyi don du mos pa dgu /
T03D3802:234a-34: chung ngu'i chung ngu ni bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya
T03D3802:234a-35: byin la 'dzam bu'i gling 'di sku gdung gis gang
T03D3802:234a-37: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang gtad na /
T03D3802:234a-38: bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gdams lags so //
T03D3802:234a-39: cis na phar phyin las sku gdung 'byung bas so //
T03D3802:234a-40: chung ngu'i 'bring ni dper na bdag chos bzang na
T03D3802:234a-41: stan la bsdad nas chos bshad pa'i gdan la mchod
T03D3802:234a-44: sku gdung ni gdan khri rnying pa dang 'dra'o //
T03D3802:234a-45: chung ngu'i chen po ni stong sku gdung gis bkang ba bas kyang 'dam mo //
T03D3802:234b-0: 'bring gi @234b chung ngu ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
T03D3802:234b-1: gyi khams kyi gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis gsung
T03D3802:234b-2: ba dang / yum ni 'di dang mtshungs lags te 'di las byung ba'o //
T03D3802:234b-3: 'bring gi 'bring ni yum 'di 'dzin pa la sogs
T03D3802:234b-4: pa la ni ngan song la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa
T03D3802:234b-5: ma mchis te / yum ni rgyal po dang 'dra
T03D3802:234b-6: la sku gdung ni rgyal po la brten pa'i mi
T03D3802:234b-8: 'bring gi chen po ni yum ni nor bu rin po che dang 'dra la /
T03D3802:234b-9: sku gdung de'i snod ga'u tog rnying pa dang 'dra'o //
T03D3802:234b-10: chen po'i chung ngu ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
T03D3802:234b-11: khams sku gdung gis bkang ba bas kyang 'dam mo
T03D3802:234b-12: // chen po'i 'bring ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T03D3802:234b-13: cad kyi gzugs kyi sku dang chos kyi sku mthong
T03D3802:234b-14: bar 'dod pas yum gyi rnal 'byor la brtson par
T03D3802:234b-15: // bya'o // chen po'i chen po ni dge ba'i
T03D3802:234b-16: chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:234b-18: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na /
T03D3802:234b-19: ro gcig tu 'gyur ba shing gi grib ma'i dpes bstan to //
T03D3802:234b-20: sku gdung gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o /
T03D3802:234b-22: // / le'u 'di nas bstod bkur bsngags pa gsum ston /
T03D3802:234b-23: shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la //
T03D3802:234b-24: mos pa'i gnas skabs rnams la ni //
T03D3802:234b-25: dgu tshan gsum gyis bstod pa dang //
T03D3802:234b-26: bkur ba dang ni bsngags par brjod //
T03D3802:234b-28: bstod pa dang po ni brgya byin gyis gsol pa /
T03D3802:234b-29: bdag nyid gcig pus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /
T03D3802:234b-30: gzhan la'ang byin na bsod nams gang che lags /
T03D3802:234b-32: khyod nyid la dri yis lan thob cig / de
T03D3802:234b-33: bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung bdag nyid 'ba' zhig gis
T03D3802:234b-34: bcangs nas bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
T03D3802:234b-35: gzhan yang bsnyen bkur byed du bcug pa gnyis bsod nams gang che /
T03D3802:234b-37: bdag nyid 'ba' zhig gis bcangs pa bas gzhan la'ang
T03D3802:234b-38: byin na bsod nams che bas sku gdung gis 'dul
T03D3802:234b-39: ba'i sems can la rdo rje'i sku bshig nas gnang
T03D3802:234b-40: ba mdzad do ; / bka' stsal pa /
T03D3802:234b-41: de bzhin du bdag nyid 'ba' zhig gis bcangs pa bas gzhan la byin na bsod nams che'o //
T03D3802:234b-42: bstod pa gnyis pa ni de yang gzhan gyi drug
T03D3802:234b-43: du phyin nas bstan cing bshad na bsod nams che
T03D3802:234b-44: ste / de ni ston pa'am ston pa'i gnas dang mtshungs so //
T03D3802:235a-1: 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu la bkod pa'o //
T03D3802:235a-3: lnga pa lan cig phyir 'ong ngo //
T03D3802:235a-6: brgyad pa rang byang chub bo //
T03D3802:235a-7: dgu pa 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa rgyun zhugs
T03D3802:235a-8: la bkod pa bas sems can gcig cig byang chub
T03D3802:235a-9: sems dpa' la bkod na bsod nams che ste /
T03D3802:235a-10: ces na rgyun zhugs la sogs pa yod pas sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma yin gyi /
T03D3802:235a-11: byang chub sems dpa' yod pas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
T03D3802:235a-12: bkur ba dang po ni stong gsum gyi stong chen
T03D3802:235a-13: po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba bcu la bkod
T03D3802:235a-15: gnyis pa bsam gtan bzhi la bkod pa /
T03D3802:235a-16: gsum pa tshad med pa bzhi la bkod pa /
T03D3802:235a-17: bzhi pa gzugs med pa bzhi la bkod pa /
T03D3802:235a-18: lnga pa stong gsum gyi stong gi sems can rnams
T03D3802:235a-19: mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa bas shes
T03D3802:235a-20: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byin na bsod
T03D3802:235a-21: nams che'o // drug pa tshul bzhin du yid la byas na yang dag pa'i don bstan na che'o //
T03D3802:235a-22: bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T03D3802:235a-23: don ni gnyis su ma gnyis su ma yin pa
T03D3802:235a-24: yang ma yin la sogs pa gnyis med pa bsod
T03D3802:235a-25: nams che'o // brgyad pa stong gsum gyi sangs rgyas
T03D3802:235a-26: la bsnyen bkur byas pa bas kyang yum gyi don
T03D3802:235a-28: dgu pa yum gyi gzugs brnyan mi rtag pa la sogs pa mi ston pa /
T03D3802:235a-29: rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:235a-30: pa bsgoms la gzugs mi rtag pa la sogs par
T03D3802:235a-31: yang ma lta cig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:235a-32: bsngags pa dang po stong gsum gyi stong gi sems can rgyun zhugs pa la bkod pa /
T03D3802:235a-34: gsum pa phyir mi 'ong ba la /
T03D3802:235a-37: drug pa byang chub la bkod pa /
T03D3802:235a-38: bdun pa phyir mi ldog pa la bkod pa /
T03D3802:235a-39: brgyad pa bla na med pa'i byang chub la bkod pa bas /
T03D3802:235a-40: dgu pa sems can gcig cig myur du sangs rgyas
T03D3802:235a-41: bar 'dod pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3802:235a-42: phyin pa don dang bcas pa yi ge dang bcas
T03D3802:235a-43: par byin na bsod nams che ste /
T03D3802:235a-44: de cis na ji lta ji ltar rdzogs pa'i byang
T03D3802:235a-45: chub la nye ba de lta de ltar pha rol
T03D3802:235a-46: tu phyin pas gdungs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:235a-47: bsod nams kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o /
T03D3802:235b-0: // / @235b le'u 'di nas bsngo ba dang rjes su yi rang ba gnyis las /
T03D3802:235b-1: yongs su bsngo ba khyad par can //
T03D3802:235b-2: de yi byed pa mchog yin no //
T03D3802:235b-3: de ni dmigs med rnam pa can //
T03D3802:235b-4: phyin ci ma log mtshan nyid dang //
T03D3802:235b-5: dben dang sangs rgyas bsod nams tshogs //
T03D3802:235b-6: rang bzhin dran pa'i spyod yul can //
T03D3802:235b-7: thabs bcas mtshan ma med pa dang //
T03D3802:235b-8: sangs rgyas rjes su yi rang dang //
T03D3802:235b-9: khams gsum gtags pa ma yin dang //
T03D3802:235b-10: chung dang 'bring dang chen po yi //
T03D3802:235b-11: bsod nams che 'byung bdag nyid de //
T03D3802:235b-12: bsngo ba'i mchog ni rnam pa gsum //
T03D3802:235b-14: khyad par can gyi bsngo ba ni //
T03D3802:235b-16: nyan rang ni rang gi don du bsngo ba yin la /
T03D3802:235b-17: byang sems ni gzhan gyi don du bsngo ba yin pas khyad par du 'phags te /
T03D3802:235b-18: las dang po pa'i gang zag la dmigs pa can du ma bstan na mos pa ldog ste /
T03D3802:235b-19: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sbyangs pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsngo ba'o //
T03D3802:235b-20: mi dmigs pa'i bsngo ba ni rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
T03D3802:235b-21: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sbyin pa nas sangs
T03D3802:235b-22: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar
T03D3802:235b-23: du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsngo ba'o //
T03D3802:235b-24: phyin ci ma log pa'i bsngo ba ni de ltar dmigs par mi byed /
T03D3802:235b-26: 'du shes par yang mi byed na phyin ci ma log pa'o //
T03D3802:235b-27: dben pa'i bsngo ba ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis dben par bsngo ba'o //
T03D3802:235b-28: sangs rgyas la sogs pa tshogs kyi rang bzhin dran par bsngo ba ni sangs rgyas dang /
T03D3802:235b-30: so so'i skye bo'i dge ba'i rta ba ci yod pa mi dmigs pa bsngo ba'o //
T03D3802:235b-31: thabs mkhas pa'i bsngo ba ni tshogs sogs par byed pa'i thabs so //
T03D3802:235b-32: mtshan ma med pa'i bsngo ba ni mtshan bcas kyis
T03D3802:235b-33: bsngos na kha zas bzang po dug dang 'dres pa
T03D3802:235b-34: dang 'dra bas mtshan ma med par bsngo ba'o //
T03D3802:235b-35: sangs rgyas rjes su yi rang gi bsngo ba ni
T03D3802:235b-36: sngon gyi sangs rgyas la sogs pas ji lta ji
T03D3802:235b-37: ltar bsngos pa de lta de ltar rjes su 'jug
T03D3802:235b-38: gi bsngo ba'o // khams gsum du ma gtogs pa'i
T03D3802:235b-39: bsngo ba ni byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod
T03D3802:235b-40: gi bsngo ba'o // pa'i tshe / gzugs nas rnam
T03D3802:235b-41: mkhyen gyi bar khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa
T03D3802:235b-42: ma yin pa dus gsum las 'das pa de mtshan
T03D3802:235b-43: ma'am dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsngo bar mi nus so
T03D3802:235b-44: gi bsngo ba'o // pa'i tshe / // de cis na /
T03D3802:236a-2: gang la rang bzhin med pa de dngos po med pa ste /
T03D3802:236a-3: dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa bsngo bar mi nus so //
T03D3802:236a-4: bsod nams che 'byung gi chung ngu ni dge ba
T03D3802:236a-5: bcu dang bsam gtan bzhi tshad med pa bzhi gzugs
T03D3802:236a-6: med pa bzhi la bkod pa bas 'bring gi rgyun
T03D3802:236a-7: zhugs nas rang sangs rgyas kyi bar ro //
T03D3802:236a-8: chen po ni stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3802:236a-9: kyi sems can thams cad dmigs pa can du bsngo
T03D3802:236a-10: ba bas / byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med
T03D3802:236a-11: pa mtshan ma med pa gos pa med par bsngos
T03D3802:236a-13: rjes su yi rang ba ni thabs dang mi dmigs pa dag gis /
T03D3802:236a-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba la yi rang ba /
T03D3802:236a-15: rjes su yi rang yid byed pa //
T03D3802:236a-16: bsgom pa yin par 'dir brjod do //
T03D3802:236a-17: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye
T03D3802:236a-18: bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
T03D3802:236a-19: rjes su yi rang ba bas mi dmigs pa'i tshul
T03D3802:236a-20: gyis rjes su yi rang ba mchog rab yin no
T03D3802:236a-21: // dper na stong gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa pas /
T03D3802:236a-22: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rjes su yi rang ba mchog yin no //
T03D3802:236a-23: rjes su yi rang ba dang bsngo ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o /
T03D3802:236a-26: de yi ngo bo nyid mchog nyid //
T03D3802:236a-27: kun la mngon par 'du mi byed //
T03D3802:236a-28: chos rnams dmigs pa med par ni //
T03D3802:236a-29: gtod par byed pa don chen nyid //
T03D3802:236a-31: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o //
T03D3802:236a-32: mchog ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i mchog spyan 'dra ba ste /

T03D3802:236b-0: chos rnams dmigs pa med par gtod par byed pa zhes pa @236b ni thob par byed pa'o //
T03D3802:236b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gsog go //

T03D3802:236b-14: rgya che bar mi bgyid chung bar mi bgyid /
T03D3802:236b-15: mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //
T03D3802:236b-16: gal te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:236b-17: pa drug la brten nas lngar bgyid na yum dang
T03D3802:236b-18: mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so //

T03D3802:236b-20: bgyid pa ni de'i dmigs pa chen por 'gyur ro
T03D3802:236b-21: // dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la byang chub med do //
