T03D3802:236b-33: sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o /
T03D3802:236b-35: // / le'u 'di nas rnam dag skye ba dang mi skye ba'i rgyu bstan pa dang /
T03D3802:236b-38: rnam dag spyir bstan pa dang /
T03D3802:236b-39: nyan thos kyi rnam dag dang /
T03D3802:236b-40: rang rgyal gyi rnam dag dang /
T03D3802:236b-41: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam dag dang /
T03D3802:236b-42: sangs rgyas kyi rnam dag shin tu che ba'o //
T03D3802:236b-43: rnam dag skye ba'i rgyu ni /
T03D3802:236b-44: sangs rgyas bstan dang sbyin sogs dang //
T03D3802:236b-45: thabs la mkhas pa gang yin dang //
T03D3802:236b-46: 'di la mos pa'i rgyu dag yin //
T03D3802:236b-47: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa /
T03D3802:236b-48: sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa /
T03D3802:236b-49: bskal pa grangs med pa nas zhugs pa sems dang
T03D3802:236b-50: po bskyed pa nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T03D3802:236b-52: da ltar yang yum mthong ngam thos na ston pa mthong ngo snyam mo //
T03D3802:236b-54: yum mthong ba dang blta bar nus sam /
T03D3802:237a-1: pha rol tu phyin pa drug nas rnam pa thams
T03D3802:237a-2: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos la sems
T03D3802:237a-3: med pa'i phyir mi mthong mi thos te /
T03D3802:237a-4: yang dag par mi mthong ba de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3802:237a-5: rnam dag mi skye ba'i rgyu ni /
T03D3802:237a-6: bdud kyi thibs kyis non pa dang //
T03D3802:237a-7: zab mo'i chos la ma mos dang //
T03D3802:237a-8: phung po la sogs mngon zhen dang //
T03D3802:237a-9: sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa'o //
T03D3802:237a-10: zhes pa ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas mang po
T03D3802:237a-11: mthong ste dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:237a-12: pa drug la spyad pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul
T03D3802:237a-13: gyis ston pa thos na da lta byol nas gud
T03D3802:237a-14: du dong ste / sngon yang gud du byol byol
T03D3802:237a-15: ba shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba'i las bsags pas
T03D3802:237a-16: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dmyal bar skye'o
T03D3802:237a-17: du dong ste / // der me la sogs pas
T03D3802:237a-18: 'jig pa'i tshe'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi dmyal
T03D3802:237a-19: du dong ste / // bar skye / de bzhin du dud 'gro dang yi dags su 'gyur ro //
T03D3802:237a-20: brgya la mir skyes na'ang dmus long dang mdze can
T03D3802:237a-21: la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra mi grag
T03D3802:237a-22: par 'gyur ro // sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
T03D3802:237a-23: mtshams ma mchis pa lngas kyang chos spong bar 'gyur
T03D3802:237a-24: ba'i sug las bgyis pa'i gzugs brnyan tsam du yang
T03D3802:237a-26: bka' stsal pa de bzhin te /
T03D3802:237a-27: chos spong bar 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa nag po'i
T03D3802:237a-28: rang bzhin can de ni bdag gi rgyud kyang dug
T03D3802:237a-29: can du byas nas gzhan gyi rgyud kyang dug can
T03D3802:237a-30: du byed pa de ni thos par yang ma gnang
T03D3802:237a-31: na / bltar mi rung 'grogs su lta ga la mchis /
T03D3802:237a-32: chos spong bar 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa'i lus kyi tshad ni bka' ma stsal to //
T03D3802:237a-34: 'bras bu dag pa gzugs la sogs //
T03D3802:237a-35: dag pa nyid de gang gi phyir //
T03D3802:237a-36: de gnyis tha dad ma yin zhing //
T03D3802:237a-37: bcad du med pas dag par brjod //
T03D3802:237a-38: rnam dag spyir bstan pa ni de tsam du zab pa'i yum de gang lags /
T03D3802:237a-40: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi dus gsum rnams ma bcings ma grol lags so //
T03D3802:237a-42: gzugs rnam par dag pas 'bras bu rnam par dag pa /
T03D3802:237a-43: 'bras bu rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa ste /
T03D3802:237a-44: de ltar na gzugs rnam par dag pa dang 'bras
T03D3802:237a-45: bu rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med
T03D3802:237b-0: de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin @237b
T03D3802:237b-2: gzugs la sogs pa ni dag par bya ba'o //
T03D3802:237b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dag par byed pa'o //
T03D3802:237b-4: dag pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun zhugs la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:237b-5: gnyis su med pa ni dngos po la'o //
T03D3802:237b-6: gnyis su byar med pa ni blos so //
T03D3802:237b-7: so so ma yin pa ni spyi'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3802:237b-8: mdor na chos thams cad spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid las grol ba ni rnam dag go //
T03D3802:237b-9: rnam dag ni rnam bcad de dgag tu med pa'o //
T03D3802:237b-10: yongs dag ni yongs gcod sgrub tu med pa ste /
T03D3802:237b-11: chos nyid kyi don la dgag sgrub med pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3802:237b-12: yang dag ni gzugs yongs su dag pas shes rab
T03D3802:237b-13: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa
T03D3802:237b-15: bye brag gi rnam dag ni //
T03D3802:237b-16: nyon mongs shes bya lam gsum gyi //
T03D3802:237b-17: nyams phyir slob ma bse ru dang //
T03D3802:237b-18: rgyal sras rnams kyi dag pa ste //
T03D3802:237b-19: sangs rgyas rnam kun shin tu ba //
T03D3802:237b-20: zhes pa ni byed pa'i skyes bu bcu gnyis rnam
T03D3802:237b-21: dag yongs dag dus gsum gyi rnam dag yongs dag
T03D3802:237b-23: rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi rnam dag ni rang rgyal gyi'o //
T03D3802:237b-24: phar phyin nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi rnam dag ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T03D3802:237b-25: sangs rgyas kyi rnam dag ni shin tu ba la gnyis las /
T03D3802:237b-26: ji lta ba'i rnam dag ni phar phyin nas sangs
T03D3802:237b-27: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du rnam par
T03D3802:237b-28: byang ba rnam par dag pa /
T03D3802:237b-29: phung po khams skye mched rnam par dag / kun
T03D3802:237b-30: nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa
T03D3802:237b-31: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste
T03D3802:237b-32: zhes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3802:237b-33: nyid rnam par dag pas kun nas nyon mongs rnam
T03D3802:237b-34: zhes pa dang / par dag pa / pha rol
T03D3802:237b-35: tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa rnam par dag
T03D3802:237b-37: dmyal ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o /
T03D3802:237b-39: // / le'u 'di nas sa dgu'i rnam dag / gzhi shes kyi zung gsum ya drug ston /
T03D3802:237b-41: sa dgu la ni chen po yi //
T03D3802:237b-42: chen po la sogs dri ma yi / gnyen po'i sgo nas chung ngu yi //
T03D3802:237b-43: chung ngu la sogs lam yin no //
T03D3802:237b-44: klan ka de ni spang ba'i phyir //
T03D3802:237b-45: zhes pa ni khams gsum sa dgu rdzas su yod
T03D3802:237b-46: par 'dod cing spang bya dang gnyen po rang rgyud
T03D3802:237b-47: pa klan ka yin pas de spang ba'i phyir /
T03D3802:237b-48: lam ni 'jal dang gzhal bya dag / mnyam pa nyid kyis khams gsum gyi //
T03D3802:237b-49: gnyen po nyid du 'dod pa yin //
T03D3802:238a-0: zhes pa ni sh'a ri'i bu la rnam @238a * //
T03D3802:238a-1: dag dgu / ji snyed pa'i rnam dag bstan pa ni gzugs rnam par dag pa ni zab po //
T03D3802:238a-2: gzugs rnam par dag pa ni snang ba'o //
T03D3802:238a-3: gzugs rnam par dag pa ni 'pho ba med cing nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa'o //
T03D3802:238a-4: gzugs rnam par dag pa ni rang bzhin gyis 'od
T03D3802:238a-5: gsal ba'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o
T03D3802:238a-6: // gzugs rnam par dag pa ni thob pa med pa'o //
T03D3802:238a-7: gzugs rnam par dag pa ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa'o //
T03D3802:238a-8: gzugs rnam par dag pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong
T03D3802:238a-9: pa'i phyir khams gsum du skye ba ma mchis pa'o
T03D3802:238a-10: // rnam par dag pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid
T03D3802:238a-11: kyis stong pa'i phyir sman par mi bgyid gnod par
T03D3802:238a-12: // mi bgyid do // gzugs rnam par dag pa
T03D3802:238a-13: ni chos la sems med pa'i phyir ma 'tshal ba
T03D3802:238a-14: // mi bgyid do // lags so // sangs rgyas
T03D3802:238a-15: kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar la de rnams kun
T03D3802:238a-16: // mi bgyid do // lags so // bsgre'o // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
T03D3802:238a-17: bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du gzugs nas rnam
T03D3802:238a-18: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dag
T03D3802:238a-19: pa lags so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
T03D3802:238a-20: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs
T03D3802:238a-21: nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du mtha' yas pa lags
T03D3802:238a-22: so // gzhi shes pa'i zhus lan drug ni /
T03D3802:238a-23: rang bzhin gzhi'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khor 'das la ma zhen pa dang /
T03D3802:238a-24: ming dang tshig tu bzung na ring la /
T03D3802:238a-25: ma bzung na yum la nye bar dang spang bya dang gnyen po la ma zhen pa dang /
T03D3802:238a-26: gzugs la sogs pa gang la yang mi spyod pa dang /
T03D3802:238a-27: gzugs la sogs pa la rlom sems med pa dang /
T03D3802:238a-28: gzugs la sogs pa la skye 'gag med par rtogs pa ste bsdus pa'i don to //
T03D3802:238a-29: de las gzhi shes kyi ngo bo ni /
T03D3802:238a-30: tshul rol pha rol mtha' la min //
T03D3802:238a-31: de dag bar la mi gnas pa //
T03D3802:238a-32: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid shes phyir //
T03D3802:238a-33: shes rab pha rol phyin par 'dod //
T03D3802:238a-34: ces pa ni tshu rol ni 'khor ba /
T03D3802:238a-36: de la mi gnas pa'i rgyu mtshan dus gsum dag pa'o //
T03D3802:238a-37: de ni mtshan mar dmigs sgo nas //
T03D3802:238a-38: thabs ma yin pas ring ba ste //
T03D3802:238a-39: de ni thabs la mkhas pa yis //
T03D3802:238a-40: yang dag nyid du nye bar bshad //
T03D3802:238a-41: ces pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:238a-42: pa de ni nyan rang gi ming dang mtshan mar
T03D3802:238b-0: yum de byang chub sems @238b dpas smra bsam brjod med du rtogs pas nye'o //
T03D3802:238b-1: gzugs sogs phung po stong nyid dang //
T03D3802:238b-2: dus gsum gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang //
T03D3802:238b-3: sbyin sogs byang chub phyogs rnams la //
T03D3802:238b-4: spyod pa'i 'du shes mi mthun phyogs //
T03D3802:238b-5: sbyin la sogs la ngar 'dzin med //
T03D3802:238b-6: gzhan dag de la sbyor byed pa //
T03D3802:238b-7: de ni chags pa'i mtha' 'gog pas //
T03D3802:238b-8: rgyal la sogs pa chags pa phra //
T03D3802:238b-9: zhes pa ni lta ba'i yul la 'du shes pa
T03D3802:238b-10: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi
T03D3802:238b-11: bar la stong pa dang dus gsum du 'du shes
T03D3802:238b-12: na chags pa'o // spyod pa'i yum la 'du shes ni phar phyin la sogs la spyod snyam na'o //
T03D3802:238b-13: ma chags pa ni de las bzlog pa ste /
T03D3802:238b-14: gzhan dag de la bkod nas chags pa'i mtha' 'gog pa'o //
T03D3802:238b-15: rgyal ba'am 'bras bu la chags pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni /
T03D3802:238b-17: de bas kyang chags pa phra ba bstan pa ni
T03D3802:238b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yid la
T03D3802:238b-21: chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin gyis //
T03D3802:238b-22: dben pa'i phyir na de zab nyid //
T03D3802:238b-23: chos rnams rang bzhin med par ni //
T03D3802:238b-24: shes pas chags pa spong ba yin //
T03D3802:238b-25: mthong ba la sogs bkag pa yis //
T03D3802:238b-26: de ni rtogs par dka' bar bshad //
T03D3802:238b-27: gzugs la sogs pa mi shes phyir //
T03D3802:238b-28: de ni bsam mi khyab par bshad //
T03D3802:238b-29: ces pa ni chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin med par shes pa dang /
T03D3802:238b-30: gzung 'dzin med pa bsam las 'das pa'o //
T03D3802:238b-32: de ltar kun shes nyid lugs la //
T03D3802:238b-33: mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dag / ji ltar bshad pa 'di zhes bya //
T03D3802:238b-34: rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o /
T03D3802:238b-37: gzugs sogs de mi rtag sogs dang //
T03D3802:238b-38: de ma rdzogs dang rab rdzogs dang //
T03D3802:238b-39: spyod pa bkag pa'i sbyor ba dang //
T03D3802:238b-40: de la chags pa med nyid dang //
T03D3802:238b-41: mi 'gyur byed po med nyid dang //
T03D3802:238b-42: bya dka' rnam gsum sbyor ba dang //
T03D3802:238b-43: skal pa ji bzhin 'bras thob pas //
T03D3802:238b-45: gzhan la rag las min gang dang //
T03D3802:238b-46: snang ba rnam bdun shes byed do //
T03D3802:238b-49: byang chub sems dpa' yum la ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
T03D3802:238b-50: de'i lan gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la mi
T03D3802:238b-51: spyod na yum la spyod do zhes pa ni gzugs
T03D3802:239a-1: rtag sogs kyi sbyor ba ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen par rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang /
T03D3802:239a-2: bde ba dang sdug bsngal bdag yod med /
T03D3802:239a-3: sdug pa dang mi sdug par mi spyod na yum la spyod do //
T03D3802:239a-4: rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba ni gzugs
T03D3802:239a-5: nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yongs su rdzogs pa dang
T03D3802:239a-6: ma rdzogs pa la mi spyod na'o //
T03D3802:239a-7: chags pa dang ma chags pa'i sbyor ba ni gzugs
T03D3802:239a-8: nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar chags pa dang ma chags
T03D3802:239a-9: pa'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor na'o //
T03D3802:239a-10: mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba ni nam mkha' la bsngags
T03D3802:239a-11: pa dang bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'phel
T03D3802:239a-12: 'grib med pa'i dpes yum la 'gyur ba med pa
T03D3802:239a-13: dang / byed pa po med pa'i sbyor ba ni
T03D3802:239a-14: sgyu ma'i skyes bu la bsngags pa dang bsngags pa
T03D3802:239a-15: ma yin pa brjod kyang chags sdang med pa'i dpes
T03D3802:239a-16: byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa la chags
T03D3802:239a-18: bya dka' rnam gsum gyi sbyor ba ni /
T03D3802:239a-20: yum bsgom pa ni nam mkha' bsgom pa lags te /
T03D3802:239a-21: nam mkha' la ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du med do //
T03D3802:239a-22: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi
T03D3802:239a-23: bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyis bskal pa tshad
T03D3802:239a-24: med grangs med par bzhugs nas /
T03D3802:239a-25: sems can tshad med grangs med pa phung po lhag
T03D3802:239a-26: ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la
T03D3802:239a-27: bkod kyang sems can gyi khams la bri'ang med gang
T03D3802:239a-28: ba'ang med de / sems can gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
T03D3802:239a-29: bshad kyang de bzhin ma bshad kyang de bzhin no //
T03D3802:239a-30: skal ba ji bzhin 'bras thob pas //
T03D3802:239a-31: 'bras bu yod par 'dod pa'i sbyor ba ni de
T03D3802:239a-32: nas dge slong cig gis chos thams cad skye ba'am
T03D3802:239a-33: 'gag pa'am kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par
T03D3802:239a-34: byang ba med pa la tshul khrims kyi phung po
T03D3802:239a-36: rgyun zhugs la sogs pa 'phags pa'i gang zag thob pa'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3802:239a-37: gzhan la rag las pa ma yin pa'i sbyor pa ni brgya byin gyis smras pa /
T03D3802:239a-38: bdag gis yum de la ji lta bu zhig brtson par bgyi /
T03D3802:239a-40: nam mkha' stong pa nyid la khyod brtson par 'dod dam /
T03D3802:239a-41: snang ba rnam bdun gyi sbyor ba ni brgya byin gyis smras pa /
T03D3802:239a-42: yum la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la bdag gis ji lta bu zhig bsrung bar bgyi /
T03D3802:239b-1: rmi lam nas sprul pa'i bar gyi brdzun la khyod bsrung bar 'dod dam /
T03D3802:239b-2: rigs kyi bu yum de nyid la gnas na bsrung ba'i mchog go //
T03D3802:239b-4: gzugs la sogs la rlom med pa //
T03D3802:239b-5: rnam bzhi de yi mnyam pa nyid //
T03D3802:239b-6: ces pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed /
T03D3802:239b-7: rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed /
T03D3802:239b-8: rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do //
T03D3802:239b-9: sprul pa'i bar rlom sems su mi byed na yum la brtson pa'o //
T03D3802:239b-10: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di na 'khod pa'i
T03D3802:239b-11: lha dang mi rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
T03D3802:239b-12: khams na sangs rgyas rnams yum ming 'di nyid dang
T03D3802:239b-13: tshig 'di nyid dang yi ge 'di nyid kyis ston
T03D3802:239b-14: cing rab 'byor dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'ba'
T03D3802:239b-15: zhig zhu ba mthong bar gyur /
T03D3802:239b-16: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang byams pa'ang 'di nyid la brten nas sangs rgya'o //
T03D3802:239b-17: byams pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di ltar chos mi ston pa dang ston pa ni /
T03D3802:239b-18: gzugs rtag ma yin mi rtag min //
T03D3802:239b-19: mtha' las 'das dang rnam dag dang //
T03D3802:239b-20: ma skyes ma 'gags la sogs dang //
T03D3802:239b-21: mkha' 'dra chags pa spangs pa dang //
T03D3802:239b-22: yongs su 'dzin las grol ba dang //
T03D3802:239b-23: ngo bo nyid kyis brjod med dang //
T03D3802:239b-24: gang phyir 'di don brjod pa yis //
T03D3802:239b-25: gzhan la sbyin du med pa dang //
T03D3802:239b-26: dmigs pa med par byed pa dang //
T03D3802:239b-27: shin tu rnam dag nad mi 'byung //
T03D3802:239b-28: ngan song chad dang 'bras bu ni //
T03D3802:239b-29: mngon du bya la mi rtog nyid //
T03D3802:239b-30: mtshan ma dag dang ma 'brel dang //
T03D3802:239b-31: dngos dang ming dang gnyis po la //
T03D3802:239b-32: shes pa skye ba med pa ni //
T03D3802:239b-33: kun shes nyid kyi skad cig ma //
T03D3802:239b-34: sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa la //
T03D3802:239b-35: chos shes rjes su shes bzod dang //
T03D3802:239b-36: shes pa'i skad cig rnam bzhi ni //
T03D3802:239b-37: kun shes nyid la mthong ba'i lam //
T03D3802:239b-38: zhes pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la 'dod
T03D3802:239b-39: khams kyi nyon mongs pa bcu dang bral ba ni
T03D3802:239b-41: de'i shul du gnyen po skyes pas na chos shes pa /
T03D3802:239b-42: khams gong ma gnyis kyi khong khro ma gtogs pa
T03D3802:239b-43: dgu dgu dang bral ba ni rjes su shes pa'i
T03D3802:239b-44: bzod pa / de'i shul du gnyen po skyes pa ni rjes su shes pa'o //
T03D3802:239b-45: de ltar bzhi ni nyan thos kyi mthong lam mo //
T03D3802:240a-0: byams pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen @240a * //
T03D3802:240a-1: gyi bar rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'am /
T03D3802:240a-7: dus gsum zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3802:240a-8: ji ltar ston na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar rnam par dag go //
T03D3802:240a-11: gos pa med gzung du med pa bsnyad du med brjod du med dmigs su med /
T03D3802:240a-12: de bzhin du yum la mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:240a-13: nad mi 'byung ba'i phan yon ni //
T03D3802:240a-14: mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:240a-15: ngan song chad pa ni dmyal ba la sogs par mi ltung ba'o //
T03D3802:240a-16: 'bras bu mngon du bya ba la mi rtog pa ni mngon mtho dang nges legs lam zhen pa'o //
T03D3802:240a-17: mtshan ma dag dang ma 'brel ba ni dmigs pa bcu gcig gis ma gos pa'o //
T03D3802:240a-18: dngos dang ming gnyis po la shes pa mi skye
T03D3802:240a-19: ba ni de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed
T03D3802:240a-20: / de ltar mi rtog de ltar mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:240a-21: gzhi shes kyi bsdu ba ni /
T03D3802:240a-23: yang 'di yin te rnam gsum po //
T03D3802:240a-24: de ni gnas skabs gsum po dag / rdzogs par yongs su bstan pa yin //
T03D3802:240a-25: zhes pa 'di dang ni rnam mkhyen no //
T03D3802:240a-27: yang 'di yin te gzhi shes so //
T03D3802:240a-28: gnas med pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o /
T03D3802:240a-30: // / rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs
T03D3802:240a-31: pa la zhus lan bco brgyad ston pa las rnam
T03D3802:240a-32: pa ni / gzhi shes pa yi khyad par gyis //
T03D3802:240a-33: rnam pa zhes bya mtshan nyid de //
T03D3802:240a-34: kun mkhyen nyid ni rnam gsum phyir //
T03D3802:240a-35: de ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod //
T03D3802:240a-36: ces pa la gzhi shes pa'i rnam pa nyi shu rtsa bdun ni /
T03D3802:240a-37: med pa'i rnam pa nas bzung nas //
T03D3802:240a-38: mi g-yo ba yi rnam pa'i bar //
T03D3802:240a-39: bden pa so so la bzhi la //
T03D3802:240a-40: lam la de ni bco lngar 'dod //
T03D3802:240a-41: ces pa las sdug bsngal gyi gzhi ni med pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03D3802:240a-42: dben pa dang thub pa med pa'o //
T03D3802:240a-43: kun 'byung gi gzhi ni gnas med pa dang /
T03D3802:240a-47: 'gog pa'i gzhi ni 'gro ba med pa dang /
T03D3802:240a-51: lam gyi bco lnga ni byed pa po med pa dang /
T03D3802:240a-52: shes pa po med pa dang /
T03D3802:240b-5: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T03D3802:240b-6: rnam par byang ba med pa dang /
T03D3802:240b-10: yum ni g-yo ba med pa'o //
T03D3802:240b-11: lam shes pa'i rnam pa sum cu so drug ni /
T03D3802:240b-12: rgyu dang lam dang sdug bsngal dang //
T03D3802:240b-13: 'gog pa la ni go rims bzhin //
T03D3802:240b-14: de dag brgyad dang bdun dang ni //
T03D3802:240b-15: lnga dang bcu drug ces grags so //
T03D3802:240b-17: kun 'byung gi brgyad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T03D3802:240b-18: kun nas ldang ba med pa dang /
T03D3802:240b-23: nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T03D3802:240b-25: lam gyi bdun ni rab tu spangs pa dang /
T03D3802:240b-26: mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3802:240b-32: sdug bsngal gyi lnga ni mi rtag pa dang /
T03D3802:240b-37: 'gog pa'i bcu drug ni stong pa bcu drug go //
T03D3802:240b-38: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam pa brgyad dang bcu tham pa ni /
T03D3802:240b-39: kun mkhyen pa nyid gsum bye brag gis //
T03D3802:240b-40: dran pa nyer gzhag nas bzung nas //
T03D3802:240b-41: tha ma sangs rgyas nyid rnam pa //
T03D3802:240b-42: slob ma byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T03D3802:240b-43: sangs rgyas rnams la rim bzhin du //
T03D3802:240b-44: sum cu bdun dang sum cu bzhi //
T03D3802:240b-45: sum cu rtsa dgu dag tu bzhed //
T03D3802:240b-47: nyan thos dang mthun pa'i sum cu rtsa bdun ni byang chub kyi phyogs rnams so //
T03D3802:240b-48: byang chub sems dpa' dang mthun pa'i sum cu rtsa bzhi ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu /
T03D3802:240b-50: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu /
T03D3802:240b-53: sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa sum cu so dgu ni stobs bcu mi 'jigs pa bzhi /
T03D3802:240b-54: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi /
T03D3802:240b-55: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad /
T03D3802:240b-56: brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid /
T03D3802:240b-57: chos thams cad la mnga' bsgyur ba'i rang byung gi ye shes /
T03D3802:240b-58: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas yum ni de dag lags so //
T03D3802:240b-59: dmigs pa med pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o /
T03D3802:240b-61: // / le'u 'di nas sbyor ba nyi shu /
T03D3802:241a-2: sbyor ba po rten gyi gang zag gi chos lnga ni //
T03D3802:241a-3: sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti byas //
T03D3802:241a-4: de la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun //
T03D3802:241a-5: dge ba'i bshes kyis mgon bcas pa //
T03D3802:241a-6: 'di nyan pa yi snod yin no //
T03D3802:241a-7: sangs rgyas bsten dang kun 'dri dang //
T03D3802:241a-8: sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs spyod pa //
T03D3802:241a-9: len dang 'dzin la sogs pa dang //
T03D3802:241a-11: yum gang gi rna lam du grag pa ni sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur byas /
T03D3802:241a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed /
T03D3802:241a-13: de lta dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'o //
T03D3802:241a-14: bsten nas the tshom gyi don zhus pa ni mi 'jigs pa'o //
T03D3802:241a-15: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa ni tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o //
T03D3802:241a-17: gzugs la sogs pa mi gnas phyir //
T03D3802:241a-18: de la gnas pa bkag pa'i phyir //
T03D3802:241a-19: de yi de bzhin nyid zab phyir //
T03D3802:241a-20: de rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir //
T03D3802:241a-21: de dag tshad ni med phyir dang //
T03D3802:241a-22: tshegs chen yun rings rtogs pa'i phyir //
T03D3802:241a-23: lung bstan phyir mi ldog pa dang //
T03D3802:241a-24: nges 'byung bar chad med bcas dang //
T03D3802:241a-25: byang chub nye dang myur ba dang //
T03D3802:241a-27: chos dang chos min sogs mi mthong //
T03D3802:241a-28: gzugs sogs bsam mi khyab mi mthong //
T03D3802:241a-29: gzugs sogs de yi mtshan ma dang //
T03D3802:241a-30: de yi ngo bor rnam mi rtog //
T03D3802:241a-31: 'bras bu rin chen sbyin byed dang //
T03D3802:241a-32: de ni dag pa mtshams dang bcas //
T03D3802:241a-34: gzugs la sogs pa la mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba ni brgya byin gyis gsol pa /
T03D3802:241a-35: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa la ji ltar gnas pa dang ji ltar brtson par bgyi /
T03D3802:241a-37: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la mi gnas na /
T03D3802:241a-40: gzugs la sogs pa sngon gyi mtha' la sogs par mi dmigs so //
T03D3802:241a-41: gnas pa bkag pa'i sbyor ba ni gzugs la sogs
T03D3802:241a-42: pa la sbyor bar yang mi byed mi sbyor bar
T03D3802:241a-43: yang mi byed de rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir
T03D3802:241a-44: ro // zab pa'i sbyor ba ni gzugs la sogs pa zab pa'i phyir yum zab po //
T03D3802:241a-45: gting dpag dka' ba'i sbyor ba ni gzugs la sogs
T03D3802:241a-46: pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir yum gting dpag dka'o
T03D3802:241b-0: // tshad med pa'i sbyor ba ni gzugs la @241b
T03D3802:241b-1: sogs pa tshad med pa'i phyir yum tshad med do
T03D3802:241b-3: gting dpag dka' zhes bya ba dang /
T03D3802:241b-4: tshad med ces bya bar yang mi spyod na yum la spyod do //
T03D3802:241b-5: gnas skabs kyi sbyor ba bdun ni sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa /
T03D3802:241b-6: de skad bshad pa la mi 'jigs mi dngang ba de /
T03D3802:241b-7: tshegs chen po yun ring po'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3802:241b-8: lung bstan gyi sbyor ba ni /
T03D3802:241b-9: las dang po pa la bshad nas mi 'jigs mi
T03D3802:241b-10: dngang na de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam gnyis las
T03D3802:241b-12: bar chad med pa'i sbyor ba ni rmi lam na
T03D3802:241b-13: yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa byed pa bzang na
T03D3802:241b-14: da lta mngon sum gcer mthong du 'dzin pa la
T03D3802:241b-15: sogs pa byed pa ni rtags so //
T03D3802:241b-16: nges 'byung gi sbyor ba ni dgon pa thag ring
T03D3802:241b-17: po nas 'ong tsam na yum gyi sa mtshams mthong
T03D3802:241b-18: bas 'jigs pa yid la mi byed pa'i dpes 'khor
T03D3802:241b-19: pa las nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03D3802:241b-20: bar chad med pa'i sbyor ba ni rgya mtsho chen
T03D3802:241b-21: po ltar 'gro ba la mtshan ma ma mthong na
T03D3802:241b-22: nye ba'i dpes rtags med rtags su bstan pa'o //
T03D3802:241b-23: byang chub la nye ba'i sbyor ba ni dpyid dus su rtsi shing kha 'bus pa'i dpes /
T03D3802:241b-24: byang chub myur ba'i sbyor ba ni sbrum ma zla
T03D3802:241b-25: ba tshang pa'i dpes byang chub myur bar thob pa'o
T03D3802:241b-26: // gzhan don gyi sbyor ba ni byang chub sems
T03D3802:241b-27: dpa' ni sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i
T03D3802:241b-28: // phyir zhugs pa'o // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
T03D3802:241b-29: yum ji ltar na bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa lags kyi lan ni /
T03D3802:241b-30: 'phel med 'grib med kyi sbyor ba ni nam gzugs
T03D3802:241b-31: nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du 'phel ba dang 'grib
T03D3802:241b-32: par mi mthong ba'i tshe sgom pa yongs su rdzogs
T03D3802:241b-33: pa'o // chos dang chos min la sogs pa mi
T03D3802:241b-34: mthong ba'i sbyor ba ni chos dang chos ma yin
T03D3802:241b-35: pa'o // pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge
T03D3802:241b-36: ba dang dus gsum dang khams gsum dang gzugs nas
T03D3802:241b-37: rnam mkhyen gyi bar du yang dag par rjes su
T03D3802:241b-38: mi mthong na bsgom pa rdzogs pa dang /
T03D3802:241b-39: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyor ba ni gzugs nas
T03D3802:241b-40: rnam mkhyen gyi bar la bsam gyis mi khyab par
T03D3802:241b-41: shes na bsgom pa rdzogs pa dang /
T03D3802:241b-42: rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyor ba ni gzugs dang gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang /
T03D3802:241b-43: gzugs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog na de bzhin
T03D3802:241b-44: gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la
T03D3802:241b-45: sogs shing bsgom pa rdzogs pa'o //
T03D3802:241b-46: 'bras bu rin po che ster ba ni yum las phar phyin nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar 'byung ba'o //
T03D3802:242a-1: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o //
T03D3802:242a-2: sa mtshams kyi sbyor ba ni yum 'dri ba la
T03D3802:242a-3: sogs pa la bar chad 'byung bas brin yang myur
T03D3802:242a-4: du bri ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:242a-5: bdud kyi mthus bcom pa la sogs pa /
T03D3802:242a-6: yon tan rnam pa bcu bzhi ni 'dri ba la
T03D3802:242a-7: sogs pa la bdud la sogs pas mi tshugs pa
T03D3802:242a-8: ni bdud kyi mthu bcom pa'o //
T03D3802:242a-9: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni byin gyis rlob pas mi tshugs pa'o //
T03D3802:242a-10: mngon sum du mdzad pa ni 'dri ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:242a-11: rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba ni yum 'dri na sangs rgyas la nye ba'o //
T03D3802:242a-12: don chen po nyid la sogs pa ni nam yang
T03D3802:242a-13: ngan song du mi skye pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3802:242a-14: dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3802:242a-15: yum spyad pa'i yon tan ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas /
T03D3802:242a-16: lho phyogs dang yum warta ni dang /
T03D3802:242a-17: byang phyogs su 'khor rnam pa bzhi yum 'dri ba
T03D3802:242a-18: la sogs pa dang me tog la sogs pa mchod
T03D3802:242a-19: pa byas te / nam yang ngan song du mi
T03D3802:242a-20: ltung ba dang lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa
T03D3802:242a-21: thob nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems
T03D3802:242a-22: can rnams kyi don byed do //
T03D3802:242a-23: de cis na yum lnga brgya tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed de /
T03D3802:242a-24: dam pa'i chos 'dul ba gang zhe na /
T03D3802:242a-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3802:242a-26: de cis na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:242a-27: pa ni sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa sangs rgyas kyis
T03D3802:242a-28: dgongs la sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni shes rab
T03D3802:242a-29: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3802:242a-30: zag pa med pa'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa ni /
T03D3802:242a-31: sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar rdzogs pa'o //
T03D3802:242a-32: smra ba'i skyes bur gyur pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gtam smra ba'o //
T03D3802:242a-33: mi phyed pa ni bdud sdig can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus pa'o //
T03D3802:242a-34: dga' ba mchog tu gyur pa ni yum 'dri ba
T03D3802:242a-35: la sogs pa byed pa ni dga' ba dang bde
T03D3802:242a-36: ba'i nyams chen po skye ba'o //
T03D3802:242a-37: dam bcas pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin sgrub pa
T03D3802:242a-38: ni sems bskyed kyi dus su ji ltar khas blangs
T03D3802:242a-39: pa de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T03D3802:242a-40: gis sems can gyi don byed pa'o //
T03D3802:242a-41: rgya chen po 'dzin pa ni yum gyis sbyin pa
T03D3802:242a-42: la sogs pa rgya chen po btang bas 'bras bu
T03D3802:242a-44: nges par rnyed pa'i phan yon ni /
T03D3802:242a-45: btsal na nges par rnyed pa'o //
T03D3802:242a-46: byang phyogs kyi rgyud kyi le'u ste so gcig pa'o /
T03D3802:242b-0: // / skyon ni bcu tshan @242b bzhir bcas pa //
T03D3802:242b-1: drug tu nges par rtogs pa yin //
T03D3802:242b-3: bcu tshan dang po ni spobs pa ha cang mchi ba'i bdud ni /
T03D3802:242b-4: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dka' ba'i 'du shes kyis spyod pa'o //
T03D3802:242b-5: spobs pa myur ba'i bdud ni 'dri ba la sogs
T03D3802:242b-6: pa'i tshan khugs su spyad nas des kyang rlom sems
T03D3802:242b-7: su byed pa'o // lus kyi gnas ngan len ni phan tshun glal zhing 'dri ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:242b-8: sems kyi gnas ngan len ni sems g-yengs shing 'dri ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:242b-9: rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'i kha ton ni dge sems kyis ma zin pa'i chos spyod do //
T03D3802:242b-10: phyir phyogs pa'i rgyu mtshan ni bdag gi ming dang
T03D3802:242b-11: lung yang ma bstan 'di'i don yang mi rtogs so
T03D3802:242b-12: snyam ste stan las langs pa'o //
T03D3802:242b-13: rtsa ba bor nas yal 'dab tshol ba'i dpes rnam
T03D3802:242b-14: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yum bor ba
T03D3802:242b-16: khyis jo bo bor nas las mi las kha zas tshol ba'i dpes kha zas mchog las nyams pa'o //
T03D3802:242b-17: glang po rnyed nas rjes tshol gyi dpes theg pa mchog las nyams pa'o //
T03D3802:242b-18: rgya mtsho chen po tshol ba ba lang gi rmig
T03D3802:242b-19: rjes kyi dpes ched du bya ba las nyams pa'o
T03D3802:242b-20: // bcu tshan gnyis pa rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel pa nyams pa'i dpes /
T03D3802:242b-21: lha'i dbang po'i khang bzangs byed pa nyi ma dang zla ba'i tshad byed pa lta bu'o //
T03D3802:242b-22: gong na med pa nyams pa'i dpes 'khor los sgyur
T03D3802:242b-23: ba'i rgyal po lta ba la mkhar gyi rgyal po
T03D3802:242b-25: yum mang po la rnam par rtog pa ni yi
T03D3802:242b-26: ger 'dri ba la sogs pa la gzhan gyis g-yengs
T03D3802:242b-27: pa'o // ro mchog las nyams pa ni /
T03D3802:242b-28: ro brgyad dang ldan pa'i kha zas bor nas drug cu pa'i kha zas ba lta bu'o //
T03D3802:242b-29: yon tan mchog las nyams pa ni nor bu rin po che nor bu mching bu dang snyoms pa'o //
T03D3802:242b-30: yi ger 'dri ba la mngon par zhen pa ni chos nyid kyi don ma rtogs pa'o //
T03D3802:242b-31: dngos po med pa la mngon par zhen pa ni thabs khyad du gsod pa'o //
T03D3802:242b-32: yul la sogs pa yid la byed pa ni grong
T03D3802:242b-33: dang grong khyer la sogs pa yid la byed pa'o
T03D3802:242b-34: // rnyed pha dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad
T03D3802:242b-35: pa'i ro myang ba las nyams pa ni 'jig rten
T03D3802:242b-37: bdud kyi las kyi le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o /
T03D3802:242b-39: // / bcu tshan gsum pa 'chad pa po dang nyan
T03D3802:242b-40: pa po gang yang rung ba 'dun pa dang snyom
T03D3802:242b-41: las kyis zin pas nyams pa dang /
T03D3802:243a-2: 'dod chen chung ba dang 'dod chen chung ba ma yin pas nyams pa dang /
T03D3802:243a-3: sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan mi ldan dang /
T03D3802:243a-5: stong pa dang len par mi 'dod pa dang /
T03D3802:243a-6: sbyin pa dang ser sna dang mgo smos pas go ba dang /
T03D3802:243a-8: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis shes pa dang mi shes pa dang /
T03D3802:243a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'o //
T03D3802:243a-11: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa dang /
T03D3802:243a-14: 'dod pa'i 'dun pa dang bral ma bral dang /
T03D3802:243a-15: ngan 'gror 'gro ba la phyir phyogs pa dang /
T03D3802:243a-16: bde 'gror 'gro ba la yid bde ba skyes pa dang /
T03D3802:243a-17: gcig pur 'dug pa dang 'khor la dga' ba dang /
T03D3802:243a-19: de sbyin par mi 'dod pa dang /
T03D3802:243a-20: 'dod pa sgrub pa la de skabs mi 'byed pa dang /
T03D3802:243a-21: chom rkun la sogs pas dkrugs pa'i sa phyogs su 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba dang /
T03D3802:243a-22: khyim la 'dris par byed pa'i bdud kyi las dang /
T03D3802:243a-23: kha zas dkon pa'i phyogs su 'gro ba dang /
T03D3802:243a-25: bcos ma nye bar bsgyur ba dang /
T03D3802:243a-26: ji lta ba ma yin pas slu ba'o //
T03D3802:243a-27: de cis na yum la gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du med /
T03D3802:243a-28: de la 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:243a-29: yum la bar chad 'ong ba'i dpe ni nor bu rin po che la dgra mang ba'i dpes bstan /
T03D3802:243a-30: las dang po pa la bdud 'byung gi / sbyangs pa can la mi 'byung ste /
T03D3802:243a-31: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad srung ba mdzad do //
T03D3802:243a-32: mtshan nyid mdor bstan pa ni /
T03D3802:243a-33: gang gis mtshon te mtshan nyid du //
T03D3802:243a-34: shes bya de yang shes pa dang //
T03D3802:243a-35: khyad par byed dang rnam gsum po //
T03D3802:243a-36: ngo bo nyid dang mtshan nyid do //
T03D3802:243a-37: de la shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni yum /
T03D3802:243a-38: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ni sras yin par ston pa ni /
T03D3802:243a-39: dper na bud med cig la bu mang du yod la /
T03D3802:243a-40: de rnams ji ltar byas na bdag cag gi ma
T03D3802:243a-41: ma 'di yun ring du 'tsho ba bar chad med
T03D3802:243a-42: par 'gyur snyam zhing bkur sti byed de /
T03D3802:243a-43: ci nas bdag cag bskyed pa 'jig rten ston pa'o snyam mo //
T03D3802:243a-44: de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yum
T03D3802:243a-45: gyis bskyed 'jig rten bstan pa ni shes rab kyi
T03D3802:243a-46: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsam gtan nas rnam
T03D3802:243b-0: mkhyen gyi bar du @243b bstan pas sangs rgyas su
T03D3802:243b-1: brjod do // shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni yum 'di
T03D3802:243b-2: la brten nas gzhi dang lam dang rnam pa skye
T03D3802:243b-4: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid ni nyan rang gi lam las khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
T03D3802:243b-5: byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' yum bstan nas sems can gyi don byed pas so //
T03D3802:243b-6: ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i rang bzhin dang /
T03D3802:243b-7: byang chub kyi sems skye ba'i rang bzhin dang /
T03D3802:243b-8: 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang mi mthun pa la sogs pa ste mdor bstan no //
T03D3802:243b-9: gzhi shes kyi mtshan nyid bcu drug ni /
T03D3802:243b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang //
T03D3802:243b-12: sems can sems kyi spyod pa dang //
T03D3802:243b-13: mi zad pa yi rnam pa dang //
T03D3802:243b-14: des bsdus pa dang phyir lta dang //
T03D3802:243b-15: chags bcas sogs dang rgya chen dang //
T03D3802:243b-16: chen por gyur dang tshad med dang //
T03D3802:243b-17: rnam shes bstan du med pa dang //
T03D3802:243b-18: sems bltar med dang shes pa dang//
T03D3802:243b-19: g-yo ba la sogs zhes bya dang //
T03D3802:243b-20: de las gzhan yang de dag ni //
T03D3802:243b-21: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa zhes //
T03D3802:243b-22: thub pas de bzhin nyid rtogs dang //
T03D3802:243b-23: gzhan bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di //
T03D3802:243b-24: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skabs kyi //
T03D3802:243b-25: gzhi shes mtshan nyid ces bshad do //
T03D3802:243b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ni yum 'dis stobs
T03D3802:243b-28: bcu mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa bskyed do
T03D3802:243b-29: // 'jig rten bstan pa ni yum gyis phung po lnga 'jig rten du bstan to //
T03D3802:243b-30: 'jig rten 'jig med ni yum phung po lnga ste 'jig dang blang dor la sogs par mi ston /
T03D3802:243b-31: cis na gang la bstan par bya ba'i gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du dmigs su med do //
T03D3802:243b-32: sems can sems kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yum la brten nas /
T03D3802:243b-33: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du mi dmigs te /
T03D3802:243b-34: yum nyid kyang mi dmigs na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du lta ci smos /
T03D3802:243b-35: bsdus pa dang rnam par g-yengs pa ni de bzhin
T03D3802:243b-36: gshegs pas yum la brten nas chos nyid kyang mi
T03D3802:243b-37: dmigs na / bsdus pa dang rnam par g-yengs pa lta ci smos /
T03D3802:243b-38: mi zad pa'i rnam pa ni zad pa dang 'gog pa la sogs pa mkhyen to //
T03D3802:243b-39: chags bcas sogs ni sems dang sems las byung ba
T03D3802:243b-40: mi dmigs pa'i phyir dug gsum dang bcas pa mi
T03D3802:244a-1: sogs khongs kyi 'bral ba med pa ni phrad pa
T03D3802:244a-2: med pa'i phyir dug gsum dang 'bral ba med pa'o
T03D3802:244a-3: // rgya che ni sems de dngos po med pas
T03D3802:244a-4: rgya che chung la sogs pa 'phel 'grib med do
T03D3802:244a-5: // // chen por gyur pa ni ngo bo nyid
T03D3802:244a-6: med pas skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa
T03D3802:244a-7: // // mi gzigs so // tshad med pa ni sems kyi rgyud rten med pas tshad med pa'o //
T03D3802:244a-8: rnam shes bstan du med pa ni rang gi mtshan
T03D3802:244a-9: nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir sems med par shes pa'o
T03D3802:244a-10: // sems bltar med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan lngas kyang sems de snang bar ma gyur pa'o //
T03D3802:244a-11: g-yo ba la sogs pa shes pa ni 'phro 'du
T03D3802:244a-12: la sogs pa lung ma bstan bcu bzhi la brten
T03D3802:244a-13: pa'o // de las gzhan pa de bzhin nyid kyis
T03D3802:244a-14: rnam par shes pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi
T03D3802:244a-15: bar de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin
T03D3802:244a-16: nyid dang 'gyur ba med cing la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:244a-17: thub pas de bzhin nyid rtogs ni phung po nas
T03D3802:244a-18: rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid thugs su
T03D3802:244a-19: chud pa'o ; /'jig rten ston pa'i le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o /
T03D3802:244a-21: // / le'u 'di nas lam shes kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid /
T03D3802:244a-22: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bzhi'o //
T03D3802:244a-23: lam shes kyi mtshan nyid bcu drug ni /
T03D3802:244a-24: stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang //
T03D3802:244a-25: smon pa rnam par spangs pa dang ;
T03D3802:244a-26: / skye med 'gag pa med sogs dang //
T03D3802:244a-27: chos nyid rnam par 'khrug med dang //
T03D3802:244a-28: 'du mi byed dang rnam mi rtog //
T03D3802:244a-29: rab dbye mtshan nyid med nyid la //
T03D3802:244a-30: lam shes nyid kyi skabs kyi ni //
T03D3802:244a-31: shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bshad do //
T03D3802:244a-34: yum zab mo'i mtshan nyid gang lags zhus pa'i lan
T03D3802:244a-35: yum gyi mtshan nyid ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan
T03D3802:244a-36: ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon
T03D3802:244a-37: par 'du bya ba med pa dang skye 'gag med
T03D3802:244a-38: pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa dang /
T03D3802:244a-40: ngo bo nyid med pa dang /
T03D3802:244a-41: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa dang bcu gnyis /
T03D3802:244a-42: dpe nam mkha' 'khrug pa med pa ni lha dang lha ma yin gyis mi 'khrugs pa'o //
T03D3802:244a-43: 'du byed pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyis 'dus ma byas pa'o //
T03D3802:244a-44: rnam par mi rtog pa ni nam mkha' la mtshan
T03D3802:244a-45: nyid smra ba ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'o
T03D3802:244a-46: // mtshan nyid med pa ni gzugs ni gzugs su
T03D3802:244b-0: rung ba'i mtshan nyid de zhes @244b pa nas rnam
T03D3802:244b-1: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mngon sum gyi
T03D3802:244b-2: // mtshan nyid de / de yang mtshan nyid med par mngon par sangs rgyas so //
T03D3802:244b-3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid bcu drug ni /
T03D3802:244b-4: de ni nyid kyi chos brten nas //
T03D3802:244b-5: gnas dang gus par bya ba dang //
T03D3802:244b-6: bla ma nyid dang mnyes pa dang //
T03D3802:244b-7: de la mchod dang byed med dang //
T03D3802:244b-8: kun 'jug mkhyen pa gang yin dang //
T03D3802:244b-9: ma mthong ston par mdzad pa dang //
T03D3802:244b-10: 'jig rten stong nyid rnam pa dang //
T03D3802:244b-11: brjod dang shes mdzad mngon sum dang //
T03D3802:244b-12: bsam mi khyab dang zhi nyid ston //
T03D3802:244b-14: rnam pa thams cad nyid brten nas //
T03D3802:244b-15: shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bshad do //
T03D3802:244b-17: yum la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
T03D3802:244b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa drin du gzo bas /
T03D3802:244b-19: gang nas gshegs pa'i lam de nyid nas bsnyen bkur byed pa'o //
T03D3802:244b-20: byed pa ni chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa la brten te /
T03D3802:244b-21: byed pa po med pa'i phyir ma byas pas sangs rgyas so //
T03D3802:244b-22: kun 'jug mkhyen pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
T03D3802:244b-23: byas pa med pa chos thams cad la 'jug pa
T03D3802:244b-25: mthong ba po med par ston pa ni chos thams cad gsog gsob snying po med pa'o //
T03D3802:244b-26: ma mthong ba ston pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen
T03D3802:244b-27: gyi bar du mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o
T03D3802:244b-28: // ci'i phyir de rnams ma mthong ba'i phyir ston pa lags /
T03D3802:244b-29: lan ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la dmigs
T03D3802:244b-30: pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe yum
T03D3802:244b-31: gyis de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing ston pa'o //
T03D3802:244b-32: 'jig rten du ston pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen
T03D3802:244b-33: gyi bar du stong zhes bya bar 'jig rten du
T03D3802:244b-34: ston pa'o // 'jig rten du phung po lnga stong zhes brjod do //
T03D3802:244b-35: 'jig rten na ston pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen
T03D3802:244b-36: gyi bar du 'jig rten na stong zhes bya bar
T03D3802:244b-37: ston to // bsam gyis mi khyab par ston pa
T03D3802:244b-38: ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar bsam gyis mi
T03D3802:244b-39: khyab ces bya bar bstan pa'o //
T03D3802:244b-40: dben par ston pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar dben par ston pa'o //
T03D3802:244b-41: mtha' las 'das pa stong par ston pa ni /
T03D3802:244b-42: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston pa'o //
T03D3802:244b-43: ngo bo nyid stong par ston pa ni gzugs nas
T03D3802:244b-44: rnam mkhyen gyi bar ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
T03D3802:245a-1: med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong par ston pa ni
T03D3802:245a-2: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar dngos po med pa'i
T03D3802:245a-3: ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston pa'o
T03D3802:245a-4: / 'jig rten zhi bar ston pa ni /
T03D3802:245a-5: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi 'jig rten zhi bar zhes bya ba ston to //
T03D3802:245a-6: 'jig rten stong pa nyid ni gzugs nas rnam /
T03D3802:245a-7: mkhyen gyi bar stong pa nyid do //
T03D3802:245a-9: 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gyi 'du shes med /
T03D3802:245a-10: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid mdor bstan ni /
T03D3802:245a-11: bsam mi khyab sogs khyad par gyi //
T03D3802:245a-12: khyad zhugs bden pa'i spyod yul can //
T03D3802:245a-13: skad cig ma ni bcu drug gis //
T03D3802:245a-14: khyad par mtshan nyid bshad pa yin //
T03D3802:245a-15: zhes pa ni kun rdzob kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab /
T03D3802:245a-18: sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:245a-19: bsam mi khyab dang mi mnyam dang //
T03D3802:245a-20: gzhal dang bgrang las yang dag 'das //
T03D3802:245a-21: 'phags pa kun sdud mkhas pa yis //
T03D3802:245a-22: rig bya thun mong med shes rig / shes myur nyung dang mang med dang //
T03D3802:245a-23: sgrub dang yang dag 'grub pa dang //
T03D3802:245a-24: dmigs pa rten dang bcas pa dang //
T03D3802:245a-25: mtha' dag pa dang yongs 'dzin dang //
T03D3802:245a-26: ro myong med pa'i khyad par gyis //
T03D3802:245a-27: bcu drug bdag nyid shes par bya //
T03D3802:245a-29: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni bsam pa las 'das pa'o//
T03D3802:245a-30: dpag tu med pa ni dpag par mi nus pa'o //
T03D3802:245a-31: gzhal du med pa ni gzhal bar mi nus pa'o //
T03D3802:245a-32: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ni mnyam pa med pa'o //
T03D3802:245a-33: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o /
T03D3802:245a-35: // /'phags pa kun sdud pa ni yum du pha rol
T03D3802:245a-36: tu phyin pa lnga nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du
T03D3802:245a-37: 'dus te / de cis na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /
T03D3802:245a-38: mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas so //
T03D3802:245a-40: yum 'di gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar 'dzin chags
T03D3802:245a-41: med pa gnas pa lags zhes pa'i lan rab 'byor
T03D3802:245a-42: gyis gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la 'dzin chags
T03D3802:245a-43: mthong ngam zhes pa'i lan gsol pa //
T03D3802:245a-46: ngas kyang gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
T03D3802:245a-47: ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin /
T03D3802:245a-48: yongs su mi 'dzin pas nye bar mi len to //
T03D3802:245a-49: byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pas kyang yongs su gzung ba dang /
T03D3802:245b-0: 'dzin pa @245b dang chags par mi bya'o //
T03D3802:245b-1: mkhas pas rig pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bus gsol pa /
T03D3802:245b-2: yum 'di ltar zab pa 'di ltar phra ba 'di
T03D3802:245b-3: ltar rtogs par dka' ba 'di la mos pa ni
T03D3802:245b-4: / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'o la sogs pa'o //
T03D3802:245b-5: thun mong ma yin pa ni stong gsum gyi dad
T03D3802:245b-6: pas rjes su 'brang ba la sogs pa'i shes pa
T03D3802:245b-7: dang spobs pa gang yin pa de byang chub sems
T03D3802:245b-8: dpa'i gdugs gcig gi bzod pa'o //
T03D3802:245b-9: myur ba ni rigs kyi bu yum la spyod pa ni myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o //
T03D3802:245b-10: bri ba dang gang ba med pa ni yum 'di
T03D3802:245b-11: la brten nas 'phags pa thams cad byung ba yang
T03D3802:245b-12: bri ba dang gang ba mi gda'o zhes nas gzhan
T03D3802:245b-13: du 'khod do // sgrub pa ni yum 'dri ba
T03D3802:245b-14: la sogs pa'i mos pa byed pa ni sangs rgyas
T03D3802:245b-15: kyi zhing gzhan dang dga' ldan gyi gnas dang mi'i
T03D3802:245b-16: nang du sngon yum spyad pa'o //
T03D3802:245b-17: yang dag par 'grub pa ni sngon gyi mthar phar
T03D3802:245b-18: phyin nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yongs su ma dris
T03D3802:245b-19: brtag pa ma byas pas 'di bstan pa'i tshe nem
T03D3802:245b-21: da lta spyod pa'i tshe the tshom du gyur nas
T03D3802:245b-22: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa la ma
T03D3802:245b-23: bslabs mthun par ma byas pas theg pa dman par
T03D3802:245b-24: 'gyur ro // 'dus pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o /
T03D3802:245b-26: // / gru zhig pa'i tshe mi ro la sogs pa
T03D3802:245b-27: la 'jug pa dang ma 'jus pa'i dpes dmigs pa'i
T03D3802:245b-28: khyad par dang / rdza so btang ba dang ma
T03D3802:245b-29: btang bar chu blugs pa'i dpes rten gyi khyad par
T03D3802:245b-30: khyad par dang / dang / gru zag lhan ma
T03D3802:245b-31: byas pa dang byas pa'i dpes mtha' dag pa'i khyad
T03D3802:245b-32: khyad par dang / dang / par dang / rgan
T03D3802:245b-33: po la mis brten pa dang ma brten pa'i dpes

T03D3802:249b-39: dmag gi gtam gyi sbyor ba ni chos nyid la byams sdang med do //

T03D3802:250b-26: dngos po brjod du med pa la //

T03D3802:251b-39: / de spang ba'i phyir rnam thar sgo gsum ston pa'o //
T03D3802:251b-40: ma chags pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni sems can
T03D3802:251b-41: 'di dag ni yun ring po nas phyin ci log
T03D3802:251b-42: bzhi la spyod pas de spang ba'i phyir rnam thar
T03D3802:251b-43: sgo gsum mo // mi dmigs pa'i thabs la mkhas
T03D3802:251b-44: pa ni gzugs nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
T03D3802:251b-45: pa'i bar dmigs pa'i nyes pa de dag med par
T03D3802:251b-46: bya'o snyam ste chos ston pa'o //
T03D3802:251b-47: mtshan ma med pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni sems
T03D3802:251b-48: can 'di dag yun ring po nas mtshan ma la
T03D3802:251b-49: spyod pa ste / bud med dang skyes pa dang
T03D3802:251b-50: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi mtshan ma la
T03D3802:252a-1: thabs la mkhas pa ni sems can 'di dag yun ring po nas smon lam la spyod pa ste /
T03D3802:252a-2: brgya byin la mngon par dga' ba gzugs nas rnam
T03D3802:252a-3: mkhyen gyi bar la mngon par dga' ba'i smon lam
T03D3802:252a-4: gyi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir smon pa med pa'i
T03D3802:252a-5: chos ston pa'o // tshad med pa'i thabs la mkhas
T03D3802:252a-6: pa ni snying rje'i dbang gis ji skad du dris
T03D3802:252a-8: rnam thar sgo gsum gyi thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o /
T03D3802:252a-10: // / sbyor lam gyi rtse mo la bzhi las rtags
T03D3802:252a-11: dang rnam par 'phel ba la sogs pa bzhis ston
T03D3802:252a-13: rmi lam na yang tshes rnams kun //
T03D3802:252a-14: rmi lam lta bur lta la sogs //
T03D3802:252a-15: rtse mor phyin pa'i sbyor ba'i rtags //
T03D3802:252a-16: rnam pa bcu gnyis dag tu bzhed //
T03D3802:252a-18: rmi lam lta bur mthong ba'i rtags ni rmi lam
T03D3802:252a-19: gyi gnas skabs na chos thams cad rmi lam nas
T03D3802:252a-20: / sprul pa'i bar lta bur mthong ba'o //
T03D3802:252a-21: 'dod bzad pa'i rtags ni khams gsum dang nyan rang
T03D3802:252a-22: gi byang chub rmi lam na yang mi 'dod pa'o
T03D3802:252a-23: // de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ni sangs rgyas 'khor mang pos bskor ba mthong ba'o //
T03D3802:252a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mthong ba ni nam
T03D3802:252a-25: mkha' la 'phags shing sprul pa 'gyed pa mthong ba'o
T03D3802:252a-26: // chos ston pa mthong ba ni grong la sogs
T03D3802:252a-27: pa bcom pa mthong nas rmi lam mam sad pa
T03D3802:252a-28: na'ang chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur bstan snyam
T03D3802:252a-29: // pa'o // snying rje phun sum tshogs pa ni
T03D3802:252a-30: rmi lam mam sad pa na ngan song gsum mthong
T03D3802:252a-31: na de lta bu'i ming yang med par bya ba'i
T03D3802:252a-32: // pa'o // phyir brtson pa'o // bden pa'i tshig
T03D3802:252a-33: grub pa ni grong khyer tshig pa mthong na de
T03D3802:252a-35: mthu phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags ni skyes pa dang
T03D3802:252a-36: bud med mi ma yin pas zin pa mthong na
T03D3802:252a-38: mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i rtags la gsum las /
T03D3802:252a-39: yon tan gyi gzhi las byung ba dang /
T03D3802:252a-40: ming gi gzhi las byung ba dang /
T03D3802:252a-41: dben pa'i gzhi las byung ba'i bdud kyi phye 'thor las nga rgyal mi skye ba'o //
T03D3802:252a-42: pha rol gnon pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
T03D3802:252a-43: pha rol tu phyin pa drug nas sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3802:252a-44: chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni ston
T03D3802:252a-45: pa'o // sgron ma blo shes pa shes rab bo //
T03D3802:252a-46: des bstan pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i rtags
T03D3802:252b-0: ni shes @252b rab pha rol phyin pa la mtshan
T03D3802:252b-1: nyid med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad la
T03D3802:252b-2: spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid med pa'o //
T03D3802:252b-3: rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba'i rtags ni bdag
T03D3802:252b-4: tu 'dzin pas 'khor zhing 'khyams pas bdag med pa
T03D3802:252b-5: ni rnam par byang ba de rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T03D3802:252b-6: dang nye ba'o // rnam par 'phel ba ni /
T03D3802:252b-7: 'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo snyed //
T03D3802:252b-8: sangs rgyas mchod pa'i dge ba sogs //
T03D3802:252b-9: dper mdzad nas ni rnam mang du //
T03D3802:252b-10: rnam 'phel bcu drug bdag nyid do //
T03D3802:252b-11: zhes pas 'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo la sogs
T03D3802:252b-12: pa mchod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba ni
T03D3802:252b-13: stong gsum gyi sems can ji snyed pa thams cad
T03D3802:252b-14: snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te
T03D3802:252b-15: / sangs rgyas pa de dag la rim gro byas pa dang /
T03D3802:252b-16: de dag dge ba bcu nas dgra bcom pa'i bar la bkod pa bas /
T03D3802:252b-17: rigs kyi bus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3802:252b-18: pa 'di gzhan la ston pa la sogs pa byas
T03D3802:252b-19: na bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //
T03D3802:252b-20: de cis na thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur /
T03D3802:252b-21: yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ba'o //
T03D3802:252b-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la
T03D3802:252b-23: byed pa ni nor bu rin po che rnyed nas
T03D3802:252b-24: bor na sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur pa'i dpes yum
T03D3802:252b-25: yid la byed pa mi dor ba'o //
T03D3802:252b-26: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
T03D3802:252b-27: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam /
T03D3802:252b-28: de rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam /
T03D3802:252b-29: de ma yin pa gzhan zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam /
T03D3802:252b-30: bka' stsal ba de ni ma yin no //
T03D3802:252b-31: rab 'byor gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03D3802:252b-32: gang spyod pa dang gang gis spyod pa de mthong snyam na /
T03D3802:252b-35: ma mthong ba de nyid mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'o //
T03D3802:252b-36: byang chub par byed pa dang /
T03D3802:252b-37: byang chub par byed pa dang /
T03D3802:252b-38: byang chub par bya ba mi dmigs pa mi gang
T03D3802:252b-39: gis byang chub par bya ba la sogs pa yang
T03D3802:252b-40: dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'o //
T03D3802:252b-41: rnam par rtog pa spang ba'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o /
T03D3802:252b-43: // / dge ba bcu la sogs pa zil gyis gnon
T03D3802:252b-44: pa'i stong gsum gyi sems can rnams dge ba bcu
T03D3802:252b-46: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bkod pa bas /
T03D3802:252b-47: rigs kyi bu yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
T03D3802:253a-0: @253a * // lha'i rigs thams cad 'ong ba ni rigs kyi bu
T03D3802:253a-1: yum 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i drung du lha'i bu
T03D3802:253a-3: bdud kyi bar chad yong ba'i gang zag bcu gnyis ni /
T03D3802:253a-6: dge bshes dang bral ba dang /
T03D3802:253a-7: yum ma yin pa la slob pa dang /
T03D3802:253a-8: yum ma yin pa la bsngags pa dang /
T03D3802:253a-9: zab mo'i gting mi rtogs zer ba dang /
T03D3802:253a-12: ming rus kyis dregs pa dang /
T03D3802:253a-15: byang chub sems dpa' nang rtsod pa dang /
T03D3802:253a-16: zhing khyad par can la rtsod pa'o //
T03D3802:253a-17: mthu bcom pa ni rigs kyi bu yum 'dzin pa
T03D3802:253a-18: la sogs pa la bdud zug rngu langs nas bar
T03D3802:253a-19: chod byas kyang mi tshugs pa'o //
T03D3802:253a-20: ston pa dang mtshungs pa ni rigs kyi bu yum
T03D3802:253a-21: 'dzin pa la sogs pa la ni ston pa dang
T03D3802:253a-22: mtshungs par lta ste gru gcig tu zhugs pa /
T03D3802:253a-24: spyod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun pa'o /
T03D3802:253a-27: // / bslab pa mnyam pa ni stong pa bco brgyad gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar stong pa'o //
T03D3802:253a-28: de la rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
T03D3802:253a-29: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar zad pa dang mi
T03D3802:253a-30: skye ba dang stong pa dang rang bzhin med par
T03D3802:253a-31: slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
T03D3802:253a-32: slob pa lags sam zhes pa'i lan zad pa dang
T03D3802:253a-33: mi skye ba dang dben pa dang ngo bo nyid
T03D3802:253a-34: med pa la slob na yum la slob pa lags
T03D3802:253a-35: sam zer ba de khyod kyis gzugs nas rnam mkhyen
T03D3802:253a-36: gyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid la zad pa dang
T03D3802:253a-37: mi skye ba dang stong pa dang rang bzhin med
T03D3802:253a-38: pa dang dben pa'i rang bzhin mthong ngam dris pas
T03D3802:253a-40: sangs rgyas kyi rigs can du 'gyur ba ni de
T03D3802:253a-41: ltar slob pa de pha rol tu phyin pa nas
T03D3802:253a-42: rnam mkhyen gyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
T03D3802:253a-44: sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyu mtshan ni mkhar gyi rgyal
T03D3802:253a-45: po bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i las bsags
T03D3802:253a-46: pa nyung ba'i dpes yum la slob pa dka'o //
T03D3802:253a-47: pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i sems
T03D3802:253a-48: mi skye ba ni de ltar spyod pa la ni
T03D3802:253a-49: ser sna la sogs pa mi 'byung ngo //
T03D3802:253a-50: gzugs la sogs pa mi 'dzin pa ni yum la
T03D3802:253a-51: spyod pa de gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du
T03D3802:253a-53: dge ba thams cad sdud pa ni 'jig tshogs kyi
T03D3802:253a-54: lta bar lta ba thams cad 'dus pas rjes 'gro
T03D3802:253b-0: dang / srog gi dbang po @253b 'gags na dbang
T03D3802:253b-1: po gzhan 'gags pas ldog pa'i dpes yum du dge
T03D3802:253b-3: phun sum tshogs pa thob pa ni yum yod na dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T03D3802:253b-4: rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba ni nyan thos
T03D3802:253b-5: dang rang sangs rgyas dang rang la rdzogs pa'i byang
T03D3802:253b-7: bslab pa mnyam pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o /
T03D3802:253b-10: sems can don yongs mi gtong ba //
T03D3802:253b-11: kun mkhyen nyid gsum chos rnams kyis //
T03D3802:253b-12: yongs su rdzogs pa bla med pa //
T03D3802:253b-13: nges pa zhes ni rab tu brjod //
T03D3802:253b-14: ces pa ni brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
T03D3802:253b-15: pha rol tu phyin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos
T03D3802:253b-16: ma 'dres pa'i bar thob pas kyang dag pa gzhan
T03D3802:253b-18: bla na med pa'i byang chub lta ci smos /
T03D3802:253b-19: sems can gang bla na med pa'i byang chub la mos shing dmigs pa las /
T03D3802:253b-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
T03D3802:253b-21: chos rang 'byung gi chos zag pa med pa'i chos
T03D3802:253b-22: rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / sems kun
T03D3802:253b-24: gling bzhi pa dang stong dag dang //
T03D3802:253b-25: stong gnyis gsum dag dper byas nas //
T03D3802:253b-26: bsod nams mang po nyid kyis ni //
T03D3802:253b-27: ting 'dzin yongs su bsgrag pa yin //
T03D3802:253b-28: zhes pa ni sems dang po bskyed pa dang /
T03D3802:253b-29: spyod pa yun ring po sbyangs pa'i sems bskyed pa
T03D3802:253b-30: la rjes su yi rang ba ni tshad gzung bar
T03D3802:253b-31: mi nus kyi / stong gsum gyi rdul phra rab
T03D3802:253b-32: de rnams kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams skra'i nyag
T03D3802:253b-33: ma re res blangs nas tshad gzung bar yang mi
T03D3802:253b-34: mi nus kyi / nus so // gzung rtog gi mdor bstan ni /
T03D3802:253b-35: 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa dang //
T03D3802:253b-36: gzung ba'i rnam rtog so sor de //
T03D3802:253b-37: dgu yi bdag nyid ji bzhin yul //
T03D3802:253b-38: min pa'i bdag nyid dag ces bya //
T03D3802:253b-40: 'jug ldog gi rnam rtog gi dbye ba'o //
T03D3802:253b-41: yul ji lta ba ma yin pa ni phyin ci log ste /
T03D3802:253b-44: sems can rdzas dang btags yod pa //
T03D3802:253b-46: so so'i skye bo 'phags dbye bas //
T03D3802:253b-47: so sor de dag dgu bdag nyid //
T03D3802:253b-48: gal te gzung don de bzhin med //
T03D3802:253b-51: so so'i skye bo'i rnam rtog rdzas su 'dod pa dang /
T03D3802:253b-52: 'phags pa'i rnam rtog btags pa gnyis ni dbye ba'o //
T03D3802:253b-53: gzung ba med par 'dzin pa ni //
T03D3802:253b-54: phyin ci log ste rnam rtog go //
T03D3802:254a-0: @254a * // de re re la'ang dgu dgu'o //
T03D3802:254a-1: 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi rnam rtog rgyas bshad ni //
T03D3802:254a-2: ngo bo nyid dang rigs dang ni //
T03D3802:254a-3: lam ni yang dag 'grub pa dang //
T03D3802:254a-4: shes pa'i dmigs pa ma 'khrul dang //
T03D3802:254a-5: mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dang //
T03D3802:254a-6: rang gis rtogs dang byed pa dang //
T03D3802:254a-7: de yi las byas 'bras bu la //
T03D3802:254a-8: 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi rten can gyi //
T03D3802:254a-9: rnam rtog der ni rnam dgur 'dod //
T03D3802:254a-10: ces pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi rnam rtog ni rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
T03D3802:254a-11: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems ji ltar 'tshang rgya lags
T03D3802:254a-12: kyi lan khyod kyis sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta
T03D3802:254a-13: bu'i sems dang / de las gzhan pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
T03D3802:254a-14: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa ma mthong lags /
T03D3802:254a-15: de cis na kun nas nyon mongs dang rnam byang
T03D3802:254a-16: gi chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas sangs
T03D3802:254a-18: de cis na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
T03D3802:254a-19: rigs la rnam par rtog pa ni nam mkha' dang
T03D3802:254a-20: sprul pa dang gzugs brnyan dang 'khrul 'khor la nye
T03D3802:254a-21: ring med pa'i dpes byang chub sems dpa' yum la
T03D3802:254a-22: spyod pa ni nyan rang dang ring la /
T03D3802:254a-23: rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye'o snyam du mi sems so //
T03D3802:254a-24: de cis na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du rnam par mi rtog pas so //
T03D3802:254a-25: lam 'grub pa la mi rtog pa ni rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
T03D3802:254a-26: chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog na 'gro ba
T03D3802:254a-27: rigs drug rgyun zhugs la sogs pa'i 'phags pa ji
T03D3802:254a-28: ltar byung ba lag pa zhes pa'i lan rigs drug
T03D3802:254a-30: rgyun zhugs la sogs pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa las yin no //
T03D3802:254a-33: // / shes pa'i dmigs pa ma 'khrul ba'i rtog pa ni sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
T03D3802:254a-34: rigs kyi bu yum la spyod pa ni pha rol
T03D3802:254a-35: tu phyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi snying
T03D3802:254a-36: po la spyod pa lags so //
T03D3802:254a-38: byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa la snying
T03D3802:254a-39: po med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na gzugs nas
T03D3802:254a-40: rnam mkhyen gyi bar du snying po la spyod pa
T03D3802:254a-41: lta ci smos / mi mthun pa'i gnyen po'i rnam
T03D3802:254a-42: rtog ni byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod kyang
T03D3802:254a-43: lta ci smos / / yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed pa ni dka' ba byed pa'o //
T03D3802:254a-44: rang gi rtog pa'i rnam rtog ni rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
T03D3802:254b-0: yum la spyod kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed @254b pa ni dka' ste /
T03D3802:254b-1: de bas kyang sems can thams cad bla na med
T03D3802:254b-2: pa'i byang chub la dgong par 'dod pa ni dka'o
T03D3802:254b-3: // de cis na nam mkha' med pa dang stong
T03D3802:254b-4: pa dang dben pa dang gsog dang gsob bzhin du
T03D3802:254b-5: sems can med pa'i don byed pa ni nam mkha'
T03D3802:254b-6: dang rtsod par 'dod pa nam mkha' 'dul bar 'dod
T03D3802:254b-7: // pa'o // de cis na chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:254b-8: de ltar rtogs pa'i phan yon drug ni lha rnams phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T03D3802:254b-10: bdud kyi bar chad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /
T03D3802:254b-11: lha'i bu spro ba skyed pa dang /
T03D3802:254b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa ched du brjod pa mdzad pa dang /
T03D3802:254b-13: de bzhin nyid la gnas shing byang chub pa'o //
T03D3802:254b-14: byed pa'i rnam rtog ni de bzhin nyid kyang med de de las gzhan pa med na /
T03D3802:254b-15: de bzhin nyid la gnas nas sangs rgyas nas chos bstan nas lung ston pa gang yang med do //
T03D3802:254b-16: chags pa med pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o /
T03D3802:254b-18: // / las su bya ba'i rnam rtog ni rab 'byor
T03D3802:254b-19: ni ci dang ci ston pa de thams cad stong
T03D3802:254b-20: pa nyid las brtsams shing chos ston pas na /
T03D3802:254b-21: sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du yang med
T03D3802:254b-22: na sbyin pa la sogs pa la spyod pa lta
T03D3802:254b-23: ci smos / 'bras bu'i rnam par rtog pa ni
T03D3802:254b-24: 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis gnas pa des byang chub
T03D3802:254b-25: sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i char yang mi phod
T03D3802:254b-26: ci smos / do // de la dge slong brgya
T03D3802:254b-27: drug cu tsam mchod pa phul nas lung bstan pa'o
T03D3802:254b-28: ci smos / do // // byang chub sems dpa'i mthong lam dngos la drug ste /
T03D3802:254b-30: gzhan zad pa shes pa dang /
T03D3802:254b-31: mi skye ba shes pa dang /
T03D3802:254b-33: rten 'brel rang bzhin med pa la zad pa dang /
T03D3802:254b-34: yod par 'dod pa la byang chub med pa dang /
T03D3802:254b-35: 'khrul ba la 'khrul par ngo shes pa yum du
T03D3802:254b-36: yum yod na pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs
T03D3802:254b-37: pa'o // byang chub kyi rgyu gsum ni /
T03D3802:254b-38: byang chub la gzhan ston pa dang //
T03D3802:254b-39: de yi rgyu ni yongs gtod dang //
T03D3802:254b-40: de 'thob bar chad med pa'i rgyu //
T03D3802:254b-41: bsod nams mang po'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3802:254b-42: byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa de /
T03D3802:254b-43: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang dga' ldan gyi gnas dang /

T03D3802:255a-0: @255a * // yongs su gtad pa ni kun dga' bo /

T03D3802:255a-4: ro // nga ston pa yin pa bzhin du 'di yang ston pa yin no //
T03D3802:255a-5: 'di la mchod pa la sogs pa byas na dus
T03D3802:255a-6: gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang nga la mchod pa byas

T03D3802:255a-9: bsod nams mang ba ni stong gsum gyi sems can

T03D3802:255a-11: 'ga' zhig skad cig gam yud tsam byang chub sems
T03D3802:255a-12: dpa' la byin na bsod nams che'o //
T03D3802:255a-13: gang yang mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis de kho
T03D3802:255a-14: na nyid mthong ba ni mthong lam brdas bstan pa'o
T03D3802:255a-15: // zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa ni /
T03D3802:255a-16: dri ma zad dang mi skye ba'o //
T03D3802:255a-17: ye shes byang chub ces brjod de //
T03D3802:255a-18: zad med skye med phyir de dag / gom rims bzhin du shes par bya //
T03D3802:255a-20: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad yum las byung yang zad par ma gyur te /
T03D3802:255a-21: bsam gtan nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i
T03D3802:255a-22: bar ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro
T03D3802:255a-23: // de cis na skye ba'ang med na zad par mi 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
T03D3802:255a-24: yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nga gcig pa'o /
T03D3802:255a-26: // / rten 'brel rang bzhin med pa la zad pa dang skye ba mi 'thad pa ni /
T03D3802:255a-27: 'gog pa med pa'i rang bzhin la //
T03D3802:255a-28: mthong zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni //
T03D3802:255a-29: rnam par rtog rigs ci zhig zad //
T03D3802:255a-30: skye med rnam pa ci zhig thob //
T03D3802:255a-31: ces pa ni gzugs nas rten 'brel gyi bar du
T03D3802:255a-32: mi zad pa dang zad mi shes pas shes rab
T03D3802:255a-33: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par
T03D3802:255a-34: bya'o // yod par 'dod pa la grol ba mi 'thad pa ni /
T03D3802:255a-35: gzhan gyi chos rnams kyang yod la //
T03D3802:255a-36: shes bya la yang ston pa yi //
T03D3802:255a-37: sgrib pa zad par brjod pa gang //
T03D3802:255a-38: 'di la kho bos mtshar du brtsis //
T03D3802:255a-39: shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir ldog pa
T03D3802:255a-40: thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye

T03D3802:255a-43: 'khrul pa med pa la 'khrul bar ngo shes pa'i yum ni /

T03D3802:255a-45: bsnan par bya ba cung zad med //

T03D3802:255b-2: byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pas /

T03D3802:255b-9: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
T03D3802:255b-10: chos gang gis mthong bar gyur pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
T03D3802:255b-11: mi zad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis so /
T03D3802:255b-13: // / yum du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rdzogs pa ni /
T03D3802:255b-14: sbyin pa la sogs re re la //

T03D3802:255b-16: skad cig gcig gis bzod pa yis //

T03D3802:255b-19: skabs 'dir bsgom lam gyi ting nge 'dzin ni /

T03D3802:255b-21: ting nge 'dzin la zhes pa la sogs so //
T03D3802:255b-22: thod rgal gyi le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o; ;
T03D3802:255b-23: // le'u 'di nas mthong lam gyi rtog pa dgu gsum bsgom lam gyi rtog pa dgu bzhi ston /
T03D3802:255b-24: de la mthong lam gyi ldog pa'i phyogs kyi rtog pa ni /
T03D3802:255b-25: srid dang zhi bar ltung phyir dang //
T03D3802:255b-26: rtogs pa dman pa nyid dang ni //
T03D3802:255b-27: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang //
T03D3802:255b-28: lam gyi rnam pa ma tshang dag //
T03D3802:255b-29: gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gro ba dang //
T03D3802:255b-30: ched du bya ba log pa dang //
T03D3802:255b-31: nyi tshe ba sna tshogs nyid //
T03D3802:255b-32: gnas dang 'jug la rmongs pa dang //
T03D3802:255b-33: rjes la 'gro zhe bya ba la //
T03D3802:255b-34: rnam rtog dgu yi bdag nyid 'di //
T03D3802:255b-35: ldog pa'i phyogs kyi rten can de //
T03D3802:255b-36: nyan thos la sogs yid las 'byung //
T03D3802:255b-38: srid dang zhi bar mi ltung ba ni nyi ma'i
T03D3802:255b-39: dkyil 'khor ni gling bzhi la mthun par 'jug go'i
T03D3802:255b-40: dpe dang / rtogs pa dman pa nyid ni rin
T03D3802:255b-41: po che sna bdun dang bral na 'khor los sgyur
T03D3802:255b-42: ba'i ming mi thob pa'i dpe dang //
T03D3802:255b-43: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ni khyim thab med
T03D3802:255b-44: pa'i bud med 'phyon ma rnams kyis tshogs pa'i dpe
T03D3802:255b-45: dang / lam gyi rnam pa ma tshang ba ni

T03D3802:255b-47: dang / pa'i dpe dang / gzhan gyi rkyen gyis
T03D3802:255b-48: 'gro ba ni mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor los
T03D3802:255b-49: sgyur ba'i drung du nang nub 'gro ba'i dpe dang
T03D3802:255b-50: dang / pa'i dpe dang / / ched du bya ba log pa ni chu rnams gang g'a dang /
T03D3802:255b-51: 'grogs na rgya mtsho chen po rdol ba'i dpe dang /
T03D3802:256a-0: nyi tshe ba ni thabs rkyang pa @256a * //
T03D3802:256a-1: lag pa g-yon pa dang 'dra ba'i dpe dang /

T03D3802:256a-5: 'brang ba'i dpe yum gyi rjes su pha rol tu
T03D3802:256a-6: phyin pa lnga 'brang ba ni byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3802:256a-7: yin la / pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba ni nyan thos kyi yin no //
T03D3802:256a-8: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po /
T03D3802:256a-9: 'dzin pa dang ni gtong ba dang /
T03D3802:256a-10: yid la byed dang khams rnams ni //

T03D3802:256a-14: chags pa dang ni gnyen po dang //
T03D3802:256a-16: 'dzin pa dang por shes par bya //
T03D3802:256a-18: 'dzin pa dang gtong ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni

T03D3802:256a-20: ngo // yid la byed pa'i rtog pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yid la mi byed do//
T03D3802:256a-21: khams gsum dang nye bar 'brel pa ni gzugs nas

T03D3802:256a-23: dang 'brel lo // gnas kyi rtog pa ni byang
T03D3802:256a-24: chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa gzugs nas rnam
T03D3802:256a-25: mkhyen gyi bar la mi gnas so //
T03D3802:256a-26: mngon par zhen pa'i rtog pa chos de rnams la ma chags pa'o //
T03D3802:256a-27: chos kyi dngos po btags pa'i rtog pa /
T03D3802:256a-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03D3802:256a-29: des chos thams cad sgrub pa dang /
T03D3802:256a-30: des chos 'dzin par ma btags pa'o //
T03D3802:256a-31: chags pa'i rtog pa ni de tsho'i skyon med pa'o //
T03D3802:256a-32: gnyen po'i rtog pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du gzugs she'am /
T03D3802:256a-34: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang /
T03D3802:256a-35: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang /
T03D3802:256a-37: zhi ba dang ma zhi ba dang /
T03D3802:256a-38: stong pa dang mi stong pa dang /
T03D3802:256a-39: mtshan ma yod pa dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
T03D3802:256a-41: dben pa dang mi dben zhes bya bar mi rtog ste /

T03D3802:256a-44: gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ni gang dang gang 'gro
T03D3802:256a-45: ba de dang der dpung tshogs 'gro ba bzhin du

T03D3802:256a-47: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa /
T03D3802:256a-48: ched bzhin nges par mi 'byung dang //

T03D3802:256b-0: 'gag dang bcas pa'i @256b skye ba dang //
T03D3802:256b-1: dngos po ldan dang mi ldan dang //
T03D3802:256b-2: gnas dang rigs ni 'jig pa dang //
T03D3802:256b-3: don du gnyer dang rgyu med dang //
T03D3802:256b-4: phyir rgol ba ni dmigs pa la //
T03D3802:256b-5: 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gzhan yin no //
T03D3802:256b-7: ched bzhin du nges par mi 'byung ba'i rtog pa ni /

T03D3802:256b-9: rta la zhon nas lam mnyam pa nas 'gro ba'i

T03D3802:256b-11: kha lo bsgyur nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

T03D3802:256b-14: rtog pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3802:256b-15: thob par bya la shes rab kyi pha rol tu

T03D3802:256b-19: 'gag dang bcas pa'i skye ba ni chos thams cad

T03D3802:256b-26: gnas ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la mi gnas pa'o //
T03D3802:256b-27: rigs 'jig pa ni shing thog aa mra'am ba na

T03D3802:256b-38: pa'i dpes pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes rab

T03D3802:256b-41: // / bsgom lam gyi rnam par rtog pa bzhi las dang po ni /

T03D3802:256b-45: legs pa'i lam ni rnam gsum la //
T03D3802:256b-46: gzung ba'i rnam rtog 'di gcig ste //
T03D3802:256b-47: sbyor ba rnams kyi spyod yul can //
T03D3802:256b-49: mdor bsdus pa dang rgyas pa'i rnam par rtog pa

T03D3802:256b-51: cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro

T03D3802:257a-11: gnyis pa sems dang sems byung rnams //
T03D3802:257a-12: 'jug pa'i yul can yid byed de //

T03D3802:257a-15: theg pa dman pa yid byed dang //

T03D3802:257a-27: byed pa / bral / rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid
T03D3802:257a-28: la mi byed pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
T03D3802:257a-29: pa nyid kyi sems dang bral ba /
T03D3802:257a-30: bsgom dang sgom pa med pa dang /

T03D3802:257a-35: chos btags pa dang stong min nyid //

T03D3802:257a-37: dngos por byed dang theg gsum dang //

T03D3802:257a-39: spyod pa rnam par 'khrug pa la //
T03D3802:257a-40: 'dzin par byed pa dang po ste //
T03D3802:257a-41: shes par bya ba bsgrags pa yin //

T03D3802:257a-45: 'phel 'grib pa med par chos sum btags pa dang

T03D3802:257b-27: mi ldan pa yang ma yin /
T03D3802:257b-28: mi mnyam sdug bsngal la sogs ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid du shes pa'o //
T03D3802:257b-29: nyon mongs rnams kyi rang bzhin du gsum ni phan

T03D3802:257b-32: gnyis dang gnyis ma yin pas byang chub mi thob /

T03D3802:257b-36: rnam pa kun tu 'gro ba yi //
T03D3802:257b-37: bde sgrub pa yon tan phun tshogs kun //
T03D3802:257b-38: rgya mtsho che la chu bo bzhin //
T03D3802:257b-39: 'bras bu mchog gis spa ba yin //

T03D3802:257b-42: bo bzhis brgyan pa bzhin du bde ba sgrub pa'i
T03D3802:257b-43: yon tan phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ngo //
T03D3802:257b-44: chos gnyis kyi zhu ba mang po'i le'u steng bzhi pa'o /
T03D3802:257b-46: // / le'u 'di nas bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi zhus lan gsum /
T03D3802:257b-48: sems dpa' chen po de la ni //
T03D3802:257b-49: rnam pa kun du rten par byed //
T03D3802:258a-1: yang zab byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'ang dka' ba bgyid pa ste /
T03D3802:258a-2: dper na skyes bu la la zhig nam mkha' gzhi
T03D3802:258a-3: ma mchis pa la ljang bu skyed par 'tshal ba
T03D3802:258a-5: sems can med par sems can gyi don du sems bskyed pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa ste /
T03D3802:258a-6: dper na skyes bu la la zhig ljang bu bskyed par 'dod na /
T03D3802:258a-7: skyes bu des ljang bu de'i rtsa ba la sogs
T03D3802:258a-8: pa ma dmigs par 'dab ma dang 'bras bu la
T03D3802:258a-9: longs spyod par byed pa bzhin du sems can rnams
T03D3802:258a-10: ngan song gsum las bton nas mngon mtho dang nges
T03D3802:258a-11: legs la sogs pa la 'god pa ni chos rnams
T03D3802:258a-12: kyi de bzhin nyid rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs par
T03D3802:258a-13: brjod do // bsod nams kyi khyad par ni /
T03D3802:258a-14: stong gsum skye bo nyan thos dang //
T03D3802:258a-15: bse ru'i rtogs pa phun tshogs dang //
T03D3802:258a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med la //
T03D3802:258a-17: bkod pa'i dge ba spel mdzad nas //
T03D3802:258a-18: bsod nams mang po nyid kyis ni //
T03D3802:258a-19: sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar med de //
T03D3802:258a-20: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ;

T03D3802:258a-22: ces pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sems

T03D3802:258a-25: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa la bar gzhan gyis mchod pa'i phyir ro ;
T03D3802:258a-26: / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni /
T03D3802:258a-27: 'di yi dmigs pa dngos med de //
T03D3802:258a-28: bdag po dran pa yin par bzhed //
T03D3802:258a-29: rnam pa bzhi nyid 'di la ni //
T03D3802:258a-30: rab tu smra rnams brgyud mar rgol //
T03D3802:258a-32: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa /
T03D3802:258a-35: rab tu smra ba rgol ba ni rnam pa thams
T03D3802:258a-36: cad mkhyen pa nyid la dngos po med na 'di
T03D3802:258a-37: ltar mi 'thad do zhes nas rgol ba ni /
T03D3802:258a-38: dmigs pa 'thad dang de yi ni //
T03D3802:258a-39: ngo bo nyid nges gzung ba dang //
T03D3802:258a-40: rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes dang //
T03D3802:258a-41: dam pa'i don dang kun rdzob dang //
T03D3802:258a-42: skyor dang dkon mchog gsum po dang //
T03D3802:258a-43: thabs bcas zub thub pa'i rtogs pa dang //
T03D3802:258a-44: phyin ci log ni lam bcas dang //
T03D3802:258a-45: gnyen po mi mthun phyogs dag dang //
T03D3802:258a-46: mtshan nyid dang ni bsgom pa la //
T03D3802:258a-47: smra ba rnams kyi log rtogs pa //
T03D3802:258a-48: rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid brten nas //
T03D3802:258a-49: rnam pa bcu drug dag tu bzhed //
T03D3802:258b-0: @258b dmigs pa ni rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
T03D3802:258b-1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa
T03D3802:258b-2: med na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang dmigs
T03D3802:258b-3: pa ma mchis pa lags sam gyi lan /
T03D3802:258b-4: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang dmigs pa med pa de nyid dmigs pa'o //
T03D3802:258b-5: ngo bo nyid nges pa ni rab 'byor gyis gsol pa ;
T03D3802:258b-6: / chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis na sems

T03D3802:258b-8: gyi bar gyi sems can yongs su smin pa dang
