T03D3802:258b-12: pa de nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin
T03D3802:258b-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa ni ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3802:258b-15: chos thams cad dngos po med pa la rnam pa
T03D3802:258b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes mi 'thad
T03D3802:258b-17: zhus pa'i lan / yum la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin
T03D3802:258b-18: pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la spyod kyang mi
T03D3802:258b-19: rtog mtshan mar mi byed pa de dngos po yod
T03D3802:258b-20: pa'am dngos po med pa yid la mi byed pa
T03D3802:258b-21: de nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
T03D3802:258b-22: zhus pa'i lan / ye shes so // chos thams
T03D3802:258b-23: cad dngos po med na bden pa gnyis mi 'thad
T03D3802:258b-25: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi kun rdzob de ka dngos po med pa ni don dam mo //
T03D3802:258b-26: yang dag par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu lnga pa'o /
T03D3802:258b-29: byang chub kyi spyod pa gang lags /
T03D3802:258b-31: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar stong zhes bya bar spyod de /
T03D3802:258b-32: ci nas blo rnam pa gnyis su mi 'gyur ba ni sbyor ba'o //
T03D3802:258b-33: chos thams cad dngos po med pa la sangs rgyas mi 'thad do zhus pa'i lan /
T03D3802:258b-34: chos thams cad dngos po med par thugs su chud pa ni sangs rgyas so //
T03D3802:258b-35: chos dkon mchog ni chos thams cad dngos po med
T03D3802:258b-36: na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar skye 'gag dang
T03D3802:258b-37: 'khor 'das ma mchis par 'gyur ro zhus pa'i lan
T03D3802:258b-38: / gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar skye 'gag med pa la sogs pa de nyid chos yin ;
T03D3802:258b-40: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gnyis la spyod pas na dge lnga bcu bdun pa'o /
T03D3802:258b-42: // / tshul khrims kyis sems can rnams mi dge /
T03D3802:258b-43: dge 'dun ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis gsungs pa'i
T03D3802:258b-44: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi don rtogs nas
T03D3802:259a-0: bsnyen bkur ba'o // dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur ba'i @259a * //
T03D3802:259a-1: le'u ste lnga bcu drug pa'o /
T03D3802:259a-3: // / thabs bcas ni sbyin pas sems can rnams ser sna las zlog pa'o //
T03D3802:259a-4: sbyin pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu bdun pa'o /
T03D3802:259a-6: // / tshul khrims kyis sems can rnams mi dge ba las zlog pa'o //
T03D3802:259a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa bzhis sems can gyi don
T03D3802:259a-8: du pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi la spyod pa'o
T03D3802:259a-9: // pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi thabs kyi le'u ste lnga bcu brgyad pa'o /
T03D3802:259a-11: // / thub pa'i rtogs pa ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen
T03D3802:259a-12: gyi bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid las
T03D3802:259a-13: mi g-yo bas dngos po dang dngos po med pa
T03D3802:259a-14: dang gnyis ka dang gnyis ka ma yin pa bzhis
T03D3802:259a-15: byang chub mi thob par spros pa med pa ni
T03D3802:259a-17: phyin ci log ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar
T03D3802:259a-18: du rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya
T03D3802:259a-19: ba la sogs pa spros pa yin pas de tsho
T03D3802:259a-20: ni byang chub sems dpa' mi spro'o //
T03D3802:259a-21: de cis na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ni
T03D3802:259a-22: spror med pa ste dngos po med pa'i phyir ro
T03D3802:259a-23: // lam bcas ni chos thams cad dngos po med
T03D3802:259a-24: na rgyun zhugs la sogs pa 'phags pa'i gang zag
T03D3802:259a-25: rnams ji ltar mchis pa lags kyi lan /
T03D3802:259a-26: chos nyid brtsan par byas nas rgyun zhugs la sogs pa'i lam dngos po med pa ste /
T03D3802:259a-27: byang chub kyi phyogs la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3802:259a-28: gnyen po ni chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis
T03D3802:259a-29: na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la ji ltar
T03D3802:259a-31: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar chos 'dul ba 'di
T03D3802:259a-32: la ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang
T03D3802:259a-33: ma yin pa la sogs par shes pa ni byang
T03D3802:259a-35: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba gang lags kyi lan /
T03D3802:259a-36: 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la nyon mongs pa rnams
T03D3802:259a-37: dang gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du ldan pa
T03D3802:259a-38: yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa
T03D3802:259a-40: mtshan nyid ni chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis
T03D3802:259a-41: na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar dngos po ma

T03D3802:259a-44: sngar mtshan nyid gcig med pa yod par 'gyur ba med do //
T03D3802:259b-0: sgom pa ni chos thams cad @259b mtshan nyid ma
T03D3802:259b-1: mchis dngos po ma mchis na sgom pa ma mchis
T03D3802:259b-3: sgom pa ma mchis pa de nyid sgom pa yin
T03D3802:259b-4: te gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang mi sgom
T03D3802:259b-7: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo //
T03D3802:259b-9: mig dang gzugs nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub kyi bar gnyis ni dngos po'o //
T03D3802:259b-10: dngos po'i 'du shes can la sbyin pa la sogs pa med do //

T03D3802:259b-16: sbyin pa shes rab bar dag dang //
T03D3802:259b-17: sangs rgyas la sogs dran dang chos //
T03D3802:259b-18: dngos med ngo bo nyid kyis de //
T03D3802:259b-19: mthar gyis pa yi bya bar bzhed //

T03D3802:259b-22: slob pa'o // rjes su dran pa drug ni sangs
T03D3802:259b-23: rgyas la phung po lnga la sogs par yid la

T03D3802:259b-29: lha 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams kyi lhar yid la mi byed pa'o //
T03D3802:259b-30: dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni rjes su dran pa drug go //
T03D3802:259b-31: chos thams cad dngos po med par yid la mi byed pa dang bcu gsum mo //
T03D3802:259b-32: mthar gyis pa'i le'u ste drug bcu pa'o /
T03D3802:259b-35: dngos po med pa'i skad cig ma ni /

T03D3802:259b-37: zag med chos kun bsdus pa'i phyir //
T03D3802:259b-38: thub pa'i skad cig gcig pa yi //

T03D3802:259b-44: ji ltar skyes bus zo chun rgyun //
T03D3802:259b-45: rdogs [?] thabs gcig gis bskyod pa na //
T03D3802:259b-46: thams cad cig car 'gul ba ltar //
T03D3802:259b-47: skad cig gcig shos de bzhin no //
T03D3802:260a-1: pa med pa'i skad cig ni /
T03D3802:260a-2: gang tshe chos dkar thams cad kyi //
T03D3802:260a-3: rang bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin //
T03D3802:260a-4: rnam smin chos nyid gnas skabs skyes //
T03D3802:260a-5: de tshe skad cig gcig shes bya //
T03D3802:260a-6: zhes pa ni chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa
T03D3802:260a-7: byed pa med pa dmigs pa med par pha rol
T03D3802:260a-8: tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T03D3802:260a-9: mtshan ma med pa'i le'u ste drug cu gcig pa'o /
T03D3802:260a-11: // / mtshan nyid med pa'i skad cig ma ni //
T03D3802:260a-12: sbyin la sogs la spyod pa yis //
T03D3802:260a-13: chos kun rmi lam 'drar gnas nas //
T03D3802:260a-14: chos kun mtshan nyid med par ni //
T03D3802:260a-15: skad cig ma ni gcig gis rtogs //
T03D3802:260a-16: zhes pa ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma la sogs
T03D3802:260a-17: pa lta bu'i nyer len gyi phung po lnga la

T03D3802:260a-19: ni rmi lam la sogs pa la mtshan nyid med
T03D3802:260a-20: do // gnyis su med pa'i skad cig ma ni /
T03D3802:260a-21: rmi lam dang ni de mthong nyid //
T03D3802:260a-22: gnyis kyi tshul du mi mthong ltar //
T03D3802:260a-23: chos rnams gnyis su med par ni //
T03D3802:260a-24: skad cig ma ni gcig gis mthong //
T03D3802:260a-25: zhes pa ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma la sogs
T03D3802:260a-26: pa lta bu'i nyer len gyi phung po lnga la
T03D3802:260a-27: gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs pa

T03D3802:260a-29: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan /
T03D3802:260a-30: ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni /
T03D3802:260a-31: thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ni //
T03D3802:260a-32: zag med chos kun rnam kun du //
T03D3802:260a-33: rnam par dag 'gyur gang dag yin //
T03D3802:260a-34: de dag rang gi mtshan nyid can //
T03D3802:260a-35: zhes pa ni zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad
T03D3802:260a-36: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ni ma bcos
T03D3802:260a-37: pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T03D3802:260a-38: mtshan nyid med pa'i le'u ste drug bcu gnyis pa'o /
T03D3802:260a-40: // / le'u 'di nas 'gro rnams zhi ba dang /
T03D3802:260a-41: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ston pa ni zhus lan drug / phyogs bskor bdun /
T03D3802:260a-42: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ste bzhi bcu ston pa las /
T03D3802:260a-43: 'gro rnams zhi ba'i las dang ni //
T03D3802:260a-44: bsdu rnams bzhi la 'god pa dang //
T03D3802:260a-45: kun nas nyon mongs bcas pa yis //
T03D3802:260a-46: rnam par byang ba rtogs pa dang //
T03D3802:260a-47: bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can gyi //
T03D3802:260a-48: don dang pha rol phyin drug dang //
T03D3802:260a-49: sangs rgyas lam dang rang bzhin gyis //
T03D3802:260a-50: stong pa nyid dang gnyis zad dang //
T03D3802:260b-0: brda dang dmigs pa med @260b pa dang //

T03D3802:260b-4: byang chub thob dang sangs rgyas zhing //
T03D3802:260b-5: rnam par dag dang nges pa dang //
T03D3802:260b-6: sems can don ni tshad med dang //
T03D3802:260b-7: sangs rgyas bsten sogs yon tan dang //
T03D3802:260b-8: byang chub yan lag las rnams ni //
T03D3802:260b-9: chud mi za dang bden mthong dang //
T03D3802:260b-10: phyin ci log ni spongs pa dang //
T03D3802:260b-11: de bzhin med pa'i tshul dang ni //
T03D3802:260b-12: rnam par byang dang tshogs dang ni //
T03D3802:260b-14: tha dad nyid du mi mthong dang //
T03D3802:260b-15: mya ngan las 'das la 'god pa ni //
T03D3802:260b-16: chos kyi sku yi phrin las te //
T03D3802:260b-17: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du 'dod //
T03D3802:260b-19: dang po ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu

T03D3802:260b-21: stong pa la sems bskyed nas sems can gyi don

T03D3802:260b-27: dge mi dge'i las kyis 'gro drug gi snang ba shar bas byang chub sems dpa' don mdzad do //

T03D3802:260b-29: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sems can gyi don mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar lags so //
T03D3802:260b-31: chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa la sems bskyed
T03D3802:260b-32: nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can
T03D3802:260b-33: gyi don mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos
T03D3802:260b-34: so // gsum pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /

T03D3802:260b-44: phyogs bcu'i gzugs khams kyi lha /
T03D3802:260b-45: phyogs bcu'i mi rnams kyi don byed pa mthong ngo //
T03D3802:260b-46: bsdu ba bzhi ni zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /
T03D3802:261a-1: kyi sbyin pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas
T03D3802:261a-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi chos
T03D3802:261a-3: sku dang / mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T03D3802:261a-4: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i longs sku dang /
T03D3802:261a-5: yi ges yi ge med pa'i don rtogs par gyis
T03D3802:261a-6: shig ces pa yan chod chos kyi sbyin pa dang
T03D3802:261a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod pa ni snyan
T03D3802:261a-9: de drug gi don la don spyod pa ni don spyod pa dang /

T03D3802:268a-4: chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
T03D3802:268a-5: kyang de la mi rtog cing de yongs su gtong
T03D3802:268a-6: ba'i tshe / ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir /
T03D3802:268a-10: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas bdag kyang 'khor
T03D3802:268a-11: ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni
T03D3802:268a-12: dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi lam mo //
T03D3802:268a-13: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i le'u ste re brgyad pa'o /
T03D3802:268a-15: // / le'u 'di nas mdzad pa gnyis las /
T03D3802:268a-16: las rnams chud mi za ba ni //
T03D3802:268a-17: gsol ba chos de rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos lags na sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags /
T03D3802:268a-18: de'i len sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar thob
T03D3802:268a-19: par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin
T03D3802:268a-20: la / thob pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so //
T03D3802:268a-21: gsol ba chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis
T03D3802:268a-22: stong pa la dmyal ba nas sangs rgyas kyi dbye
T03D3802:268a-24: las dang las kyi rnam smin med par 'gyur ro //
T03D3802:268a-25: de'i lan dngos po la las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa'i bya ba med kyang /
T03D3802:268a-26: sems can rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par ma shes pas ngan par spyad pas ngan song /
T03D3802:268a-27: legs par spyad pas mtho ris su skye'o //
T03D3802:268a-28: de la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nas rnam
T03D3802:268a-29: mkhyen gyi bar du spyad nas sems can rnams kyi
T03D3802:268a-30: don byed do // gsol pa sangs rgyas nas 'gro
T03D3802:268a-31: ba rgyud lnga nas dge sdig yod par gzigs sam
T03D3802:268a-32: don byed do // ma gzigs / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs na dngos por 'gro //
T03D3802:268a-33: ma gzigs na las dang las kyi rnam smin ji lta bu lung bstan lags kyi lan /
T03D3802:268a-34: sems can rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par
T03D3802:268a-35: ma shes pas bden par bzung ba la de mi
T03D3802:268a-37: gzugs nas rga shi'i bar dang /
T03D3802:268a-38: dmigs pa bcu gcig mi bden par bstan to //
T03D3802:268a-39: bden pa'i mdzad pa zhus lan gsum las /
T03D3802:268a-40: dang po chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na /
T03D3802:268a-41: sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams ji ltar grol bar mdzad /
T03D3802:268a-42: de'i lan chos thams cad bden bzhir bstan nas 'grol lo //
T03D3802:268a-43: zhus len gnyis pa bden pa bzhis grol lam /
T03D3802:268a-44: bden pa bzhi shes pas grol la /
T03D3802:268b-0: de'i lan bden pa dang bden pa shes pa las grol ba ma yin @268b gyi ;
T03D3802:268b-1: bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T03D3802:268b-2: zhus lan gsum pa mnyam pa nyid de gang lags kyi lan /
T03D3802:268b-3: chos nyid bdun rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:268b-4: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i le'u ste re dgu pa'o /
T03D3802:268b-6: // / le'u 'di nas phyin ci log spangs pa dang /
T03D3802:268b-7: de'i gzhi med pa'i phrin las gnyis las /
T03D3802:268b-8: dang po ni chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis /
T03D3802:268b-9: sangs rgyas dang sems can gang gis kyang ma bgyis
T03D3802:268b-10: na las 'dis ni dmyal ba dang lha'i bar du
T03D3802:268b-11: skyes so // las 'dis 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams su ji ltar 'gyur //
T03D3802:268b-12: dngos po ma mchis pa rnams la ni las dang
T03D3802:268b-13: bya ba dang byed pa dang 'bras bu ma mchis
T03D3802:268b-14: lags so // de'i lan dngos po ma mchis pa
T03D3802:268b-15: de rnams med kyang byis pa so so'i skye bos
T03D3802:268b-16: ma shes pas phyin ci log las byung ba'i las
T03D3802:268b-17: sna tshogs byed pas dmyal ba nas sangs rgyas gyi
T03D3802:268b-18: [*kyi] bar du lus sna tshogs 'grub bo //
T03D3802:268b-19: khyod dngos po med na las dang 'bras bu dang /
T03D3802:268b-20: dmyal ba nas sangs rgyas kyi bar mi 'thad do zer ba ni /
T03D3802:268b-21: khyed de tsho dngos po med pa ma yin snyam mam /
T03D3802:268b-22: gsol pa de lta ma lags so //
T03D3802:268b-23: dmyal ba la sogs pa phyin ci log gi dbang gis bstan gyi de la dngos po med pa'o //
T03D3802:268b-24: phyin ci log gi gzhi med pa'i phrin las ni
T03D3802:268b-25: chos thams cad dngos po med na kun nas nyon
T03D3802:268b-26: mongs dang rnam byang mi 'thad do //
T03D3802:268b-27: de'i lan skyes bu mkhas pa la ngas dper bshad kyi /
T03D3802:268b-28: 'khrul pa'i dpe drug ni rmi lam dang brag ca dang /
T03D3802:268b-29: mi g-yor dang smig rgyu dang sprul pa rnams las
T03D3802:268b-30: gang byas pas mtho ris dang ngan song du skye
T03D3802:268b-31: zhing rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med pa de
T03D3802:268b-32: bzhin du 'khor 'das kyi dngos po thams cad gzhi
T03D3802:268b-33: ma grub pa'o // kun nas nyon mongs dang rnam byang med pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o /
T03D3802:268b-35: // / le'u 'di nas rnam par byang ba dang tshogs
T03D3802:268b-36: dang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dbyer med pa
T03D3802:268b-37: bstan pa'i mdzad pa gsum las dang po yang dag
T03D3802:268b-38: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba la kun nas nyon
T03D3802:268b-39: mongs pa dang rnam byang ma mchis na /
T03D3802:268b-40: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam byang gsungs pa gang lags /
T03D3802:268b-41: de'i lan chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid chos nyid brgyad ni rnam par byang ba'o //
T03D3802:269a-0: tshogs kyi mdzad pa ni chos thams cad 'khrul pa'i dpe dang 'dra @269a * //
T03D3802:269a-1: par dngos po dang rdzas su ma mchis lags na /
T03D3802:269a-2: sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la gnas nas byang chub tu sems bskyed /
T03D3802:269a-3: de'i lan khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de rnams 'khrul pa'i dpe drug lta bu ma yin snyam mam /
T03D3802:269a-4: yang gsol ba chos de rnams 'khrul pa'i dpe drug lta bu lags na /
T03D3802:269a-5: de rnams ni yang dag pa ma lags /
T03D3802:269a-6: yang dag pa ma yin pa ni sbyin pa nas
T03D3802:269a-7: rnam mkhyen gyi bar la spyad kyang sangs rgyas bar
T03D3802:269a-9: de'i lan sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyis sangs mi rgya'o //
T03D3802:269a-10: khyod de rnams kyis sangs rgyas snyam mam /
T03D3802:269a-11: sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi 'dus byas pas ni sangs rgyas bar mi nus te /
T03D3802:269a-12: 'on kyang lam skyed par byed kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
T03D3802:269a-13: de rnams kyi skye ba med pa dang /
T03D3802:269a-15: mtshan nyid med pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T03D3802:269a-16: 'on kyang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar
T03D3802:269a-17: bzung nas dge ba'i chos sbyin pa nas ma 'dres
T03D3802:269a-18: pa bco brgyad kyi bar du sgyu ma lta bu
T03D3802:269a-19: shes nas lam rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T03D3802:269a-20: phar phyin nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar dang /
T03D3802:269a-21: de ltar spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khrul pa'i dpe drug dang 'dra bas /
T03D3802:269a-22: sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gzung du med
T03D3802:269a-23: pas gzung du med pa'i chos rtogs par mi byed
T03D3802:269a-24: do // byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3802:269a-25: sems can gyi don du phar phyin drug la spyod
T03D3802:269a-26: cing byed pa'i skyes bu med pa la yod par
T03D3802:269a-27: 'du shes pa'i sems can 'grol ba ni thabs yin
T03D3802:269a-28: no zhes so // gsol ba kun rdzob bam don dam par sangs rgyas lags /
T03D3802:269a-29: lan 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la sangs rgyas zhes bstan gyi /
T03D3802:269a-30: yang dag par na 'dis 'di lta bu zhig sangs
T03D3802:269a-31: rgyas zhes pa ni dmigs pa ste thob pa med
T03D3802:269a-32: cing mngon par rtogs pa med pa /
T03D3802:269a-33: spros pa med cing spros pa thams cad dang bral ba mnyam pa nyid ni sangs rgyas so //
T03D3802:269a-34: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dbyer med pa'i phrin las kyi mdzad pa lnga las /
T03D3802:269a-35: dang po de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi yum la dbang bsgyur ba ma lags sam /
T03D3802:269b-0: lan ni chos thams cad kyang gzhan @269b la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te /
T03D3802:269b-1: so so'i skye bo nas sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid la khyad med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3802:269b-3: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la khyad ma mchis na /
T03D3802:269b-4: ji ltar dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur lags /
T03D3802:269b-5: lan dkon mchog kyang gzhan chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te /
T03D3802:269b-6: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la de bzhin gshegs pa
T03D3802:269b-7: mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g-yo la chos rnams
T03D3802:269b-8: rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs
T03D3802:269b-9: pa'i mthu'o // zhus lan gsum pa de bzhin gshegs
T03D3802:269b-10: pa chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba de
T03D3802:269b-11: bzhin du so so'i skye bo la sogs pa thams
T03D3802:269b-12: cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba
T03D3802:269b-13: pa'i mthu'o // lags sam / lan de bzhin gshegs
T03D3802:269b-14: pa'i chos nyid brgyad gang yin pa de nyid so
T03D3802:269b-15: so'i skye bo la sogs pa thams cad kyi chos
T03D3802:269b-16: pa'i mthu'o // lags sam / nyid do // zhus
T03D3802:269b-17: lan bzhi pa so so'i skye bo nas de bzhin
T03D3802:269b-18: gshegs pa'i bar gyi chos nyid mnyam pa nyid lags
T03D3802:269b-19: pa'i mthu'o // lags sam / nyid do // na
T03D3802:269b-20: / 'di ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba gzugs nas
T03D3802:269b-21: rnam mkhyen gyi bar gcig la gcig 'dus pa /
T03D3802:269b-22: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi chos nyid gzhan
T03D3802:269b-23: dang gzhan la bslabs nas phar phyin drug rdzogs nas
T03D3802:269b-24: sems can smin par bgyid pa lags zer ba'i lan
T03D3802:269b-25: ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi chos nyid
T03D3802:269b-26: stong pa nyid ma yin snyam mam /
T03D3802:269b-27: gsol ba de lta ma lags so //
T03D3802:269b-28: stong pa nyid la gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi mtshan nyid de yod snyam mam /
T03D3802:269b-30: de lta bas na chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang
T03D3802:269b-31: yin pa de la so so'i skye bo nas 'phags
T03D3802:269b-33: so so'i skye bo nas 'phags pa'i gang zag las gud na'ang de med par rig par bya'o //
T03D3802:269b-34: zhus lan lnga pa chos nyid de 'dus byas lags sam ;
T03D3802:269b-36: lan ni gnyis ka ma yin te /
T03D3802:269b-37: 'dus byas las gud na yang 'dus ma byas med /
T03D3802:269b-38: don dam pa la lus ngag dang yid med /
T03D3802:269b-39: de gsum las gud na'ang don dam pa med de /
T03D3802:269b-40: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa ni don dam pa ste /
T03D3802:270a-1: chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe /
T03D3802:270a-2: don dam pa las kyang mi g-yo la byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do //
T03D3802:270a-3: don dam pa'i rnal 'byor gyi le'u ste don gcig pa'o /
T03D3802:270a-5: // / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdzad pa las zhus lan drug las /
T03D3802:270a-7: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa stong pa ste /
T03D3802:270a-8: byed pa dang bya ba ma mchis kyang byang chub
T03D3802:270a-9: sems dpa' yum la spyod pa don dam pa las
T03D3802:270a-10: mi g-yo lags / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can gyi don bgyid lags //
T03D3802:270a-11: lan ni don dam la ci yang med kyang sems
T03D3802:270a-12: can rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ma shes pa
T03D3802:270a-13: byed pa'i skyes bu bcu gnyis su 'du shes pa
T03D3802:270a-14: dang / phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang
T03D3802:270a-15: rten 'brel dang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi
T03D3802:270a-16: 'du shes dang phral nas mya ngan las 'das pa
T03D3802:270a-17: dang / la 'god do // zhus lan gnyis pa /
T03D3802:270a-18: gsol ba cis stong pa lags /
T03D3802:270a-19: lan 'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste /
T03D3802:270a-20: sprul pa cig sprul na de stong pa nyid ma
T03D3802:270a-21: yin pa'i dngos po gang yang med pas 'di ni
T03D3802:270a-22: sprul pa'o // 'di ni stong pa'o zhes dmigs su med do //
T03D3802:270a-23: zhus lan gsum pa phung po lnga yang sprul pa'o //
T03D3802:270a-24: zhus lan bzhi pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
T03D3802:270a-25: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas sangs rgyas
T03D3802:270a-26: kyi bar yang sprul pa lags sam ;
T03D3802:270a-27: lan ni nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3802:270a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa las dang nyon mongs pa'ang sprul
T03D3802:270a-29: pa'o // rgyun du zhugs pa spang ba thams cad kyang sprul pa'o //
T03D3802:270a-30: zhus lan lnga pa sprul pa dang ma sprul pa de gang lags /
T03D3802:270a-31: de'i lan skye ba dang 'gag pa'i chos thams cad sprul pa /
T03D3802:270a-32: ma skyes ma 'gags pa mi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma sprul pa'o //
T03D3802:270a-33: zhus lan drug pa nyan thos la sogs pa gang
T03D3802:270a-34: gis kyang mdzad pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
T03D3802:270a-35: de gang lags / de'i lan sngon dngos po yod par gyur la /
T03D3802:270a-36: phyis dngos po med par 'gyur ba'am /
T03D3802:270a-38: gzhan gyi dngos po yang med na /
T03D3802:270a-39: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos nyid gcig yod par 'gyur re skan no //
T03D3802:270a-40: chos nyid mi 'gyur ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu don gnyis pa'o /
T03D3802:270a-42: // / stong phrag brgya pa'i rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
